英文文本:
Draft format only.
You can use agendas from all factions in this deck.
中文文本:
轮抽赛制限定。
你在本牌组中可以使用所有派系的议案。
英文风味文字: The Past is the Future.
中文风味文字: 过往即未来。

英文文本: Draft format only.
中文文本: 轮抽赛制限定。
英文风味文字: "This war is far from over."
中文风味文字: “这场战争远未结束。”

英文文本:
Draft format only.
You must maintain the order of your heap.
Whenever you trash a Corp card, if you have more [anarch] cards installed than any other faction, shuffle the top card of your heap into your stack.
中文文本:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已安装的[anarch]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则每当你销毁一张公司卡牌时，将你堆阵顶端的一张卡牌洗入你的存储栈。

中文名称: 鲍里斯·“暗码”·科瓦奇: 诡诈老手
英文文本:
Draft format only.
If you have more [criminal] cards installed than any other faction, when your turn begins, remove 1 tag.
中文文本:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已安装的[criminal]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当你的回合开始时，移除1枚锁定标记。

中文名称: 杰米·“嗡嗡”·麦肯: 科技博学者
英文文本:
Draft format only.
If you have more [shaper] cards installed than any other faction, when you install a card the first time each turn, draw 1 card.
中文文本:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已安装的[shaper]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当你每回合第一次安装一张卡牌时，补一张卡牌。

中文名称: 战略创新: 未来向前
英文文本:
Draft format only.
If you have more [haas-bioroid] cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn ends, shuffle 1 card in Archives into R&D.
中文文本:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[haas-bioroid]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当潜袭者的回合结束时，将一张卡牌从档案库洗入研发中心。

中文名称: 合成系统: 世界重构
英文文本:
Draft format only.
If you have more [jinteki] cards rezzed than any other faction, when your turn begins, you may swap 2 pieces of installed ice.
中文文本:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[jinteki]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当你的回合开始时，你可以将两层已安装的防火墙互换。

英文名称: Information Dynamics: All You Need To Know
中文名称: 信息动力: 你需知的一切
英文文本:
Draft format only.
If you have more [nbn] cards rezzed than any other faction, whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, give the runner 1 tag.
中文文本:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[nbn]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。

中文名称: 边缘应用: 明日今天
英文文本:
Draft format only.
If you have more [weyland-consortium] cards rezzed than any other faction, when the Runner's turn begins, place an advancement token on a piece of ice.
中文文本:
轮抽赛制限定。
如果你具有已激活的[weyland-consortium]卡牌多于其它任何派系，则当潜袭者的回合开始时，放置1枚推进标记到一层防火墙上。

英文文本: Whenever you install a virus program, the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
中文文本: 每当你安装一个病毒程序时，公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。
英文风味文字: "Watch this. It'll be funny."
中文风味文字: “看着，这会很有趣哦。”

英文文本: Add 1 card (or up to 2 virus cards) from your heap to your grip.
中文文本: 将一张卡牌（或最多两张病毒卡牌）从你的堆阵加入你的操控器。
英文风味文字: Anything worth doing is worth doing twice.
中文风味文字: 值得去做的事情值得再做。

英文文本: Run HQ or R&D. Access → 0[credit]: Trash the card you are accessing.
英文风味文字: You ever set something on fire just to watch it burn?
中文风味文字: 你可曾把东西点燃而只是为了看它燃烧？

英文文本: Place 9[credit] on this event, then run any server. During that run, hosted credits are considered to be in your credit pool. When that run ends, suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.
1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers or for installing virus programs.
英文风味文字: I feel almost naked without it.
中文风味文字: 缺了它，我感觉就像浑身赤裸。

英文文本: +2[mu] Whenever you install a virus program, place 1 virus counter on that program. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +2[mu] 每当你安装一个病毒程序时，放置1枚病毒指示物到该程序上。 每位玩家限制1个控制台 。
英文风味文字: "My little book of magic spells." -The Whizzard
中文风味文字: “我的小小魔法咒语书。” —魔术师

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条屏障子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字: "If at first you don't succeed, boost its strength and try again." -g00ru
中文风味文字: “如果第一次没成功，提高强度再试。” —精神0袖

英文文本: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on Datasucker. Hosted virus counter: Rezzed piece of ice currently being encountered has -1 strength until the end of the encounter.

Djinn can host up to 3[mu] of non-icebreaker programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit. [click], 1[credit]: Search your stack for a virus program, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
中文文本: 巨灵能被附载最多3[mu]的非破解器程序。 所附载的程序的内存费用不计算在你的内存上限中。 [click], 1[credit]: 在你的存储栈搜寻一个病毒程序，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。

英文文本:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Whenever you breach R&D, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
英文风味文字: It looked like random packet loss. It wasn't.
中文风味文字: 看起来就像是偶发的数据包丢失，其实不然。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。
英文风味文字: November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.
中文风味文字: 11月5日这天，所有人将会看到公司寡头们的肮脏阴谋。

英文文本:
Install only on a rezzed piece of ice.
When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Host ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
When the strength of host ice is 0 or less, trash it.

Interface → 3[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with 0 or less strength. Interface → 1[credit]: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本:
3[credit]: 破解强度等于或小于0的防火墙上的子进程。
1[credit]: 防火墙的强度减1。
1[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字: Fire and ichor…
中文风味文字: 火焰与毒液…

英文文本: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine.
中文文本: 0[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。
英文风味文字: The Yog.0 database is a crowdsourced compilation of sniffed, spoofed, and logged passkeys. If the key to the gate is in the database, you're in. If it's not, change the gate!
中文风味文字: 犹格.0数据库是一个含嗅探、欺骗和登入密钥的多来源编译。如果开门的密钥在数据库中，你便可顺利进入。否则，就换一道门吧！

英文文本: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets −1 strength.
中文文本: 在你遭遇一层防火墙的期间，该防火墙的强度-1。
英文风味文字: In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.
中文风味文字: 在大众意识里，公司与潜袭者之间隔着明显的鸿沟。在真实世界里，情况却有些模糊。公司需要最优秀的黑客来运作他们的网络，其中部分是喜欢固定工资的原潜袭者。但有时情况会发展到另一面，有人从公司内部做出了这样的东西。

英文文本: When your turn begins, draw 2 cards and lose [click].
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，补两张卡牌并失去[click]。
英文风味文字: "Best place to go when you want to get your mind out of the gutter and take it inside." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
中文风味文字: “当你想让脑袋摆脱一堆破事，然后扎进另一堆破事时，这是最好的去处。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

英文文本: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2[credit].
英文风味文字: "Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."
中文风味文字: “我当然是偷富人的，他们拿了所有的钱。”

英文文本: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may force the Corp to lose up to 5[credit], then you gain 2[credit] for each credit lost and take 2 tags.
中文文本: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以迫使公司失去最多5[credit]，代替读取卡牌，然后拿取2枚锁定标记，并且公司每失去1信用点你获得2[credit]。

英文文本: Gain 3[credit].
英文风味文字: "Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"
中文风味文字: “嘿小子，你把他惹火了，很快就会被整得很惨。这周围全是一些可怜虫。不过幸好我搞到了正需要的东西…”

英文文本: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
中文文本: 选择1层未激活的防火墙。公司可以激活该防火墙。如果其未如此做，则其销毁该防火墙。
英文风味文字: As the hysteria in the room climbed higher up the corporate chain, an uneasy feeling of joblessness began to sink in on the lower rungs.
中文风味文字: 随着房间里的抓狂情绪向企业链高层传递，一种令人不安的失业恐惧在底下弥漫开来。

英文文本: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
中文文本: 潜袭任意一台服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。
英文风味文字: "Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."
中文风味文字: “嘿，听着，我不是要你做什么危险的事情。你只要让我进入大楼。另外告诉我哪个房间的防卫最差。以及请别再说是'厕所'。”

英文文本: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
英文风味文字: Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…
中文风味文字: 令人兴奋的包裹，沮丧而缓慢地越过太平洋，最终在几个小时后抵达…

英文文本: [click], 1[credit]: Expose 1 card. Use this ability only if you have made a successful run on HQ this turn.
中文文本: [click], 1[credit]: 揭示一张卡牌。如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，才能使用本能力。
英文风味文字: "A little preparation goes a long way." -Gabriel Santiago
中文风味文字: “稍作准备才能走得长远。” —加布里埃尔·圣地亚哥

英文文本: +1[mu] Gain 1[credit] whenever you make a successful run. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu] 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，获得1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.

Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+1。 当你安装本程序时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。 每当你遭遇所选择的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +5 strength.
中文文本: 1[credit]: 破解警报子进程。 3[credit]: 强度+5。
英文风味文字: You feel Ninja before you see Ninja, if you see Ninja at all.
中文风味文字: 你会先感觉到忍者才能看到忍者，如果你还能看到的话。

英文文本: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
中文文本: [click]: 潜袭档案库。如果本次潜袭将要宣告为成功，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内将被攻击的服务器改为总部。
英文风味文字: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru
中文风味文字: “代码并不重要，代码会把你带去哪里才是重要的。” —精神0袖

英文文本:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] on it. When it is empty, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to remove 1 tag. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent up to 3 meat damage.
英文风味文字: "My roomie, he had a cousin with a college girlfriend whose brother's best friend was an addict, and the addict's mother used to live here. So yeah, there's a connection." -Lez "Rockfist" S.
中文风味文字: “我那个室友，他有个表亲的大学女朋友的兄弟的密友是个瘾君子，而这个瘾君子的老妈曾住过这儿。所以没错，的确有些关联。” - 雷兹·“石拳”·S.

英文文本: [click], forfeit 1 agenda: Gain 9[credit].
英文风味文字: Shadier the dealer, better the price. Unless the dealer's too shady. Then there might be a hidden fee after they take your scrip.
中文风味文字: 越阴暗的商贩，开价越高。但除非太过阴暗的商贩，他们在拿了你的货之后可能会有隐含的附加费用。

英文文本: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 1 tag.
中文文本: [trash]: 避免得到1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字:
"I get the feeling that this is the wrong place, Frank."
"What makes you say that, D?"
"The curlers."
中文风味文字:
“我感觉我们来错地方了，弗兰克。”
“为什么这么说，D？”
“看看卷发夹。”

中文名称: 凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞: 数字校正师
英文文本: Lower the install cost of the first program or piece of hardware you install each turn by 1.
中文文本: 每回合你安装的第一个程序或硬件的安装费用减1。
英文风味文字: "Are you listening?"
中文风味文字: “你在听吗？”

英文文本: Draw 3 cards.
中文文本: 抽3张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Diesel gives you flames.
中文风味文字: 迪燃给你火力。

英文文本: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
英文风味文字: There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.
中文风味文字: 自家创造的程序无可取代。它是在熬夜、麦片条和单纯的决心里培养长大。还有，它很便宜。

英文文本: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
中文文本: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
英文风味文字: "Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
中文风味文字: “有些专家有很棒的直觉，但他们却看不透数据，看不到矩阵。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

英文文本: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
英文风味文字: "There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."
中文风味文字: “你知道，在那一刻，当整个世界除了你和你的改造物之外全都消失不见，你的改造物就是世界。”

英文风味文字: The Akamatsu company was founded on three principles: first, to make the fastest mem chips on the market, second, to turn a profit, and third, to serve as a front for the manufacture of illegal neural-stimulants. It is the last principle that perhaps explains their rabid brand loyalty.
中文风味文字: 赤松公司基于三条原则创立：第一，制造市场上最强劲的芯片；第二，盈利；第三，作为非法的神经仿生体的前端服务商。最后一条原则可能解释了他们强大的品牌忠诚度。

英文文本:
+1[link]
When Rabbit Hole is installed, you may search your stack for another copy of Rabbit Hole and install it by paying its install cost. Shuffle your stack.
英文风味文字: It's not endless, it just feels that way.
中文风味文字: 它并不是无穷无尽，它只是让你有这种感觉。

英文文本: Install The Personal Touch only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker has +1 strength.
英文风味文字: A z-loop here, a cortical wave there…
中文风味文字: 这里放个Z循环，那里放个皮层波动…

英文文本: +2[mu] +2[link] 2[recurring-credit] Use these credits to pay for using icebreakers. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +2[mu], +2[link] 2[recurring-credit] 这些信用点用于支付使用破解器。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
英文风味文字: "It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
中文风味文字: “这叫'蛮力冲击'，跟百年前一样好用。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
英文风味文字: It can slice through the thickest knots of data.
中文风味文字: 它可以切开最繁杂的数据死结。

英文文本: [click]: Gain 2[credit].
英文风味文字: The Great Work was completed on a rainy Thursday afternoon. There were no seismic shifts, no solar flares, no sign from the earth or heavens that the world had changed. But upstalk in Heinlein, on a single Cybsoft manufactured datacore, the flickering data quantums of an account began to fill with creds. Real, honest-to-goodness UN certified creds.
中文风味文字: 这个巨作在一个下雨的周四午后完成。没有任何地动山摇，任何耀斑爆发，任何地球或天界的讯号表明世界已改变。然而在上行区的海因莱因，一个数位体公司制造的数据核心里，有个账号闪烁着数据量子，正开始填满信用点。真正的，实实在在的联合国认证信用点。

英文文本: [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would suffer net damage, you may pay 1[credit] to prevent 1 net damage.
中文文本: 1[credit]: 防止本回合的第一点网域伤害。
英文风味文字: Sucks energy like a martian terra-bot, but it keeps you focused
中文风味文字: 它会像火星地表机器人那样吸取能量，但能使你集中精神。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
When your turn begins, you may trash 1 of your other installed cards. If you do, gain 3[credit].
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，你可以销毁另1张你已安装的卡牌。如果你如此做，获得3[credit]。
英文风味文字: You didn't mention Aesop's arm unless you wanted an earful. Sometimes he talked about it in such a way that you wondered why he didn't laser his other arm off as well.
中文风味文字: 除非你想听到一堆啰嗦，否则不要提到伊索的手臂。有时他讲得让你疑惑他另一只手臂怎么没有被激光切下来。

英文文本: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent a player from trashing 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
英文风味文字: The life expectancy of a jacked construct is about that of a mayfly. In other words, short.
中文风味文字: 一个最好的结构体的预期寿命和蜉蝣差不多。换句话说，很短。

英文文本: Gain 2[credit] or expose 1 card.
英文风味文字: "Bring back any memories, Monica?" -John "Animal" McEvoy
中文风味文字: “回想起任何记忆吗，莫妮卡？” —约翰·“野兽”·麦克伊弗

英文文本: Gain 9[credit].
中文文本: 获得9[credit]。
英文风味文字: Lady Luck took the form of a hifi quantum manipulation ring that she wore on her middle finger.
中文风味文字: 幸运女士的中指上佩戴了一枚高保真量子制造的操控指环。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. [click]: Place 1 virus counter on this program. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, remove 1 hosted virus counter or trash this program.
中文子类型: 智能模块 - 破解器 - 病毒

英文文本: +1[link]
中文文本: +1[link]
英文风味文字: He flicked the display population to high, and was surrounded by a circle of floating holos. The ping-back was strong, the clearance level blue-one. Now to find the perfect place for a relay…
中文风味文字: 他把显示的人口数量点选到高，被一圈悬浮的全息图像环绕。反馈信号很强，许可级别为蓝色一级。现在来找个完美的位置做个中继…

英文文本:
Place 12[credit] from the bank on Armitage Codebusting when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Armitage Codebusting, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Armitage Codebusting.
英文风味文字: Drudge work, but it pays the bills.
中文风味文字: 辛苦的活儿，但能赚到钱付账单。

中文名称: 哈斯生化: 创建未来
英文文本: The first time you install a card each turn, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 每回合你第一次安装卡牌时，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: Effective. Reliable. Humane.
中文风味文字: 高效，可靠，以人为本。

英文文本: When you score Accelerated Beta Test, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are ice, you may install and rez them, ignoring all costs. Trash the rest of the cards you looked at.
中文文本: 当你用加速版本测试计分时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的三张卡牌。如果其中有任何防火墙，你可以安装并激活它们，忽略所有的费用。销毁余下你所查看的卡牌。

英文文本:
Put 12[credit] from the bank on Adonis Campaign when rezzed. When there are no credits left on Adonis Campaign, trash it.
Take 3[credit] from Adonis Campaign when your turn begins.

Aggressive Secretary can be advanced.
If you pay 2[credit] when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.
Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
中文文本: 将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
英文风味文字: "Do you think they…feel it?"
中文风味文字: “你认为他们…感觉得到吗？”

英文文本: Gain [click][click].
中文文本: 获得[click][click]。
英文风味文字: "Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."
中文风味文字: “毋庸置疑，我们有六种不同的生化人模型专门用于这个分部的各种职位。在这里，我们哈斯生化坚守信念绝不退缩，并将我们从高效中节省下来的资源回报给重要的客户。”

英文文本: Install up to 3 cards from HQ (one at a time and paying all install costs).
英文风味文字: The new heads were in. Their eyes always followed your movements when you unlocked the pressurized container and lifted the lid.
中文风味文字: 里面是全新的头颅，当你打开高压密封箱并掀起盖子，他们的眼睛始终注视着你的动作。

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: I hear the shift of every bit amid the flow of the datastream. I hear the whispers of my mothers, and their commands are law. The realm beyond is forbidden.
中文风味文字: 我聆听着数据流中字节的变化，我聆听着母亲们的细语，她们的指令便是律法。至高的国度禁止通行。
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 屏障 - 生化人

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
英文风味文字: My reputation would precede me, if any could speak of it.
中文风味文字: 如果有任何可说的，那就是我视名誉重于自身。
中文子类型: 生化人 - 毁灭者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: My name is Viktor. Nice to meet you. Would you like to play a game?
中文风味文字: 我叫维克托。很高兴认识你。你想玩一场游戏吗？
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 生化人 - 门禁

英文文本:
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Whrrrrr!

英文文本: X[credit], [trash]: Choose 1 rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. That ice gets +X strength for the remainder of the turn.
中文文本: X[credit]，[trash]: 选择1层已激活的保护本服务器的防火墙。该防火墙在本回合剩余时间内强度+X。
英文风味文字: "I solve problems."
中文风味文字: “我负责解决问题。”

英文文本: All ice protecting this server has +1 strength.
中文文本: 保护本服务器的所有防火墙的强度+1。
英文风味文字: Floyd felt the anger in the man before him, ranting against simulants. His programming pushed a routine rebuttal to the front of his thoughts, and the urge to speak it was overwhelming. This is only going to make things worse, he thought.
中文风味文字: 弗洛伊德感受到面前男人的愤怒，正对着仿生体咆哮。他的程序将一条通用的辩驳指令送进他的思想，开口说出的欲望变得非常强烈。他想到，这只会让事情越变越糟。

中文名称: 人间会社: 自我进化
英文文本: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.
中文文本: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，造成1点网域伤害。
英文风味文字: When You Need the Human Touch.
中文风味文字: 当您需要人间关怀。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 终止本次潜袭。

英文文本:
Project Junebug can be advanced.
If you pay 1[credit] when the Runner accesses Project Junebug, do 2 net damage for each advancement token on Project Junebug.

While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit]. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.
中文文本:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本资产的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者从档案库以外其他区域读取本资产时，你可以支付4[credit]。如果你如此做，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成3点网域伤害。

英文文本: [interrupt] → When a card would be exposed, you may rez this asset. [interrupt] → 1[credit] or [trash]: Prevent 1 card from being exposed.
中文文本:
如果潜袭者将要揭示一张卡牌，你可以激活财阀们的忠诚。
1[credit]或[trash]: 防止一张卡牌被揭示。

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner made a run during their last turn.
Do 1 net damage.
英文风味文字: The trick isn't hitting the person you were aiming at. It's hitting only the person you were aiming at.
中文风味文字: 技巧不在于打中你瞄准的那一个，而是只打中你瞄准的那一个。

英文文本: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
中文文本: 查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列它们。
英文风味文字: There was a new texture in her phantom cortex. It had always been there, she realized. It was everything and nothing.
中文风味文字: 她的幻象皮层上有一种新的纹理。她意识到它一直在那里，既是一切，又是虚无。

英文文本: [subroutine] The Runner moves to the outermost position of the attacked server. They may jack out. Derez this ice.
中文文本: [subroutine] 潜袭者接驳到保护被攻击服务器的最外层防火墙。关闭信元传送门。
英文风味文字: "Where does it go?"
中文风味文字: “它通向哪里？”

英文文本: [subroutine] The next piece of ice the Runner encounters during this run gets +2 strength. When that encounter ends, if the Runner did not fully break that ice, do 3 net damage.
中文文本: [subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，潜袭者遭遇的下一层防火墙的强度+2。除非潜袭者破解该防火墙上的所有子进程，否则造成3点网域伤害。
英文风味文字: "You ever get that feeling like you're shark food? Pay attention to that feeling." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
中文风味文字: “你可曾有过自己是大鲨鱼口中餐食的感觉？要小心这种感觉。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

英文文本: [subroutine] Do 1 net damage. Trash Data Mine.
中文文本: [subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。销毁数据暗雷。
英文风味文字: Access HarmlessFile.datZ -> Are you sure? y/n
中文风味文字: 读取“无害文档.datZ” -> 你确定吗？是/否

英文文本: [subroutine] Do 3 net damage.
英文风味文字:
Forged by Ak.wa on 23.11.79-23. Filed 23.11.79-23.2 with #34k-lw3-21HH-4i.
//Samurai included.

英文文本:
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.
中文风味文字: 大部分潜袭者干活的时候都是全仿真的方式，将基地设备直接接入大脑。这种方式有很大的优势，可以让潜袭者比传统的肉体操作系统更加快速地处理数据及输入指令。但这样也意味着更大的风险。

英文文本: The rez cost of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2.
中文文本: 保护本服务器的防火墙的激活费用减2。
英文风味文字: Just don't ask how he does it.
中文风味文字: 别问他怎么做到的。

英文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during trace attempts.
英文风味文字: Someone is Always Watching.
中文风味文字: 我们一直在关注。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
中文文本: 当你用神符实验项目计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物: 放置1枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。 每套牌组限制1张。 勘误自FAQ 3.1

英文文本:
When you score this agenda, give the Runner 2 tags.
When a discard phase ends, if you scored this agenda this turn, the Runner removes 2 tags.
中文文本:
当你用突发新闻计分时，给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
当你用突发新闻计分的回合结束时，潜袭者失去2枚锁定标记。

英文文本: Draw 3 cards.
英文风味文字: "Please stay connected. Priority transfer in progress. An operator will shortly verif-"
中文风味文字: “请保持连接。优先权转移进行中。很快会有操作员来核—”

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner loses all credits in their credit pool.

X must be equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
Place X advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
中文文本:
X必须等于或少于潜袭者所具有的锁定标记数量。
放置X枚推进指示物到1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
英文风味文字: Access to the largest consumer database in the galaxy has its advantages.
中文风味文字: 进入全银河系最庞大的消费者数据库是有好处的。

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
英文风味文字: "The SEA tipped us off to some suspicious data spikes up by the Castle." -Jerome Lock, on-duty tech
中文风味文字: “空梯管理局城堡那头通知我们，有一些可疑的数据波动峰值。” —值班技术员杰罗姆·洛克

英文文本:
Ghost Branch can be advanced.
When the Runner accesses Ghost Branch, you may give the Runner 1 tag for each advancement token on Ghost Branch.
When the Runner encounters this ice, they must take 1 tag or end the run. Hosted power counter: Give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice.
中文子类型: 观察者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters Matrix Analyzer, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇矩阵分析者时，你可以支付1[credit]，以放置1枚推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字: Analyzing was great. Delegating commands turned out to be even better.
中文风味文字: 能分析很棒。能分派指令则更好。
中文子类型: 观察者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they must pay 3[credit], if able. If they do not, end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，如可能，其必须支付3[credit]。如果其未如此做，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字:
"Ever heard of a catch-22?"
"Remind me to forget it."
中文风味文字:
“有没有听过第22条军规？”
“提醒我忘记它。”

英文文本: Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must pay 5[credit]. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
Each agenda in the root of this server gets −1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 本服务器根目录中的议案的推进需求-1。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字:
"I hear the coast is nice this time of year."
"If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."
中文风味文字:
“我听说每年这个时候，海岸城市很兴旺。”
“如果你从事对路的行业，全年都很兴旺。”

英文名称: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
中文名称: 威兰财团: 创造美好世界
英文文本: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 每当你打出一个交易事务时，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: Moving Upwards.
中文风味文字: 永攀高峰。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，获得7[credit]并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
英文风味文字: There are going to be some changes around here.
中文风味文字: 这里将会有些变动。

英文文本: When you score Posted Bounty, you may forfeit it to give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity.
中文文本: 当你用悬赏通告计分时，你可以废除它，以给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
英文风味文字: "If some two-cred newsy picks it up, even better. The scum could be in the alleys of Guayaquil of the slums of BosWash. Not to mention off-planet."
中文风味文字: “如果让一些两信用点小报的报童拿到，会更加有效。人渣们可能在瓜亚基尔的巷子或波士华区的贫民窟里。甚至不在这颗星球上。”

英文文本: [click], trash a rezzed piece of ice: Gain 4[credit].
中文文本: [click], 销毁一层已激活的防火墙: 获得4[credit]。
英文风味文字: "Feed the Feds our scraps, and they'll come back begging for more." -Richard Polasco, VP of Cyber-Security
中文风味文字: “给联邦政府的人喂些我们的剩食，他们会来乞求更多的。” —赛博防卫公司副总裁，理查德·波拉克

英文文本:
Play only if you scored an agenda this turn.
Search R&D for 1 card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
中文文本:
如果你本回合已用过一个议案计分，才能打出。
在研发中心搜寻一张卡牌并将其加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
英文风味文字: "I believe you'll find the terms are quite favorable."
中文风味文字: “我相信你会发现条件非常优厚。”

英文文本: Gain 3[credit].
英文风味文字: The New Angeles Space Elevator, better known as the Beanstalk, is the single greatest triumph of human engineering and ingenuity in history. The Beanstalk makes Earth orbit accessible to everyone…for a small fee.
中文风味文字: 新洛杉机太空电梯，人称“豆茎”，是载入史册的人类工程学与独创性相结合的伟大胜利。“豆茎”使任何人都能够进入地球轨道…只需付一点小小的费用。

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 4 meat damage.
英文风味文字: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…"
中文风味文字: “我想提醒新闻界的女士们先生们，在爆炸中损坏的部分建筑物是由威兰财团的子公司所拥有的…”

英文文本: Place 1 advancement token on each of up to 2 different installed cards that can be advanced.
英文风味文字:
"And then there's these two crates. No eID."
"Just leave those with me and forget you ever saw them."
中文风味文字:
“有两个货箱，没有电子编号。”
“留给我处理，你就当没有看到过它们。”

英文文本:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.

作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，废除1个议案。

[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Next time, read the Terms of Service more carefully. Or you might find yourself in the danger zone.
中文风味文字: 下次，请更仔细地阅读服务条款。否则你可能会陷入危险的境地。

Hadrian's Wall can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.

[subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: "He had a bit of an ego, ol' Hadrian. His constructs live up to it though." -g00ru
中文风味文字: “老哈德良他有点自负。不过他的建造物值得赞美。” —精神0袖

英文文本:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+l。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "I asked for ice as impenetrable as a wall. I can't decide if someone down in R&D has a warped sense of humor or just a very literal mind." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security
中文风味文字: “我要求防火墙像堵冰墙一样坚固。我不知道是研发中心下面的人有反常的幽默感，还是有一个咬文嚼字的脑袋。” —防卫项目副总裁，莉兹·坎贝尔

英文文本:
Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.

[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
英文风味文字: Who knows what evil lurks in the memory diamonds of men? Weyland knows. -unsigned cyber-graffiti
中文风味文字: 谁知道在人类的记忆宝石中藏有怎样的黑暗？威兰知道。 —未署名的数字涂鸦

英文文本:
Install only in the root of HQ.
Your maximum hand size is +2.
中文文本:
仅能安装在总部的根目录。
你的手牌上限+2。
英文风味文字: "Jack Weyland built the Beanstalk and transformed the human race forever. I can't wait to see what we're going to do next."
中文风味文字: “杰克·威兰建造了豆茎并永远地改变了人类。我迫不及待地想看我们下一步要做什么。”

英文文本: When you score Priority Requisition, you may rez a piece of ice ignoring all costs.
英文风味文字: "If it isn't in my terminal by six p.m., heads are going to roll!"
中文风味文字: “如果下午6点前这玩意还没在我的终端里，头儿们就会发狂的！”

英文文本: If the Runner is tagged, Private Security Force gains: "[click]: Do 1 meat damage."
英文风味文字: "Expensive? Not when you're protecting a fortune as large as ours."
中文风味文字: “贵？当你像我们一样要保护如此大的财产时就不会这么觉得。”

英文文本: [click], [click], [click]: Gain 7[credit].
英文风味文字: "The mining bosses are worse than any downstalk crime lords. Tri-Maf, 4K, Yak, I don't care what gangs you got down there. In Heinlein there's just one law: the He3 must flow." -"Old" Rick Henry, escaped clone
中文风味文字: “矿业老板比所有下行区犯罪头目还要糟糕。三合党，4K，极道会，我不管你在下行世界遇到过什么帮派。在海因莱因只有一条法律：氦-3必须持续开采。” —逃脱的克隆体，“老”瑞克·亨利

英文文本: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: It is like the one you just bought, only better.
中文风味文字: 这很像你刚买的那个，但这个更好。

英文文本: Gain 9[credit].
中文文本: 获得9[credit]。
英文风味文字: Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. -The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?
中文风味文字: 对冲基金。名词。一种巧妙的策略，富人通过它来变得更富，其他贫穷的蠢货们则会输掉内裤。 —反叛者的字典，谁管第几卷

英文文本:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click].
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字:
"Hey, hey! Wake up, man. You were under a long time. What'd you see?"
"I…don't remember."
中文风味文字:
“喂，喂！醒醒，伙计。你呆了很长时间了。你看到了什么？”
“我…不记得了。”

英文文本: [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
英文风味文字:
.//run/hunter-tr/return=true
client/sec256IPv7->confirm? /y
3926:0HB7:1001:2NB1:1601:7784:ERROR
中文风味文字:
.//run/hunter-tr/return=true
client/sec256IPv7->确定吗？/是
3926:0HB7:1001:2NB1:1601:7784:ERROR
中文子类型: 观察者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: [subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: "There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
中文风味文字: “没有什么比在连接中断前，看到了蓝色美丽的数据球却够不到来得更糟了。我觉得他们就是以此故意嘲讽我们。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

英文文本:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to trash cards.
中文文本:
3[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于销毁卡牌。
英文风味文字: "Running is the ultimate game, and I get to make all the rules."
中文风味文字: “潜袭是个终极游戏，我制定一切规则。”

英文文本: +1[mu], 2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to use icebreakers. Whenever there is a successful trace during a run, suffer 1 core damage. Limit 1 console per player.
When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access, once per turn → Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing.
中文文本: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 读取 → 所附载的病毒指示物: 销毁你正在读取的卡牌。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。
英文风味文字: Something wicked this way comes.
中文风味文字: 从魔界而来。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
英文风味文字: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.
中文风味文字: 诸天为兵，一次一星。

英文文本: [trash]: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2[credit] as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of the turn.
中文文本: [trash]: 选择一层防火墙。公司必须支付2[credit]作为额外的费用，以激活该防火墙，直到本回合结束。
英文风味文字: Named after Hernando Cortez, a former Weyland technician convicted of smuggling company tech. He still collected his pension while in prison, the last beneficiary of a loophole in Weyland's standard employment contract.
中文风味文字: 它的名字来自赫尔南多·科特斯，一位由于走私公司机密被定罪的前威兰技术员。他在狱中依然能够领取退休金，这是从威兰员工标准合同中钻到空子的最后点好处。

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
英文风味文字: Show-off.
中文风味文字: 炫耀。

英文文本: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 如果你具有至少2[link]，ZU.13守钥者的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 1[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字: He always uses the same key.
中文风味文字: 他总是使用同一把钥匙。
中文子类型: 云 - 解码模块 - 破解器

英文文本: +1[link] [trash]: Choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the turn.
中文文本: +1[link] [trash]: 选择一个破解器。该破解器的强度+2，直到本回合结束。
英文风味文字: "What causes an Artifical Intellegence to turn on its master? Is it because its directives have been altered by some external source? Or, by giving them agency to adapt, have we fated them to revolt?" -Emilio Harris, Creators and the Created
中文风味文字: “是什么让人工智能对抗它的主人？是因为指令被外部源修改？或者，因为给予它们适应的能力，我们赋予它们反抗的宿命？” —埃米利奥·哈里斯，《创造者与被造者》
中文子类型: 人脉 - 中转器 - 虚拟

英文文本: When you install this hardware, load 4 power counters onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [interrupt] → Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.
中文文本: 当凝塑铠甲被安装时，放置4枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。当凝塑铠甲上没有能量指示物时，销毁本卡牌。 所附载的能量指示物: 防止1点肢体伤害。

英文文本: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.
英文风味文字: A Different Breed of Machine.
中文风味文字: 机器的变种。

英文文本: You have 1 additional [click] to spend each turn.
中文文本: 每回合你有一个额外的[click]用来花费。
英文风味文字: Sometimes employee reviews took a little bit longer than anticipated.
中文风味文字: 职员的审查有时会比预计的要长一些。

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage.
中文文本:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解双面神1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
英文风味文字: Face your fear.
中文风味文字: 面对你的恐惧。
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 生化人 - 警报

英文文本: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.
英文风味文字: "Eyes forward, please."
中文风味文字: “请直视前方。”

英文文本:
When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3.
The rez cost of all ice is lowered by 1 for each agenda counter on Braintrust.
[subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. End the run if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.
中文文本: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Sometimes uniqueness is overrated.
中文风味文字: 独特性有时会被过分高估。

英文文本: [click]: Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
中文文本: [click]: <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字: "We're gonna need a bigger room."
中文风味文字: “我们需要一个更大的房间。”

英文文本:
When you rez TMI, Trace[2]. If unsuccessful, derez TMI.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
当你激活垃圾信息堆时，<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果失败，关闭垃圾信息堆。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: A collection of cast-off cyberjunk. But it doesn't stay junk for long.
中文风味文字: 一个由废弃数字垃圾组成的东西。不过它很快就不会是垃圾了。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 在研发中心搜寻1张卡牌并展示之。将其加入总部。

英文文本:
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, the Corp gains 3[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, end the run.
英文风味文字: A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.
中文风味文字: 它是贸易的象征，但小心它的利牙。

英文文本:
When you rez this ice, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it.
This ice gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.
中文文本:
当你激活天龙座时，你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚能量指示物到本卡牌上。
天龙座上每有1枚能量指示物，其强度+1。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Victōs draconēs numquam deride.
中文风味文字: 万勿哂笑以对真龙。

英文文本: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, you may spend X[credit]. If you do, the Corp loses X[credit]. If you spent credits, take 1 tag.
中文文本: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，你可以支付X[credit]，以迫使公司失去最多X[credit]然后拿取1枚锁定标记，代替读取卡牌。
英文风味文字: There was a certain schadenfreude about throwing away your credits.
中文风味文字: 扔掉你的信用点，有一种幸灾乐祸的感觉。

英文文本: When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
中文文本: 当你安装本资源时，填装16[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]: 从本资源上拿取4[credit]。
英文风味文字: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.
中文风味文字: 不属于你的钱更容易花掉。

英文文本: Expose up to 2 cards.
中文文本: 揭示最多两张卡牌。
英文风味文字: T-minus 13 seconds. Leela had to work fast. She jacked in the mesa wire and activated the screen. 7 seconds. The internal SLD was still booting. 4 seconds. The interface flickered to life with an orange glow. 2 seconds. With a tap of a finger she was in.
中文风味文字: 倒计时13秒。莉拉必须快点。她接入门萨线并激活屏幕。7秒。内部SLD还在启动。4秒。接口闪烁着橙光开启。2秒。她手指轻点着登入。

英文文本: Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1[credit] to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
英文风味文字: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.
中文风味文字: 赛博方案公司的e3系列植入体，可以准确地代替肌肉记忆和自律反应，解放大脑以完全专注于思考任务。

英文文本:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit during traces.
Gain 1[credit] whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.
中文文本:
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于追踪。
每当公司激活一层防火墙时，获得1[credit]。

英文文本:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
英文风味文字: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.
中文风味文字: 当你如此出色，就不难建立一个粉丝群。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever you use this program to break a subroutine, this program gets +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
中文文本: 1[credit]: 破解屏障子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 每当你使用雪球来破解一个子进程时，其在本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
英文风味文字: "If your snowball gets big enough, you can make it into a snowman!" -Chaos Theory
中文风味文字: “如果你的雪球够大，你可以把它做成雪人！” —混沌希尔瑞

英文文本: +1[mu], +1[link]
英文风味文字: Archaic but reliable.
中文风味文字: 陈旧但可靠。

英文文本: The trash cost of all installed cards is increased by 1.
中文文本: 所有已安装卡牌的销毁费用+1。
英文风味文字: The key to the future lies in the past.
中文风味文字: 通向未来的钥匙藏于过去。

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, add 1 installed program to the top of the Runner's stack.
中文文本:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解夏洛克1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈顶端。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，将一个已安装的程序加入潜袭者的存储栈顶端。
中文子类型: 生化人 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: The Runner cannot run on remote servers. Ignore this ability until the end of the turn whenever the Runner runs on a central server.

While the Runner is accessing this agenda in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this agenda anywhere except in Archives, do 2 net damage.
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
Choose 1 installed card you can advance. Move up to 2 advancement counters from 1 other card to the chosen card.
中文文本: 选择1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌。从另1张卡牌上转移最多2枚推进指示物到所选择的卡牌上。
英文风味文字: Smoke and mirrors optional.
中文风味文字: 烟与镜任选。

英文文本: [subroutine] For the remainder of this run, each piece of ice encountered except Sensei gains "[subroutine] End the run" after all its other subroutines.
中文文本: [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，除师范外遭遇的每层防火墙，在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
英文风味文字: Peace and violence. Both must lead to the same place.
中文风味文字: 和平与暴力。必然殊途同归。

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Give the Runner 2 tags.
中文文本:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字: Looking out for your interests since 1984.
中文风味文字: 自1984年起就留意着你的兴趣。

英文文本: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 每当在对本服务器的潜袭中有一次成功的追踪时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: Clones whisper of ChiLo as a promised land of freedom.
中文风味文字: 克隆体们私下说芝路易斯是一片自由的乐土。

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Trace[2]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware with an install cost of X or less, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.
中文文本:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，销毁一个硬件，该硬件的安装费用等于或小于你追踪强度超过潜袭者中转强度的差值。

英文文本: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 每当你安装一层保护本服务器的防火墙时，你可以立即激活它，其激活费用减3。 每台服务器限制1个区域。

英文文本: When you score Executive Retreat, place 1 agenda counter on it and shuffle HQ into R&D. [click], hosted agenda counter: Draw 5 cards.
中文文本: 当你用高级行政会所计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上，并将总部洗入研发中心。 [click], 所附载的议案指示物: 补五张卡牌。

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash up to 2 resources.
中文文本:
如果潜袭者被锁定，才能打出。
销毁最多两个资源。
英文风味文字: No contract. Just a handshake and a fistful of C-6 high explosives.
中文风味文字: 无需合同。只要一次握手和一把C-6高爆炸药。

英文文本:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Whenever you breach HQ, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
中文文本:
每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚病毒指示物到神经毒剂上。
每当你从总部读取卡牌时，神经毒剂上除第一枚病毒指示物外，每有1枚病毒指示物，允许你额外读取一张卡牌。

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may gain [click]. If you do, take 1 tag when this turn ends.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，你可以获得[click]。如果你如此做，当本回合结束时拿取1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字: "My enhancements are guaranteed for life, and well worth the risk."
中文风味文字: “我的强化手艺保证有效，带来的风险微不足道。”

英文文本:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
中文文本:
只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
关闭1层已安装的防火墙。
英文风味文字: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda
中文风味文字: “把它想象成一个虚拟的电击项圈，用来管教公司的宠物。” —安德洛墨达

英文文本: [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would suffer meat damage, prevent 1 meat damage.
中文文本: 防止每回合的第一点肢体伤害。
英文风味文字: Light and form-fitting, its like bulletproof skin.
中文风味文字: 轻便又贴身，就像防弹的皮肤。

英文文本: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.
中文文本: 每次潜袭中一次，当你接驳到一层未激活的防火墙时，你可以揭示它。然后，你可以退出。
英文风味文字: "A snitch is a girl's best friend." -Andromeda
中文风味文字: “告密者是女孩最好的朋友。 ” —安德洛墨达

英文风味文字: "Have you met Dinosaurus?"
中文风味文字: “你见过我的小神龙吗？”

英文文本: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
中文文本: 在你的存储栈或堆阵搜寻1个程序。（如果搜寻了存储栈则将其洗混。）安装该程序，忽略所有的费用。当你的回合结束时，如果该程序仍未被卸载，将其加入你的存储栈顶端。

英文文本: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.

[click]: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost.
1[credit]: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.
中文文本:
[click]: 从你的操控器附载一个程序或硬件到私人工作间上，并放置与其安装费用相等的能量指示物到该卡牌上。
1[credit]: 从所附载的一张卡牌上移除1枚能量指示物。
当你回合开始时，从所附载的一张卡牌上移除1枚能量指示物。
当一张所附载的卡牌上没有能量指示物时，安装它，忽略所有的费用。

英文文本: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
中文文本: 你的手牌上限+2。
英文风味文字: "I'm just thankful that the brain damage is reversible. With the support of the city of New Angeles, I hope to be on my feet and back to practicing my art very soon." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
中文风味文字: “我很庆幸脑部伤害是可以恢复的。在新洛杉矶市民们的支持下，我希望能早日康复，再度开展艺术创作。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。

英文文本:
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, the Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, end the run.
中文文本:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，如可能，潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Dont Tread On Me
中文风味文字: 别踩到我。

英文文本: When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3[credit]. If you do, do 1 core damage for each piece of ice protecting this server.
中文文本: 当潜袭者读取世界边缘时，如果其已安装并且你支付3[credit]，每有一层保护本服务器的防火墙，造成1点脑部伤害。

英文文本: Choose a server. Arrange the ice protecting that server in any order.
中文文本: 选择一台服务器。按任意顺序排列保护该服务器的防火墙。
英文风味文字: "You haven't run until you've seen the cybersun drift down behind the Great City, the space around you rippling with colors you can't imagine." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
中文风味文字: “你没见过数字太阳沉落大都市背后的美景，就不算潜袭过。你周围的空间会荡漾着你无法想象的色彩。” —凯特·“麦克”·麦卡弗瑞

英文文本:
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from Marked Accounts, if able.
[click]: Place 3[credit] from the bank on Marked Accounts.

When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付1[credit]。
英文风味文字: "Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." -Chaos Theory
中文风味文字: “试试关掉它。去啊，看看它会做什么。” —混沌希尔瑞

英文文本: Woodcutter can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.
中文文本: 已激活的伐木者才能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。”
英文风味文字: Chop chop.
中文风味文字: 咚，咚。

英文文本: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1[credit] for each advancement token on that ice.
中文文本: 选择一层防火墙。该防火墙上每有1枚推进标记，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: The Division of Fringe Applications' revenue increased 37% year-over-year after corporate discovered that most of their projects made really fun toys.
中文风味文字: 就在公司发现边缘应用的项目大部分都生产出了很有趣的玩具之后，其销售额年同比增长了37%。

英文文本:
Place 14[credit] from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Private Contracts.
中文文本:
当私人合约被激活时，从银行中放置14[credit]到本卡牌上。当私人合约上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
[click]: 从私人合约上拿取2[credit]。

英文文本: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 当你激活奇美拉时，选择警报，门禁或屏障。奇美拉获得该子类型直到被关闭。 当一个回合结束时，关闭奇美拉。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Three heads. One big headache.
中文风味文字: 三个头。一个难题。

英文文本: [interrupt] → [trash]: Reduce the base trace strength of a trace to 0.
中文文本: [trash]: 防止一次追踪。本次追踪以0基础追踪强度重新发起。
英文风味文字: "Saved my bacon more than once, but gives a wicked sense of déjà vu." -Whizzard
中文风味文字: “这玩意救过我不止一次，不过会造成不自在的既视感。” —魔术师

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
英文风味文字: It always strikes twice.
中文风味文字: 它总是有再度劈中的奇迹。

英文文本: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
中文文本: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
英文风味文字: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
中文风味文字: “他们是搞破坏的无脑工具，其它方面几乎一无是处。尽管他们人还不错。我有一些最好的朋友就是清洗者。” —吉·“噪音”·雷利

英文文本: +1[mu] Once per turn → When a successful run ends, you may run any server. Limit 1 console per player.
英文风味文字: Twice the fun.
中文风味文字: 双倍的乐趣。

英文文本: [trash]: Derez 1 piece of ice you fully broke during this encounter.
中文文本: [trash]: 关闭一层防火墙。在一次遭遇中破解该防火墙上的所有子进程后，才能使用本能力。
英文风味文字: Cyberspace's strongest glue.
中文风味文字: 赛博空间中最强的胶水。

英文文本: Interface → [trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.
英文风味文字: Didn't see that coming.
中文风味文字: 如此意外。

英文文本: [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click].
英文风味文字: "I don't care what the studies show. From my experience, I can ingest three cans of Diesel an hour for up to twelve hours before going into cardiac arrest." -heard during the eleventh hour
中文风味文字: “我不管研究怎么说。依我的经验，我可以每小时喝掉三罐迪燃，在心脏停摆前持续工作长达十二小时。” —听闻于第十一个小时

英文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to install hardware.
中文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于安装硬件。
英文风味文字: Few corporate employees have such wide-sweeping security clearance as the janitorial staff. Most corps foolishly think they're too dim-witted to take advantage of it.
中文风味文字: 很少有公司职员能像清扫工那样拥有各处清扫的广泛安全许可。大部分公司可笑地认为清扫工们过于愚笨，不懂得如何以此为利。

英文文本: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have at least 2[link].
英文风味文字: "My boss rewards quality work. If you know what's good for you, you'll keep it up."
中文风味文字: “我的老板会嘉奖高质量的工作。如果你明白什么对你有利，你就继续好好干。”

英文文本: Gain 3[credit] and draw 1 card.
英文风味文字: Green-two clearance is the highest level of security a corp can gain access to. Legally, anyway.
中文风味文字: 绿色二级是一个职员能获得的最高安全许可。应该说，合法获得的。

英文文本:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 如可能，潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] 如可能，潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] 如可能，潜袭者失去[click]。
英文风味文字: Time just slips away.
中文风味文字: 时间只会悄悄溜走。

英文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez ice.
中文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于激活防火墙。
英文风味文字:
so very still, even
cherry blossoms are not stirred
by the temple bell
-Fuhaku
中文风味文字:
寺钟不扰樱花落，
寂静又平和
—川上不白

英文文本: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit] or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits and this ice is installed, move this ice to the outermost position protecting another server. (The run continues from this new position.)
中文文本: [subroutine] 你和潜袭者秘密花费0[credit]，1[credit]或2[credit]。展示所花费的信用点。如果你和潜袭者花费了不同数量的信用点，转移牛蛙，使其成为保护另一台服务器的最外层防火墙（现在，潜袭者从这个新位置并对这台新服务器继续进行潜袭）。
中文子类型: 门禁 - 偏导器 - 灵能

英文文本:
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn.
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, end the run.
中文文本:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者本回合不能进行另一次潜袭。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Where one thing ends, another begins.
中文风味文字: 一物终结之处，便是他物开始之地。

英文文本:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during traces. X is the number of links the Runner has.
中文文本:
X[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于追踪。X等于潜袭者的中转数量。
英文风味文字: This is the net. We work here. We're cops.
中文风味文字: 这就是网络。我们在此工作。我们是警察。

英文名称: Weyland Consortium: Because We Built It
中文名称: 威兰财团: 因为有我们建造
英文文本:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to advance ice.
中文文本:
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于推进防火墙。
英文风味文字: Constructing Cyberspace.
中文风味文字: 建设赛博空间。

英文文本: [click], [click]: Gain 4[credit].
中文文本: [click], [click]: 获得4[credit]。
英文风味文字: It's really hard to lose a government contract.
中文风味文字: 政府合约是很难被破坏的。

英文文本: Tyrant can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each advancement token on it.
中文文本: 已激活的暴君才能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”
英文风味文字: Thou shall not pass.
中文风味文字: 汝不得通过。

英文文本: Rez a piece of ice, ignoring all costs, and install Oversight AI on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash host ice if all its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."
Forfeit this agenda: If the Runner has 2 or more [click] remaining, they lose [click][click].
中文文本: 废除本议案: 如果潜袭者有2个或更多剩余的[click]，其失去[click][click]。
英文风味文字: It didn't look like the headquarters of a multi-billion cred company. Probably because it wasn't.
中文风味文字: 看起来它不像是一个几十亿资产公司的总部。估计是因为它真的不是。

英文文本:
Play only if you placed at least 1 virus counter on a program this turn.
Place 2 virus counters on that program.
中文文本:
如果你本回合已在一个程序上放置过至少1枚病毒指示物，才能打出。
放置2枚病毒指示物到该程序上。
英文风味文字: You must yell "surge" to get the full effect.
中文风味文字: 你必须大叫“增幅”来让它完全生效。

英文文本: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
中文文本: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
英文风味文字:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge
中文风味文字:
群来欢呼，慎敬！慎敬！
何比目之凌光，散发而飘扬！
众当拥戴，恭维三匝于周遭
闭目以听，诚恐诚惶
彼曾啜得，罡蜂之甘露
更饮仙醪，汲天河于滥觞！
—塞缪尔·泰勒·柯尔律治

中文名称: 安德洛墨达: 无产贵族
英文文本: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.
中文文本: 你补九张初始手牌。
英文风味文字: "I run with the best."
中文风味文字: “我最擅长潜袭。”

英文文本: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1[credit] to add this event to your grip.
中文文本: 移除1枚锁定标记。然后你可以支付1[credit]，以将本事件加入你的操控器。
英文风味文字: She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgment of the corporate simpletons she met there.
中文风味文字: 她偏爱在夜总会谈生意。灯光和舞女，会干扰与她见面的公司傻帽们的判断力。

英文文本: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
英文风味文字: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.
中文风味文字: 如果你没有内线帮忙，就找一个喜欢桌面饰品的内部人员。

英文文本:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones.
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.
Draw 5 cards.
中文文本: 补五张卡牌。
英文风味文字: She at her P.A.D. I at my rig. Low lights. Smooth jazz. Love blooms.
中文风味文字: 她看着电脑面板。我看着我的设备。灯光昏暗。爵士乐轻柔。爱情绽放。

英文文本: Whenever you install a piece of hardware (including Replicator), you may search your stack for another copy of that hardware, reveal it, and add it your grip. Shuffle your stack.
中文文本: 每当你安装一个硬件（包括复制器）时，你可以在你的存储栈搜寻另一个相同的硬件，将其展示，并加入你的操控器。将你的存储栈重洗。
英文风味文字: Do you really need another one?
中文风味文字: 你真的还需要一个？

英文文本: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of this program is 0[mu], even if it is not installed. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 如果你具有至少2[link]，爬虫的内存费用为0，即使其未被安装。 2[credit]: 破解警报子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字:
"The itsy bitsy spider went up the data spout…"
-Chaos Theory
中文风味文字: “小蜘蛛爬呀爬，爬到数据水管上…” —混沌希尔瑞
中文子类型: 云 - 破解器 - 断路模块

英文文本:
Play only if you stole an agenda this turn.
Choose a server. The Corp trashes 1 piece of ice protecting that server.
中文文本:
如果你本回合已窃取过一个议案，才能打出。
选择一台服务器。公司销毁一层保护该服务器的防火墙。
英文风味文字: Early permutations of the kraken proved to be insatiable, ice-devouring marauders. Not much has changed.
中文风味文字: 早期海怪的阵势表明它们是群饕餮无厌、吞噬冰墙的怪物。至今没什么大改变。

英文文本: You cannot use this resource more than once per turn. [click]: Place 3[credit] on this resource. [click]: Take all credits from this resource.
英文风味文字: "You aren't the only type of runner in New Angeles."
中文风味文字: “你并不是新洛杉矶唯一的一类潜袭者。”

英文文本:
Place 16[credit] from the bank on Eve Campaign when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Eve Campaign, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from Eve Campaign.
中文文本:
当伊芙营销计划被激活时，从银行中放置16[credit]到本卡牌上。当伊芙营销计划上没有信用点时，销毁本卡牌。
当你的回合开始时，从伊芙营销计划上拿取2[credit]。

英文文本: Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
中文文本: 将一张卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。
英文风味文字: Also known as "development hell."
中文风味文字: 又称“开发者地狱”。

英文文本: [subroutine] The Runner cannot jack out for the remainder of this run. Trash Whirlpool.
英文风味文字: "This ice sucks." -g00ru
中文风味文字: “这防火墙太扯了。” —精神0袖

英文文本: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, do 1 net damage. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，造成1点网域伤害。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: Despite its appearance, the Hokusai Grid is the most notorious research facility at Jinteki.
中文风味文字: 不管看起来如何，北斋网阵是人间会社最声名狼藉的研究设施。

英文文本: [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, look at the top X cards of the stack, where X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength. Trash 1 of those cards and arrange the rest in any order.
中文文本: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，查看潜袭者存储栈顶端的数张卡牌，其数量等于你追踪强度超过他/她中转强度的差值。销毁其中一张卡牌，并按任意顺序排列余下的卡牌。
英文风味文字: Sniff.
中文风味文字: 嗅嗅。
中文子类型: 观察者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, Trace[5]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag. If unsuccessful, trash Bernice Mai.
英文风味文字: Keeping tabs on the world, one screen at a time.
中文风味文字: 屏幕一个接一个，密切关注全世界。

英文文本: Salvage can be advanced only while rezzed and gains “[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.” for each advancement token on it.
中文文本: 已激活的打捞者才能被推进，并且其上每有1枚推进标记，获得“[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。”
英文风味文字: You're not in Kansas anymore.
中文风味文字: 你已经不再在堪萨斯了。

英文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to advance cards in the root of or protecting this server.
中文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于推进本服务器内或保护本服务器的卡牌。
英文风味文字: "A job done once is a job done right."
中文风味文字: “一次性完成工作才可谓正确地完成工作。”

英文文本: Trace[7]. If successful, trash 1 virtual resource or 1 link.
中文文本: 追踪 7 如果成功，销毁一个虚拟资源或一个中转器。
英文风味文字: "It's kind of like an anagram." -designer Phoenix
中文风味文字: “有点像个变位词。” —设计师菲尼克斯

英文文本: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
中文文本: 潜袭档案库。如果成功，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个程序，忽略所有的费用，代替侵入档案库。

英文文本:
Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 virus counter on this program.
中文子类型: 智能模块 - 破解器 - 病毒

英文文本:
Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
If you are tagged, Data Leak Reversal gains "[click]: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D."
中文文本:
如果你本回合已对中央服务器进行过成功的潜袭，才能安装。
如果你被锁定，数据逆流器获得“[click]: 公司销毁研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。”
英文风味文字: A two-way solution to a one-way problem, the data leak reversal, or DLR for short, is a misnomer. There is no actual reversal of data, only the creation of a parallel peer-to-peer link with the initial source.
中文风味文字: 数据逆流，简称DLR，是个解决单向问题的双向对策，但这其实是个误称。实际上它并没有逆转数据，只是向初始来源建立了一条平行的点对点连接。

英文文本: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
英文风味文字: Do you believe in faeries?
中文风味文字: 你相信有仙灵吗？

英文文本: [click]: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.
英文风味文字:
"We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago."
"I appreciate it, Mr. Li."
"We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel…"
"Yes?"
"Don't leave town."
中文风味文字:
“我们始终乐意提供帮助，圣地亚哥先生。”
“非常感谢，李先生。”
“我们会保持联系，另外，加布里埃尔…”
“怎么？”
“不要离开城市。”

英文文本: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
英文风味文字: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.
中文风味文字: 隔段时间来一次小小的公司重组是有必要的。

英文文本: Whenever you breach R&D, access 1 additional card.
英文风味文字: Works best at your own desk.
中文风味文字: 在你自己桌上工作的效果最好。

英文文本:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Deep Thought.
If there are at least 3 virus counters on Deep Thought, it gains "When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of R&D."
中文文本:
每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚病毒指示物到沉思者上。
如果沉思者具有至少3枚病毒指示物，其获得“当你的回合开始时，你可以查看研发中心顶端的一张卡牌。”

英文文本: [interrupt] → 2[credit]: Prevent 1 tag. When you steal an agenda, trash this resource.
中文文本:
2[credit]: 避免1枚锁定标记。
当你窃取一个议案时，销毁新洛杉矶市政厅。
英文风味文字: "New Angeles is the jewel of modern civilization, and its government the envy of nations." -Mayor Wells
中文风味文字: “新洛杉矶是现代文明的瑰宝，其政府让他国羡慕不已。” —市长威尔斯

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 失去[click]: 破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "That's against the rules. The Creators will be angry."
中文风味文字: “这违反了规则。创造者会发怒的。”

英文文本: As an additional cost to make a run on this server, the Runner must spend [click]. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 作为对本服务器进行一次潜袭的额外费用，潜袭者必须花费[click]。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: Known for luxury hoppers and a delectable sauerkraut.
中文风味文字: 以豪华飞跃车和美味酸泡菜而闻名。

英文文本: You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: Do 3 net damage. Use this ability only if there are 4 or more hosted advancement counters.
中文文本: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]: 造成3点网域伤害。只有所附载的推进指示物有4枚或更多时，才能使用本能力。
英文风味文字: "I will serve you…for a time."
中文风味文字: “我会为您服务…一阵子。”

英文文本: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with 1 piece of ice from HQ. (The new ice is installed unrezzed.) If you do, the Runner may jack out. Use this ability only once per run.
中文文本: 每次潜袭中一次，当潜袭者接驳到一层保护本服务器的防火墙时，你可以将该防火墙与总部中的一层防火墙互换。新防火墙被安装为未激活的状态。
英文风味文字: "Looks like someone is being naughty…"
中文风味文字: “看起来有人不听话…”

中文名称: 网际传媒: 世界是你们的*
英文文本: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
中文文本: 你的手牌上限+1。
英文风味文字: *Some restrictions may apply. Scan this card to find out more.
中文风味文字: *可能有部分限制条件，扫描本卡牌以发现更多讯息。

英文文本:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 hosted advancement counters past 3.
This agenda is worth 1 more agenda point for each hosted agenda counter.
中文文本:
当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过2枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
每有1枚所附载的议案指示物，本议案的价值增加1点议案分数。

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn.
Trace[6]. If successful, give the Runner X tags. X is equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded their link strength.
中文文本:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合窃取过一个议案，才能打出。
<trace>追踪 6</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者数枚锁定标记，其数量等于你追踪强度超过他/她中转强度的差值。

英文文本: [subroutine]Trace[6]. If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware, do 2 meat damage (cannot be prevented), and end the run.
英文风味文字: A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.
中文风味文字: 一道亮光绽放，随后控制台熄灭。这时她闻到了烟味。
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: If the Runner is tagged, Dedicated Response Team gains "Whenever a successful run ends, do 2 meat damage."
英文风味文字: They don't call them dedicated for nothing.
中文风味文字: 他们被称为专属不是没有原因。

英文文本: [subroutine] Trace[0]. If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.
中文文本: [subroutine] <trace>追踪 0</trace> 如果成功，潜袭者销毁一个程序。
英文风味文字: "If I had to describe the bugs in one word, it would be '****ing annoying.'" -Whizzard
中文风味文字: “如果非要我用一个词描述这虫子，那将是'他X的烦人'。” —魔术师

英文文本: If you have at least 7[credit] when you score Corporate War, gain 7[credit]; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.
中文文本: 如果当你用公司大战计分时，你具有至少7[credit]，获得7[credit]；否则，失去你信用池中所有的信用点。
英文风味文字: There were several ways to win a corporate war. One of them was to bring out the bazookas.
中文风味文字: 有许多方法可以赢得公司大战。其中一种是拿出火箭炮。

英文文本: Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
中文文本: 你的手牌上限等于你信用池中信用点的数量。
英文风味文字: The densest information cluster in the galaxy.
中文风味文字: 银河系中最密集的信息群。

中文名称: 生命定制所: 专为成功设定
英文文本: You cannot include Jinteki cards in this deck.
中文文本: 你在本牌组中不能包含[jinteki]卡牌。
英文风味文字: The Once and Future Android.
中文风味文字: 永恒不变的安卓。

中文名称: 次级方案: 守卫网络
英文文本: Before taking your first turn, you may install up to 3 pieces of ice, with no more than a single piece of ice per server. Draw until you have 5 cards in HQ.
中文文本: 在你开始第一个回合前，你可以安装最多三层防火墙，其中每台服务器的防火墙不多于一层。你将总部补到五张卡牌。

英文文本:
When you score this agenda, you may create a new remote server by installing up to 3 cards from HQ and/or Archives in the root of and/or protecting that server, ignoring all install costs.
Limit 1 per deck.
中文文本:
当你用总裁哈斯的宠儿计划计分时，你可以建立一台新的远程服务器，从总部和/或档案库安装最多三张卡牌（每次一张）到该服务器内和/或保护该服务器，忽略所有的安装费用。
每套牌组限制1张。

英文文本: Place 3 agenda counters on Efficiency Committee when you score it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain [click][click]. You cannot advance cards for the remainder of this turn.
中文文本: 当你用效率委员会计分时，放置3枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 [click], 所附载的议案指示物: 获得[click][click]。本回合的剩余时间内你不能推进卡牌。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 3 agenda counters on it. Hosted agenda counter: The rezzed piece of bioroid ice the Runner is approaching gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
中文文本: 当你用奥丁计划计分时，放置3枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物: 选择当前被接驳的一层已激活的生化人防火墙。本次潜袭的剩余时间内，该防火墙在其它所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。”

英文文本: Whenever the Runner suffers at least 1 core damage, do 1 net damage.
中文文本: 每当潜袭者受到至少1点脑部伤害时，造成1点网域伤害。
英文风味文字: "Why limit our best assets to our own servers? The enemy doesn't stay passively at home, waiting for us to come to him. Why should we?" -Director Haas
中文风味文字: “为何要把我们最好的资产局限在我们自己的服务器上？敌人可不会被动地呆在家，等着我们去找他。我们何必呢？” —总裁哈斯

英文文本:
Place 1 power counter on Alix T4LB07 whenever you install a card.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on Alix T4LB07.
中文文本:
每当你安装一张卡牌时，放置1枚能量指示物到阿历克斯T4LB07上。
[click], [trash]: 阿历克斯T4LB07上每有1枚能量指示物，获得2[credit]。
英文风味文字: The Alix model was based on a successful hedge fund manager but she had a tendency to burn out. Literally.
中文风味文字: 阿历克斯模型基于一位成功的对冲基金经理，但她有燃尽的倾向。字面意思。

英文文本:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3[credit] to do X core damage. X is equal to the number of hosted advancement counters.
中文文本:
你可以推进本资产。
当潜袭者读取已安装的本资产时，你可以花费3[credit]，以造成X点核心伤害。X等于所附载的推进指示物的数量。

英文文本:
You get +1 allotted [click] for each of your turns.
When this asset is trashed from anywhere while being accessed, add it to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
中文文本:
你在你的回合有一个额外的[click]用来花费。
如果总裁哈斯在读取时被销毁，将她加入潜袭者的分数区，作为一个价值2点议案分数的议案。
<errata>勘误自FAQ 3.1</errata>

中文名称: 哈斯生态屋型人工智能
英文文本: You can advance this asset if it is unrezzed. Once per turn → [click], hosted advancement counter: Gain [click][click].
中文文本: 未激活的哈斯生态屋型人工智能才能被推进。 [click], 所附载的推进标记: 获得[click][click]。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。

英文文本:
Thomas Haas can be advanced.
[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each advancement token on Thomas Haas.
中文文本:
托马斯·哈斯能被推进。
[trash]: 托马斯·哈斯上每有1枚推进标记，获得2[credit]。
英文风味文字: Thomas, the director's son, has been carefully groomed to inherit the corporation since before he was born. His favorite pastime appears to be disappointing his mother.
中文风味文字: 托马斯，总裁的儿子，从他出生前就被精心培养以备继承公司。而他最中意的消遣似乎就是让他母亲失望。

英文文本: Rez a piece of bioroid ice, ignoring all costs, and install Bioroid Efficiency Research on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash Bioroid Efficiency Research and derez host ice if all of its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."
中文文本: 激活一层生化人防火墙，忽略所有的费用，并将生化人效率研究安装到该防火墙上，作为所附载的状态指示物，规则文字为“在一次遭遇中，如果被附载的防火墙上的所有子进程被破解，销毁生化人效率研究并关闭被附载的防火墙。”

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner made an unsuccessful run during their last turn.
Gain 7[credit].
中文文本:
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合进行过失败的潜袭，才能打出。
获得7[credit]。
英文风味文字: Success is defined by the safety of data, not the safety of potential intruders.
中文风味文字: 成功是由数据安全来定义的，而非潜在入侵者的安全。

英文文本: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage and end the run. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解海姆达尔2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点脑部伤害并终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: The realm beyond is still forbidden.
中文风味文字: 至高的国度依然禁止通行。
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 屏障 - 生化人

英文文本: [subroutine] You may install and rez a piece of bioroid ice from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs, placing it directly behind Howler. If you do, derez that piece of ice and trash Howler after the run is completed.
中文文本: [subroutine] 你可以从总部或档案库安装并激活一层生化人防火墙，忽略所有的费用，将其直接放置在嚎叫者的后方。如果你如此做，在本次潜袭完成后，关闭该防火墙并销毁嚎叫者。
英文风味文字: "Yeah. It made a loud noise, I got scared, and I jacked out. I still think I made the right decision." -g00ru
中文风味文字: “没错，它发出巨大的吼声。我被吓到了，然后退出。我依然觉得我做了正确的决定。” —精神0袖

英文文本: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 core damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
中文文本:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解女座头市2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
[subroutine] 销毁一个程序。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 3</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记并造成1点脑部伤害。
英文风味文字: The game has changed.
中文风味文字: 游戏变了。
中文子类型: 生化人 - 毁灭者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: [subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting this server, ignoring the install cost.
中文文本: [subroutine] 你可以从总部安装一层防火墙作为保护本服务器的最外层防火墙，忽略所有的安装费用。
英文风味文字: Sometimes you just have to guess.
中文风味文字: 有时候你就得猜。

英文文本: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Hosted power counter: Do 1 core damage. [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解维克托2.0上最多2个子进程。 所附载的能量指示物: 造成1点脑部伤害。 [subroutine] 追踪 2 如果成功，放置1枚能量指示物到维克托2.0上。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 生化人 - 门禁 - 追踪者

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 core damage. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 core damage.
中文文本:
潜袭者能花费[click]，以破解劫1.0上的任一子进程。
[subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，如果潜袭者花费过至少一个[click]来破解子进程，造成1点脑部伤害。
[subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，如果潜袭者花费过至少一个[click]来破解子进程，造成1点脑部伤害。
英文风味文字: A mind of meat! How does it work?
中文风味文字: 血肉组成的头脑！它是怎么运作的？
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 生化人 - 警报

英文文本: Awakening Center can host bioroid ice (each piece is installed facedown, ignoring all install costs). Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez a piece of ice on Awakening Center, lowering the rez cost by 7[credit], to force the Runner to encounter it. Trash that ice after the run is completed.
中文文本: 觉醒的中枢能被附载生化人防火墙（每层防火墙牌面朝下安装，忽略所有的安装费用）。 每当潜袭者通过保护本服务器的所有防火墙时，你可以激活觉醒的中枢上的一层防火墙，其激活费用减7[credit]，以迫使潜袭者遭遇它。在本次潜袭完成后，销毁该防火墙。

英文文本: [interrupt] → When a subroutine would be broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server, you may rez this upgrade. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent 1 subroutine from being broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server.
中文文本: 如果潜袭者将要破解保护本服务器的生化人防火墙上的一个子进程，你可以激活提尔之手。 [trash]: 防止保护本服务器的生化人防火墙上的一个子进程被破解。

英文文本: [click], [click]: Gain 3[credit].
中文文本: [click], [click]: 获得3[credit]。
英文风味文字: Sell the dream-show them how very much they want to be rich, and they'll convince themselves that someday, they will be. How can they revolt against their future selves? -the New Gospel of Wealth
中文风味文字: 推销梦想—向他们展示他们多么想变得富有，于是他们就会说服自己总有一天，梦想会成真。他们怎么会厌恶将来的自己呢？ —《财富之新福音书》

英文文本: [click], 1[credit]: Search R&D for a piece of ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
中文文本: [click], 1[credit]: 在研发中心搜寻一层防火墙，将其展示，并加入总部。将研发中心重洗。
英文风味文字: "Just another factory, making good corporate drones for the machine. Their CS department is the best in the world, though." -g00ru
中文风味文字: “又一个工厂，为机器制造出良好的公司苦力。虽然，他们的计算机科学系是世界上最好的。” —精神0袖

英文文本:
Gain 2[credit] when your turn begins.
Trash Server Diagnostics when you install a piece of ice.
中文文本:
当你的回合开始时，获得2[credit]。
当你安装一层防火墙时，销毁服务器诊断学。
英文风味文字: "There's only a 5% chance this could result in a general failure."
中文风味文字: “这只有5%的几率会导致通用故障。”

英文文本: [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: The principle behind ice is not to keep everyone out, but to let only some people in. This ice denies entry on all but a select few ports that might change with the time of day or picosecond of connection. If you don't know what port to use, you're not getting in. Period.
中文风味文字: 防火墙的基本原则不是挡住所有人，而是只让一些人进来。这个防火墙隔绝了一切，除了一些特定的、会随着一天的时刻或皮秒间的连接而变换的接口。如果你不知道使用哪个接口，你就不能进入。完毕。

英文文本:
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit], if able. If the Runner cannot pay 2[credit], end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 如可能，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。如果潜袭者不能支付2[credit]，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "Cheap, off-the-shelf data protection. Cheap for them, that is. Not for us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
中文风味文字: “廉价而现成的数据保护方法。廉价是相对他们而言，就是说，并不是对我们。” —艾丽·“浓烟”·斯科娃

中文名称: 芮尔·“姬特”·佩德拉: 超凡入圣
英文文本: The first time each turn you encounter a piece of ice, it gains code gate for the remainder of this run.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，该防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内获得门禁。
英文风味文字: "I was not; I was; I am not; I am all."
中文风味文字: “我不曾存在；我曾存在；我不再存在；我即存在。”

英文文本: The first copy of each program in this deck does not count against your influence limit.
中文文本: 本牌组中每个程序的第一张不计算在你的影响力上限中。
英文风味文字: "New technology destroys the old."
中文风味文字: “新技术淘汰旧技术。”

英文文本: Whenever you install a program from your heap, draw 1 card.
中文文本: 每当你从你的堆阵安装一个程序时，补一张卡牌。
英文风味文字: "I can make that work."
中文风味文字: “我可以解决。”

英文文本: Run HQ. If successful, instead of breaching HQ, rearrange any number of ice protecting all servers. (Do not rez or derez any ice or change the number of ice protecting any server.)
中文文本: 对总部进行一次潜袭。如果成功，重新排列保护所有服务器的任意数量的防火墙（不能激活或关闭防火墙），代替读取卡牌。重新排列后，保护每台服务器的防火墙数量必须与之前的相同。

英文文本: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, remove up to 3 advancement counters from 1 card in the root of or protecting the attacked server.
中文文本: 进行一次潜袭。如果成功，从被攻击服务器内或保护被攻击服务器的一张卡牌上移除最多3枚推进标记，代替读取卡牌。
英文风味文字: Wheeeee!
中文风味文字: 喂哦～～！

英文文本: Trash up to 5 programs from your grip. Gain 2[credit] for each program trashed.
中文文本: 从你的操控器销毁最多五个程序。每销毁一个程序，获得2[credit]。
英文风味文字: "Idealism's great, but it don't keep you in soybeef tacos." -Matt "TheMerc" Thomas
中文风味文字: “理想本身很棒，但不能让你一直有烧牛肉炸玉米卷。” —马特·“佣兵”·托马斯

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed program.
 Install 1 program from your grip or heap, paying X[credit] less. X is equal to the install cost of the program you trashed.
中文文本:
作为打出本卡牌的额外费用，销毁一个已安装的程序。
从你的操控器或堆阵安装一个程序，该程序的安装费用减少和所销毁程序的安装费用相等的费用。
英文风味文字: One man's trash.
中文风味文字: 彼之所弃。

英文文本: Shuffle your grip and heap into your stack. Draw 5 cards. Remove Levy AR Lab Access from the game instead of trashing it.
中文文本: 将你的操控器和堆阵洗入你的存储栈。补五张卡牌。将接入利维前景实验室移出游戏，代替销毁它。
英文风味文字: Spend too much time in the AR Lab and someone might notice. Unless you're the head of it, that is.
中文风味文字: 在前景实验室呆太久会引人注意。就是说，除非你是主任。

英文文本: +3[mu] When you install this hardware, install up to 3 programs from your grip, paying 4[credit] less for each. [interrupt] → Trash 1 program from your grip: Prevent 1 core damage or 1 net damage. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +3[mu] 当你安装巨岩时，从你的操控器安装最多三个程序，每个程序的安装费用减4[credit]。 从你的操控器销毁一个程序: 防止1点脑部伤害或网域伤害。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

英文文本: [interrupt] → 3[credit]: Prevent 1 net damage. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent up to 2 core damage.
中文文本:
3[credit]: 防止1点网域伤害。
[trash]: 防止最多2点脑部伤害。
英文风味文字: It still hurts, a bit, the first time. The second time, you feel nothing at all. But don't push your luck.
中文风味文字: 第一次，还是会有些疼。第二次，你会毫无感觉。不过别再碰运气。

英文文本: [trash]: Install a program from your heap (paying the install cost).
中文文本: [trash]: 从你的堆阵安装一个程序（支付安装费用）。
英文风味文字: It is good practice to backup the backup.
中文风味文字: 给备份做备份是个好习惯。

英文文本:
Omni-drive can host a single program of 1[mu] or less. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit.
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to pay for using the hosted program.
中文文本:
全能驱动器能被附载一个等于或小于1[mu]的程序。所附载的程序的内存费用不计算在你的内存上限中。
1[recurring-credit]
本信用点用于支付使用所附载的程序。

英文文本: When you install this program, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
中文文本: 当你安装本程序时，你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚能量指示物到本程序上。 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本程序的强度+1，且本程序只能与强度与其相等的防火墙对接。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条子进程。
英文风味文字: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.
中文风味文字: 我们的想法塑造我们；我们变成我们的想法。

英文文本: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
中文文本: 1[recurring-credit] 本信用点用于支付使用破解器。
英文风味文字: "No line that they lay could catch a shadow on the wall…"
中文风味文字: “它们设下的丝线，无法捕捉墙上的暗影…”

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +5 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
中文文本: 1[credit]: 破解警报子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+5。仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用本能力。
英文风味文字: "…and once the shadow rises, the curtain shall fall." -revenant
中文风味文字: “…而当暗影升起，则帷幕将落。” —亡魂

英文文本:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Chakana.
If there are at least 3 virus counters on Chakana, the advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.
中文文本:
每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚病毒指示物到印加十字符上。
如果印加十字符具有至少3枚病毒指示物，所有议案的推进需求+1。

英文文本: When you install this program, choose a server. Use this program only during runs on the chosen server. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 1[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 当你安装赛博密码集时，选择一台服务器。赛博密码集仅能在对所选择服务器的潜袭中使用。

英文文本: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs of assets.
中文文本: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付资产的销毁费用。
英文风味文字: Perfect for flooding servers.
中文风味文字: 淹没服务器的完美之选。

英文文本: 2[credit], [trash]: Search your stack for 1 program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)
中文文本: 2[credit]，[trash]: 在你的存储栈中搜寻1个程序。安装之。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）
英文风味文字: "Make sure you tell the source code which executable you want it to compile into. One time I left my rig for a couple of minutes, and when I came back all of my files had been replaced with cat vids." -The Professor
中文风味文字: “确保你跟源代码交代过，你希望它编译成怎样的可执行文件。有次我离开设备几分钟，回来时所有文件已被替换成了小猫的视频。” —教授

英文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to install programs (you cannot use Sahasrara to install a program that trashes Sahasrara).
中文文本:
2[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于安装程序（你不能使用头顶轮来安装一个会销毁头顶轮的程序）。
英文风味文字: Out there, the thousand-petaled lotus symbolizes detachment from illusion. In here, it is the birthplace of a higher consciousness. Something infinitely pure.
中文风味文字: 在那里，千叶莲花象征超脱幻象。在这里，它是更高阶意识的起源地。它是无限纯净。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
中文文本: 1[credit]: 破解屏障子进程。 2[credit]: 本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度+1。
英文风味文字: "The Incans believed that the sun god resided in the Haman Pacha, the upper realm of the cosmos. They just didn't know that the Haman Pacha hadn't been discovered yet." -The Professor
中文风味文字: “印加人相信太阳神居住在哈南帕查，宇宙中的上层国度。他们只是不知道哈南帕查尚未被发现。” —教授

英文文本: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
中文文本: [click]: 获得1[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Sometimes it doesn't matter how expensive your rig is, or how many credits are in your account, or even your skill as a runner. Most of the time, a simple handshake and a name are all you need.
中文风味文字: 有时你的装备如何昂贵，你的账户中如何有钱，甚至你作为潜袭者的技能如何都不重要。通常，你只需简单地握个手，报上大名。

英文文本:
+1[link]
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
中文文本:
+1[link]
你的手牌上限+1。
英文风味文字: Some people have their own satellite receiver. Others have their own satellite.
中文风味文字: 有些人有他们自己的卫星接收器。还有些有他们自己的卫星。

英文文本:
Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, place 1[credit] on Ice Analyzer.
You may use credits on Ice Analyzer to install programs.
英文风味文字: "If you know the source code you can write to beat it, or just rejigger it a little and make it yours. That works, too." -Exile
中文风味文字: “如果你了解源代码，你可以编码并击败它，或者通过微调来变为己用。这也是可行的。” —流亡者

英文文本: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was successful, gain 5[credit].
中文文本: 潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭成功，获得5[credit]。
英文风味文字: The data was better than she could have ever imagined. This Santiago fellow really knew what he was doing. She began to imagine the havoc she could wreak at the upcoming charity dinner…
中文风味文字: 数据比她想的还要好。这个叫圣地亚哥的家伙果然明白怎么做。她开始想象自己在接下来的慈善晚宴上的大肆破坏…

英文文本:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this resource.
中文文本:
当你安装本资源时，填装8[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取2[credit]。
