Gain 10[credit]. The Corp gains 5[credit]. You cannot make any runs this turn.
中文文本:
仅能在你的第一个[click]，并且如果公司在他/她的上回合没有用议案计分过，才能打出。
获得10[credit]。公司获得5[credit]。本回合你不能发起任何潜袭。

英文文本: Place 1 agenda counter on Sensor Net Activation when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Rez a bioroid, ignoring all costs. When the turn ends, derez that bioroid.
中文文本: 当你用传感网激活计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本卡牌上。 所附载的议案指示物: 激活一个生化人，忽略所有的费用。当本回合结束时，关闭该生化人。

英文文本:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 8[credit] and draw 4 cards.
中文文本:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
获得8[credit]并补四张卡牌。
英文风味文字: It required a hexadecimal code along with biometrics, delivered by way of BMI.
中文风味文字: 它要求提供一段十六进制的代码以及生物特征，并通过脑机接口来传送。

英文文本: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Chiyashi while there is an AI installed, trash the top 2 cards of the Runner's stack. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] Do 2 net damage. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 每当潜袭者破解阿依努寨上的一个子进程时，如果有一个已安装的智能模块，销毁潜袭者存储栈顶端的两张卡牌。 [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 造成2点网域伤害。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "Ice is not meant to kill; just slow or cripple the Runner. Killing is my job." - Tori Hanzō
中文风味文字: “防火墙不是用来杀人的；让潜袭者变慢或变弱就行了。杀人是我的工作。” —半藏冬莉

英文文本:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Look at the top 5 cards of R&D. If any of those cards are agendas, assets, or upgrades, you may install 1 of those cards in a remote server.
中文文本:
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
查看研发中心顶端的五张卡牌。如果其中有任何议案，资产或升级，你可以安装其中一张卡牌到一台远程服务器内。

英文文本: For the first trace each turn, the Runner's [link] is treated as 0. (They can still increase their link strength by spending credits.) Whenever the Runner spends credits to increase their link strength, gain 1[credit] for every 2[credit] they spent.
中文文本:
在每回合的第一次追踪中，潜袭者的基础中转强度减少至0。
每当潜袭者通过花费信用点来增加他/她的中转强度时，其每花费2[credit]，获得1[credit]。

英文文本:
While the Runner is accessing this ice in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this ice anywhere except in Archives, they encounter it.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] You may pay up to 2[credit] to place that many advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
中文文本:
如果使者从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取使者时，他/她遭遇它。如果潜袭者从档案库读取使者，则忽略本能力。
[subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 公司可以支付最多2[credit]，以放置与其数量相等的推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。

英文文本:
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 公司获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字: The truth hurts.
中文风味文字: 真理伤人。

英文文本: While the Runner has fewer than 6[credit], Bryan Stinson gains "[click]: Play a transaction operation from Archives, ignoring all costs. Remove that transaction from the game instead of trashing it."
中文文本: 当潜袭者具有少于6[credit]时，布莱恩·斯廷森获得“[click]: 从档案库打出一个交易事务，忽略所有的费用。将该交易移出游戏，代替销毁它。”
英文风味文字: "My job? I provide legal exculpation and sign everything. It pays very well."
中文风味文字: “我的工作？提供法律开脱服务，签署各种文件。待遇可好了。”

英文文本:
Gain 1[credit] when your turn begins.
Whenever you gain credits through a card ability other than from NASX, you may spend up to 2[credit] to place that many power counters on NASX.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on NASX.
中文文本:
当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
每当你通过新洛杉矶证交所以外的卡牌能力获得信用点时，你可以花费最多2[credit]以放置与花费数量相等的能量指示物到本卡牌上。
[click], [trash]: 新洛杉矶证交所上每有1枚能量指示物，获得2[credit]。

英文文本: [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, purge virus counters. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 virus. [subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, remove a virus in the heap from the game. [subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, end the run.
中文文本: [subroutine] 追踪 4 如果成功，清除病毒指示物。 [subroutine] 追踪 3 如果成功，销毁一个病毒。 [subroutine] 追踪 2 如果成功，将堆阵中的一个病毒移出游戏。 [subroutine] 追踪 1 如果成功，终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: One way to get rid of a virus is to get a nastier virus.
中文风味文字: 除掉病毒的一个办法是引入更恶劣的病毒。

英文文本:
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 of their installed cards.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者销毁一张他/她已安装的卡牌。
英文风味文字:
"Guilty."
"Guilty."
"Guilty."
中文风味文字:
“有罪。”
“有罪。”
“有罪。”

英文文本: Make a run. If you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip, each installed icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the run.
中文文本: 进行一次潜袭。如果你的操控器中有两张或更少的卡牌，每个已安装的破解器的强度+2，直到本次潜袭结束。
英文风味文字: "Hitting them when they are weakest sometimes means acting before you want to." -Alice Merchant
中文风味文字: “在对手最弱的时候袭击，有时意味着在你想出手之前就行动。” —爱丽丝·默切特

英文文本: +2[mu] The first time each turn you access a card not in Archives and do not steal or trash it, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +2[mu] 每回合你第一次读取一张不在档案库中的卡牌，并且没有窃取或销毁它时，公司必须从总部随机销毁一张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。

英文文本: +1[link] Whenever the Corp scores an initiative or security agenda, force the Corp to "Trace[1]. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity."
中文文本: +1[link] 每当公司用一个原创或防卫议案计分时，迫使公司“追踪 1 如果失败，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。”
英文风味文字: The Archivist tracks all the clans and their members, and official dealings clans have with the various corps. Half law clerk and half historian, he wields a tremendous amount of power doing a job no one else wants, but none can do without.
中文风味文字: 档案员追踪着所有部落及其成员，包括部落与不同公司进行的正式交易。作为法律职员与历史学家的结合，他行使着强大的权力，来做这份其他人都不愿做，但却不可或缺的工作。

英文文本:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Derez up to 3 pieces of ice.
中文文本:
如果你本回合已对研发中心、总部和档案库均进行过成功的潜袭，才能打出。
关闭最多三层防火墙。
英文风味文字:
1) Find the weakness.
2) Exploit the weakness.
3) Repeat.
中文风味文字:
1) 找出弱点。
2) 利用弱点。
3) 再来一遍。

英文文本: Expose 1 non-ice card, then make a run.
中文文本: 揭示一张非防火墙卡牌，然后进行一次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "So, yeah, I just reverse engineered a tracer, and then built it back up with some new lines of code. Pretty stellar." -Los
中文风味文字: “所以，没错，我只是反向制造了一个追踪者，构建好然后将这几行新代码装回去。真是精彩。” —洛斯

英文文本: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent all but 1 net damage.
中文文本: [trash]: 防止除1点以外的其余所有网域伤害。
英文风味文字: "You created a distributed AI replica of yourself and projected it into the network to run for you!?"
中文风味文字: “你创建了一个分布式人工智能作为自己的复制品，然后投到网上，让它为你潜袭？！”

英文文本: The install cost of each piece of ice that is not installed in the innermost position is increased by 1.
中文文本: 除安装在最内层位置以外的每层防火墙的安装费用+1。
英文风味文字: "To beat cautious sysops, you've got to get creative. Commandeering Network systems is like using their own strengths against them." -Kabonesa Wu
中文风味文字: “要击败谨慎的管理员，你得有创意。抢占网络系统就好比用他们自己的力量来对付他们。” —卡波尼萨·吴

英文文本: Make a run. When this run ends, add Mad Dash to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point if you stole at least 1 agenda during the run; otherwise, suffer 1 meat damage.
中文文本: 进行一次潜袭。当本次潜袭结束时，如果你在本次潜袭中窃取了至少一个议案，将疯狂冲刺加入你的分数区，作为一个价值1点议案分数的议案；否则，受到1点肢体伤害。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, if there is a rezzed piece of NEXT ice, you may do 1 core damage.
中文文本: 如果当你用次级续作计分时，有一层已激活的次级防火墙，你可以造成1点脑部伤害。
英文风味文字: "The newest electronic-warfare rollout from NEXT Design has us sysops drooling." -Mason Bellamy
中文风味文字: “次级方案最新作品的电子战首秀让我们这些管理员垂涎欲滴。” —梅森·贝拉米

英文文本: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed piece of hardware. [subroutine] If the Runner has lost [click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 2 core damage.
中文文本:
潜袭者能花费[click][click]，以破解劫2.0上最多2个子进程。
[subroutine] 销毁一个硬件。
[subroutine] 销毁一个硬件。
[subroutine] 在本次潜袭中，如果潜袭者花费过至少一个[click]来破解子进程，造成2点脑部伤害。
英文风味文字: "Dismantle. Dissect. Is there really a difference?"
中文风味文字: “拆卸机器。解剖机体。有什么区别吗？”
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 生化人 - 毁灭者 - 警报

英文文本:
Defense Construct can be advanced.
[trash]: Add 1 facedown card from Archives to HQ for each advancement token on Defense Construct. Use this ability only during a run on Archives.
中文文本:
防御结构体能被推进。
[trash]: 防御结构体上每有1枚推进标记，将一张面朝下的卡牌从档案库加入总部。仅能在对档案库的潜袭中使用本能力。

英文文本: The first time a subroutine on a piece of AP ice is broken each turn, do 1 net damage.
中文文本: 每回合第一次一层杀伤防火墙上的子进程被破解时，造成1点网域伤害。

英文文本:
When the Runner passes Kakugo, do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
当潜袭者通过觉悟时，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "The ultimate aim of martial arts is not having to use them." - Miyamoto Musashi
中文风味文字: “武艺的奥义之极是无需动用。” —宫本武藏

英文文本: Whenever the Runner avoids or removes 1 or more tags, you may draw 1 card.
中文文本: 每当潜袭者避免或移除1枚或更多的锁定标记时，你可以补一张卡牌。

英文文本:
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, whenever the Runner breaches a server for the remainder of this run, they access 1 fewer card.
中文文本:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 4</trace> 如果成功，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪 2</trace> 如果成功，每当潜袭者读取卡牌时，他/她减少读取一张。
英文风味文字: "'What does BRE stand for?' Have you seen its Net presence?" -Bernice Mai
中文风味文字: “'BRE是什么的缩写？'你见过它的网络形态吗？” —柏妮丝·麦

中文名称: 杰米森航天: 舍己 无畏 求胜
英文文本: Whenever you forfeit an agenda, place X advancement counters on 1 installed card. X is equal to the agenda point value of the forfeited agenda plus 1.
中文文本: 每当你废除一个议案时，放置1枚推进标记到一张卡牌上，并且该议案每价值1点议案分数，放置1枚额外的推进标记。

英文文本: Forfeit an agenda: Rez up to 3 pieces of ice, lowering the cost of each by 2[credit] for each printed agenda point on the forfeited agenda.
中文文本: 废除一个议案: 激活最多三层防火墙，被废除的议案每价值1点印刷议案分数，每层防火墙的激活费用减2。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to rez this upgrade, forfeit 1 agenda.
The first time each turn you advance a card in the root of or protecting this server, place 1 more advancement counter on that card.
中文文本:
作为激活奥伯特协议的额外费用，废除一个议案。
每回合你第一次推进本服务器内或保护本服务器的一张卡牌时，放置1枚额外的推进标记到该卡牌上。

英文文本:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez ice protecting this server. X is the number of remote servers.
中文文本:
X[recurring-credit]
这些信用点用于激活保护本服务器的防火墙。X等于远程服务器的数量。
英文风味文字: Senate staffers and clerks of the MCA can be seen thronging Khondi Plaza during break times.
中文风味文字: 你会看到火殖地当局的参议院职员与文员在休息时间涌向孔迪广场。

英文文本: [trash]: Cards cannot be installed until the end of the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
中文文本: [trash]: 所有卡牌不能被安装，直到本次潜袭结束。仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用本能力。

英文文本: [click]: Trash 2 or more cards from your grip. Run HQ or R&D. Whenever you breach that server during this run, access 1 additional card for every 2 cards you trashed.
英文风味文字: "Sure, the implantation was fine, but it pumps Burn. Did you think it wouldn't hurt?"

英文文本:
Whenever you suffer any amount of damage, place 1 power counter on Clan Vengeance.
[trash]: Trash 1 card from HQ at random for each power counter on Clan Vengeance.
中文文本:
每当你受到任意数量的伤害时，放置1枚能量指示物到部落复仇上。
[trash]: 部落复仇上每有1枚能量指示物，从总部随机销毁一张卡牌。
英文风味文字: "An eye for an eye? If you're lucky, that's all you'll lose."
中文风味文字: “以眼还眼？如果只失去这么点，算你好运。”

英文文本: [click], [trash]: Run any server. If successful, instead of breaching the attacked server, pay X[credit] if able, where X is equal to the number of tags you have. If you do, choose a number less than or equal to X. Access that many cards in and/or in the root of the attacked server. (If you cannot pay, you will not access anything.)
中文文本: [click], [trash]: 进行一次潜袭。如果成功，如可能，支付X[credit]以从本服务器读取最多X张卡牌，代替读取卡牌。X等于你所具有的锁定标记数量。
英文风味文字: "Who watches the watchers? We do."
中文风味文字: “谁来监视监视者？我们。”

英文文本: Make a run on R&D. If successful, you may make another run on R&D when this run ends. If the second run is successful, gain 4[credit].
The first time the Corp rezzes a piece of ice each turn, gain 2[credit].
中文文本: 每回合公司第一次激活一层防火墙时，获得2[credit]。
英文风味文字: "From code to profit in three easy steps."
中文风味文字: “从代码到收益只需简单三步。”

英文文本: This event is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. [interrupt] → The first time each turn you would increase the strength of an icebreaker, for the remainder of the run that icebreaker gains "Abilities that increase this program's strength last for the remainder of the run (instead of any shorter duration)."

When you install Customized Secretary reveal the top 5 cards of the stack. You may host any number of revealed programs from your stack on it. Shuffle your stack.
[click]: Install a hosted program, paying all install costs.
Gain 1[credit] and draw 2 cards.
英文风味文字: Sometimes efficiency is as easy as offloading routine work to a dedicated handler.

英文文本:
Seidr Adaptive Barrier has +1 strength for each piece of ice protecting this server.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
每有一层保护本服务器的防火墙，西德尔适应型屏障的强度+1。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。

英文文本: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. You may draw 1 card. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage. You may draw 1 card.
英文风味文字: "Submit."
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 生化人 - 门禁

英文文本: When the Runner's next turn begins, they lose [click].
英文风味文字: "Trust me, most corps cannot match the performance of our brainmap enhanced system; a home-brewed rig doesn't stand a chance." - Rachel Giacomin

英文文本:
[subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ protecting another server, ignoring all costs.
[subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs.

As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Add one of your installed cards to HQ. Install 2 cards from HQ, ignoring all costs.
中文文本:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
将一张你已安装的卡牌加入总部。从总部安装两张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。

英文文本: The first time the Runner spends [click] to gain 1[credit] each turn (not through a card effect), gain 1[credit].
英文风味文字: "The customer pays to use our service, and then the advertisers pay us to put ads on their screens, and then the customers pay us a premium to remove the ads. Welcome to the dream."

英文文本: Hosted power counter: The Runner loses 1[credit]. [subroutine] Place 1 power counter on Free Lunch. [subroutine] Place 1 power counter on Free Lunch.

After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Host this operation on an installed connection resource as a condition counter with "The Runner is considered to have 1 additional tag. Host resource gains '[click], 2[credit]: Trash this resource.'"
When your turn begins, the Runner must pay 1[credit] or trash the top card of the stack.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，潜袭者必须支付1[credit]或销毁存储栈顶端的一张卡牌。
英文风味文字: "You have two choices: do what I asked, or make me ask again. It's your choice, but if I have to ask again, it will go badly for you."
中文风味文字: “你有两个选择：按我的要求做，或者让我再提要求。随便你选哪个，只是如果要让我再提要求，你可就不好过了。”

英文文本: [subroutine] Search R&D for a card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit an agenda.
Remove 1 bad publicity per agenda point that the forfeited agenda was worth. Gain 1[credit] for each bad publicity removed.

The strength of Self-Adapting Code Wall cannot be lowered.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
自适应代码墙的强度不能被降低。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "All my best tricks were shrugged right off. I ended up having to send a self-destruct code to the whole server." - Wyvern
中文风味文字: “我的绝招当时就全废了。最后我不得不向整台服务器发送了自毁代码。” —翼龙

英文文本: Whenever you encounter a barrier, for the remainder of that encounter this program gets +1 strength for each subroutine on that barrier. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines.

Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever you pass a sentry after encountering it, you may trash the top card of your stack. If you do, trash 1 card from the top of R&D for each subroutine on that sentry that resolved during that encounter.
中文文本: 2[credit]: 破解警报子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 每当你通过一个警报时，你可以销毁存储栈顶端的一张卡牌，以从研发中心顶端销毁卡牌，该警报上每有一个子进程被结算，销毁一张卡牌。

英文文本: Once per turn → [click], X[credit]: Derez 1 piece of ice with a printed rez cost of X[credit] that was rezzed this turn.
英文风味文字: "Even I don't know how or why this one works. I just copied the schematics from a burst broadcast from someplace north of Paxton's Node, where nothing is supposed to be." -Los

英文文本: Whenever you access a card with a trash cost not in Archives and do not trash it, you may reveal it and gain 1[credit].

[click], remove an installed program from the game: Search your stack for a non-virus program, shuffle your stack, then install that program, lowering the install cost by the cost of the program removed from the game.
Install only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker gains AI and "Interface → Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine."
中文文本: 将调整矩阵安装到一个破解器上。被附载的破解器获得智能模块和“[click]: 破解防火墙子进程。”
英文风味文字: "Who said you can't teach an old breaker new tricks?" -g00ru
中文风味文字: “谁说你不能把新伎俩教给老破解器？” —精神0袖

英文文本: Install Dedicated Processor on a non-AI icebreaker. Host icebreaker gains "2[credit]: +4 strength."
英文风味文字: Better, Faster, Stronger

英文文本: The first time each turn you pass a piece of ice after an encounter during which this program fully broke that ice, you may swap it with another installed piece of ice. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次通过一层你使用反写诗器破解其所有子进程的防火墙时，你可以将该防火墙与另一层防火墙互换。 1[credit]: 破解门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。

英文文本:
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have fewer than 6[credit].
Whenever you have 0[credit], trash Dadiana Chacon and take 3 meat damage.
英文风味文字: "You want untraceable funds? I'll lend, as long as you have the ability to pay me back."

英文文本: This ice gains "[subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
英文风味文字: "I passed through the opalescent curtain only to find a suddenly empty server..."
中文子类型: 门禁 - 次级 - 观察者

英文文本: [trash]: Install 1 card from HQ. Use this ability only during the next paid ability window after playing and resolving an operation.
英文风味文字: "They don't need sleep, breaks, overtime, or even O₂. How can we compete with that!?"

英文名称: AgInfusion: New Miracles for a New World
中文名称: 灌注农业: 新世界的新奇迹
英文文本: Once per turn → Trash the unrezzed piece of ice the Runner is approaching: Choose a server other than the attacked server. The Runner moves to the outermost position of that server and encounters any ice there.
中文文本: 每回合一次，你可以销毁一层被接驳的防火墙以选择另一台服务器，代替激活它。潜袭者现在开始对该服务器进行潜袭，并且如有最外层防火墙，则遭遇它。

英文文本: Install only in the root of R&D. [click]: Reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Secretly choose 1 to add to HQ. Return the others to the top of R&D, in any order. Limit 1 region per server.

Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must suffer 2 net damage. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
中文文本: 每次潜袭者从本服务器读取一个议案时，他/她必须受到2点网域伤害作为额外的费用才能窃取。即使潜袭者在本次潜袭中销毁武藏弁，本能力依然有效。

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they may take 1 tag to bypass it.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: "I'm sure there is no way this could go wrong for you." -Henry Phillips

英文文本: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine during a run on this server, gain 2[credit] if they are tagged.
英文风味文字: "Toying with them is where the job satisfaction comes in".

英文文本:
[subroutine]End the run.
[subroutine]End the run.
英文风味文字: "Our job is to stop incursions. Let Argus get cute with them." -Moishe Saban

英文文本:
Play only if there are at least 2 other cards in HQ.
Trash all cards from HQ. Place a total of 2 advancement counters on installed cards you can advance.

As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click], [click].
Move all advancement tokens from all installed cards to 1 card that can be advanced.
中文文本:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click], [click]。
从所有已安装的卡牌上转移所有的推进标记到一张能被推进的卡牌上。

英文文本: [subroutine] Add 1 installed program to the top of the stack.

中文名称: 爱丽丝·默切特: 部落煽动者
英文文本: The first time you make a successful run on Archives each turn, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次对档案库进行成功的潜袭时，公司必须从总部销毁一张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Jarogniew's agent provocateur.
中文风味文字: 雅罗涅夫的惹事人。

英文文本: When you install this resource, take 1 tag. Load X power counters onto this resource, where X is equal to the number of tags you have plus 3. When this resource is empty, trash it. The Corp cannot trash this resource while there is another resource installed. [interrupt] → Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.
中文文本: 当你安装雅罗涅夫佣兵时，拿取1枚锁定标记。放置3枚能量指示物到雅罗涅夫佣兵上，并且你每有1枚锁定标记，放置1枚额外的能量指示物。当雅罗涅夫佣兵上没有能量指示物时，销毁本卡牌。 如果有另一个已安装的资源，公司不能销毁雅罗涅夫佣兵。 所附载的能量指示物: 防止1点肢体伤害。

英文文本: +2[mu] X[recurring-credit] Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of pieces of ice protecting HQ. Limit 1 console per player.

When you install this resource, place X power counters on it.
When your turn ends, if you have no cards in your grip, draw 1 card for each hosted power counter, then trash this resource.
英文风味文字: Everything you need in case of an emergency.

英文文本: The first time you derez a piece of ice each turn, gain 2[credit].
英文风味文字: "I don't bother asking why anymore—he never says—but if I had to guess, it's because he's embezzling and using my runs to disguise it. Not that I care. His credit spends as well as the next guy's" -Moth

英文文本: +2[mu] The first time you initiate a run on a server protected by 2 or more pieces of ice each turn, draw 2 cards. Limit 1 console per player.
英文风味文字: "Taking risks is what makes it fun!" -Kabonesa Wu

英文文本: Whenever this program fully breaks a piece of ice, the first 3 subroutines of the next encounter this run do not resolve. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
Whenever the Runner trashes at least 1 card from this server, from its root, or protecting it, Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner trashes 2 of their installed cards.

When the Runner encounters this ice, choose another rezzed piece of ice. For the remainder of this run, this ice gains the subtypes of the chosen ice and gains the subroutines of that ice in order before all its other subroutines.
[subroutine] The Runner must either end the run or shuffle all cards from the grip into the stack.
As an additional cost to steal Obokata Protocol, the Runner must suffer 4 net damage.
中文文本: 作为窃取小保方协议的额外费用，潜袭者必须受到4点网域伤害。
英文风味文字: "Proper application of stress can create the most profound changes." - Tennin Institute Intern Brief
中文风味文字: “善用压力能引起最深刻的变革。” —天人学会实习指示

英文文本:
Whenever an encounter with this ice ends, if the Runner broke its printed subroutine, the Runner moves to the outermost position of Archives instead of passing this ice. They may jack out. Derez this ice.
[subroutine] You may draw 1 card. Then, shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.

Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run during their last turn.
Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card.
Once per turn → [click]: Gain 1[credit] for each tag the Runner has.
英文风味文字: "Of course words hurt." -Bex Gleeson

英文文本: When you score this agenda, add any number of cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D. Draw X cards, where X is equal to the number of cards you added to R&D this way. If the Runner has at least X cards in the grip, they add X cards from the grip to the bottom of the stack at random.
中文文本: 当你用再教育计分时，将任意数量的卡牌从总部加入研发中心底端，并补与其数量相等的卡牌。如可能，潜袭者随机将相等数量的卡牌从他/她的操控器加入存储栈底端。

英文文本: Whenever you rez a piece of ice protecting this server, Trace[2]. If successful, the Corp gains 1[credit].
英文风味文字: "It's all about M.E. Monetizing Everything." -Eryn Nielle

英文文本: When you score Meteor Mining, you may gain 7[credit]. If the Runner has at least 2 tags, you may do 7 meat damage instead.
中文文本: 当你用陨石开采计分时，你可以获得7[credit]。如果潜袭者具有至少2枚锁定标记，你可以以造成7点肢体伤害代替。
英文风味文字: "I've got a rock!" - Charles "Mad Dog" Brun, Comet Jockey
中文风味文字: “我得到了一块石头！” —查尔斯·“狂犬”·布朗，彗星骑师

英文文本: When you score this agenda, the Runner may trash 1 of their installed cards. If they do not, draw 1 card and gain 5[credit]. Otherwise, you may trash 1 of your installed cards to repeat this process.

As an additional cost to play this operation, forfeit an agenda and spend [click][click].
Advance a card X times. X equals the advancement requirement of the agenda just forfeited.
英文风味文字: The difference between surviving and thriving is successful terraforming.

英文文本: Once per turn → Trash 1 card from HQ: Add 1 card from Archives to the bottom of R&D.
中文文本: 从总部销毁一张卡牌: 将一张卡牌从档案库加入研发中心底端。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。
英文风味文字: "Whampoa is the largest and meanest Earth-based mining concern on Mars. They put bodies and waste in the ground as fast as they pull minerals out." - Alice Merchant
中文风味文字: “黄埔是火星上最大和最刻薄的矿业地企。他们用尸体与废品回填的速度和开采一样快。” —爱丽丝·默切特

英文文本: Gain 2[credit] for each card with at least 1 advancement token on it.
Play only as your first [click]. Draw 1 card for each installed clan resource. Gain 1[credit] for each tag you have.
英文风味文字: "We don't want you! We don't need you!"

If you do, you cannot access any cards in HQ during this breach. (You can still access cards in the root of HQ.) When the run ends, remove this event from the game.
Interface → 6[credit]: Derez the sentry you are encountering. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
英文风味文字: "It's my sentry cheat sheet." -Revenant

英文文本: Make a run. If you have 3 or fewer programs installed, all icebreakers have +2 strength during this run.
英文风味文字: "The question isn't 'should I do it?' the question is 'can I do it?'" -Kabonesa Wu

英文文本: This program gets +1 strength for each installed program. Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
During runs, this program gets +1 strength for each piece of ice protecting the attacked server. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +2 strength.

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may remove 1 card in the heap from the game. If you do, gain 2[credit].

"Talk is free. Anything else is going to cost you."
-Jitish

"Is the lack of oxygen causing distress, friend?"
-Gregory 3D3R6Z

When the Runner encounters this ice, they add 2 cards from the grip to the top of the stack.

After your mandatory draw, reveal the top card of R&D and add it to HQ. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.

-Mandy Traut

[subroutine] Trash 1 program.

Install Rover Algorithm on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host ice has +1 strength for each power counter on Rover Algorithm. Whenever the Runner passes host ice, place 1 power counter on Rover Algorithm."

Play only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
The Corp must pay 5[credit] or take 1 bad publicity. Remove Mining Accident from the game instead of trashing it.

When this hardware has 3 or more hosted power counters, trash it.

Swap 2 pieces of unrezzed ice.

英文文本: The first time each turn the Runner trashes a Corp card, give them 1 tag.

英文文本: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The play cost of each operation and event is increased by 1. The first time the Runner plays an event each turn, gain 1[credit].

Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag for each tag they have or, if the Runner has no tags, give them 1 tag.

中文文本: 每回合你第一次对总部进行成功的潜袭时，你可以选择你堆阵中的2张卡牌。如果你如此做，公司将其中1张卡牌移出游戏，然后你将另1张加入你的操控器。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Derez a piece of ice that has a rez cost of X or lower.

作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
关闭激活费用等于或小于X的一层防火墙。
英文风味文字: "Bypassing a system's defenses by cutting physical wires is what I like to call old school." - Steve Cambridge
中文风味文字: “靠切断实体线路来略过系统防御，我喜欢称之为老派做法。” —史蒂夫·坎布里奇

英文文本: Make a run. When you encounter the innermost piece of ice protecting that server, bypass it.
英文风味文字: Targeted attacks make system breaches so much easier, especially if you can spoof an authorized user.
中文风味文字: 通过针对性攻击来攻破系统轻松很多，如果你能冒充授权用户则更加容易。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
The Corp must either discard 2 cards or draw 4 cards.
英文风味文字: Flooding the system with synchronized request messages makes it unresponsive to legitimate requests.

英文文本: +1[mu], +1[link] The first time each turn you pass all of the ice protecting HQ, you may draw 1 card to force the Corp to draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。 [trash]: 略过你当前正在遭遇的门禁。
英文风味文字: "Technology breeds crime."
中文风味文字: “科技滋生犯罪。”

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +5 strength. [trash]: Bypass the sentry you are encountering.
英文风味文字: "Never boast. Just let your importance be quietly obvious."

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. [trash]: Bypass the barrier you are encountering.
英文风味文字: "It's a matter of 'acquiring' the right credentials."

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on this program. When your discard phase ends, remove all hosted power counters. Interface → Hosted power counter: Break 1 subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.

[click][click]: Run any server. The first time you approach a rezzed piece of ice during this run, you may pay credits equal to the strength of that ice. If you do, when you encounter that ice after this approach, bypass it.
中文文本: [click], [click]: 进行一次潜袭。本次潜袭中你第一次接驳一层已激活的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙强度相等的信用点以略过它。
英文风味文字: Know your mark, their weaknesses and strengths—both will show how to best bypass their defenses.
中文风味文字: 了解你的目标，看清虚实—这些信息会将略过他们防御的最佳方式展示给你。

+1[link]
[trash]: Derez a piece of ice protecting a remote server. Use this ability only during the next paid ability window after a successful run on HQ ends.
英文风味文字: You remember when Maxi was making book for Chacon. He's moved up in the world and gained the veneer of respectability. But as an executive the people he works for now, are far more vicious, bloodthirsty, and crooked.

中文名称: 艾拉·“生命”·拉辛: 拟态专家
英文文本: Before drawing your starting hand, set aside the top 6 cards of your stack facedown. (You may look at those cards at any time.) Shuffle 2 of those cards into your stack. [click]: Add 1 card set aside with this identity to your grip.
中文文本: 在你抽初始手牌前，将你的存储栈顶端6张卡牌面朝下置于一旁。（你可以随时查看这些卡牌。） 将其中2张卡牌洗入你的存储栈。 [click]: 将1张由本特性置于一旁的卡牌加入你的操控器。

英文文本:
Play only as your first [click].
Choose 1 card installed in the root of or protecting a remote server. That card cannot be rezzed this turn.

仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
选择一张远程服务器内或保护远程服务器的卡牌。本回合该卡牌不能被激活。
英文风味文字: Each AI had been tasked with finding a solution to the same problem but with different variables.
中文风味文字: 每株人工智能都负责解决同一问题，而变量互异。

中文文本: 对研发中心进行一次潜袭。如果成功，每有一个未使用的内存单元，最多为4，额外读取一张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Extracting data from complex systems is what running is all about.
中文风味文字: 潜袭就是从复杂的系统里提取数据。

+1[mu], +1[link]

英文文本: +1[mu] When your turn begins, draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.

英文风味文字: Innovation. Iteration. Education.
中文风味文字: 创新。迭代。教育。

英文风味文字: Restructuring labor resources.

英文风味文字: Although he rarely teaches classes these days, his lectures are always well attended.

英文风味文字: A despicable web of outcasts and infamy, no government or corporation could effectively shut it down. If only because so many of their sysops, executives, and covert agents made use of it.

英文风味文字: The black level clearance sub-sub-basement of Haas-Bioroid is a magical place.
中文风味文字: 哈斯生化黑色许可级别的下下层地下室是个神奇的地方。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Once per turn → [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain [click][click].
When you score Successful Field Test, install any number of cards from HQ, ignoring all costs.
Whenever you install a card in the root of a remote server, place 1 power counter on this asset. [trash]: For each power counter on this asset, gain 2[credit] and draw 1 card.
中文文本:
每当你安装一张卡牌到一台服务器内时，放置1枚能量指示物到艾斯黛拉·文上。
[trash]: 艾斯黛拉·文上每有1枚能量指示物，补一张卡牌并获得2[credit]。

英文文本: When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this asset. [interrupt] → When this asset would be trashed, you may shuffle it into R&D instead of adding it to Archives. (It is still considered trashed.)
中文文本: 当你激活本资产时，填装8[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。 当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取2[credit]。 [interrupt] → 当本资产将被销毁时，你可以将其洗入研发中心，代替加入档案库。（它仍然视为被销毁。）

英文文本: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] You may draw 1 card. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: "A new game means new rules..."

英文文本: [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, do 1 core damage.
英文风味文字: "Strictly speaking, it isn't illegal to use an interrogation simulator as the blueprint for ICE." - Mason Bellamy
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 门禁 - 追踪者

英文文本: [subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, the Runner cannot access cards or breach the attacked server for the remainder of this run. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed icebreaker.
中文子类型: 毁灭者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] The Corp may draw 1 card.
[subroutine] The Corp may add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
英文风味文字: "The Warp and Weft were hypnotic...but they didn't really seem to do anything to keep me out. But then I never seemed to find anything interesting either." - Reaver

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click][click].
Gain 10[credit] and draw 4 cards. You may install 1 card from HQ.
英文风味文字: "If there were hidden partitions on the server, I'd know; I'm the head of this department!"

英文文本: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they must either suffer 1 core damage or jack out. If the Runner jacks out this way, gain 5[credit], draw 1 card, and trash this upgrade.
中文文本: 每当本服务器进行了成功的潜袭时，潜袭者必须承受1点脑部伤害或退出。如果潜袭者退出，获得5[credit]，补一张卡牌并销毁黑色许可。
英文风味文字: Even knowing this floor existed was cause for termination...
中文风味文字: 就连知道这一层的存在也是终止事由…

英文文本: Whenever an encounter with a piece of ice protecting this server ends, if the Runner broke at least 1 subroutine during that encounter, they lose [click].
英文风味文字: "They say he is an ex-runner. I don't know if it is true, but he is chromed to the gills and seems to know all the runners' tricks."

中文名称: 蝎岛防御体系: 说服力
英文文本: [interrupt] → Whenever 1 or more Runner cards would be trashed (from any location), set those cards aside instead of adding them to the heap. You can look at those cards. You may remove 1 of them from the game. Then, add all of those cards that are still set aside to the heap. Ignore this ability if you have already removed a card from the game with it this turn.
中文文本: 每当一张潜袭者卡牌被销毁时（从任何区域），你可以迫使潜袭者将其移出游戏，代替加入堆阵。每回合仅能使用一次本能力。
英文风味文字: Might makes right.
中文风味文字: 强权即真理。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: For the remainder of this run, the Runner must trash 1 card from the grip as an additional cost to jack out or break a subroutine. Use this ability only during a run.
When you score Illicit Sales, you may take 1 bad publicity. Gain 3[credit] for each bad publicity that you have.
英文风味文字: "Anything, to anyone...for the right price."

英文文本: When you score Graft, you may search your deck for up to 3 cards, reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

If the Runner trashes Illegal Arms Factory while it is installed, take 1 bad publicity.
When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
Whenever the Runner takes 1 or more tags, do 1 meat damage.
中文文本: 每当潜袭者拿取1枚或更多的锁定标记时，造成1点肢体伤害。
英文风味文字:
"VP of Retirements and Pensions? So is that HR or Accounting?"
"Both."
中文风味文字:
“退休与养老金项目副总裁？所以这是人力资源还是会计？”
“都是。”

英文文本: [subroutine] The Runner must trash either 1 installed program or the top 2 cards of the stack.

You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead give the Runner 2 tags.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead trash 1 installed program and 1 installed resource.
中文文本:
你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+1。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，改为给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，改为销毁1个已安装的程序与1个已安装的资源。

英文文本:
[subroutine] Remove a card in the heap from the game.
[subroutine] End the run.

You can advance this ice. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, the Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead gain 4[credit]. [subroutine] End the run. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead search R&D for up to 2 cards. Add those cards to HQ, then end the run.
中文文本: 你可以推进本防火墙。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，潜袭者不能使用智能模块程序破解本防火墙上的子进程。 [subroutine] 获得1[credit]。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，则改为获得4[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，则改为在研发中心搜寻最多2张卡牌。将这些卡牌加入总部，然后终止本次潜袭。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn.
Trash 1 installed card.
中文文本:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
如果潜袭者在他/她的上回合窃取过一个议案，才能打出。
销毁一张卡牌。

英文文本: Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, they must take 1 tag or end the run.
When you score Paper Trail, Trace[6]. If successful, trash all connection and job resources.

While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset, they lose 1[credit].
中文文本:
如果蜜场从研发中心被读取，潜袭者必须展示它。
当潜袭者读取蜜场时，他/她失去1[credit]。

英文文本: When your turn begins, place 2[credit] on Long-Term Investment. If there are at least 8[credit] on Long-Term Investment, it gains "[click]: Take any number of credits from Long-Term Investment."

[subroutine] The Runner loses [click].
[subroutine] The Runner trashes 1 card from their grip.

After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 13[credit].
When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 2.
When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 5.
When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 8.
Evidence Collection is worth 1 fewer agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
Whenever you score an agenda, you may swap it with an agenda in the Runner's score area worth at least 1 point, then resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda.
Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, you may resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda, then swap it with an agenda in your scored area.
Whenever you rez a piece of ice, give the Runner 1 tag.

Whenever you rez a piece of ice, give the Runner 1 tag.
Whenever the Runner accesses cards, he or she accesses 1 fewer card if he or she is tagged (to a minimum of 1 card).

If Trojan is accessed from R&D, then Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Trojan, lose 2[credit], trash 1 card from HQ at random, and destroy Trojan. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Trojan from Archives.
This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. As an additional cost to advance a card, the Corp must pay 1[credit].

[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 piece of hardware.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit], if able. End the run.

[subroutine] Trash 1 resource.
[subroutine] Trash 1 resource.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able. End the run.
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 门禁 - 毁灭者

英文文本:
When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a remote server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.

When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a central server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.

When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 2. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Expose all cards in a remote server. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.

When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 5. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal the top 3 cards in R&D. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.

When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 8. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal each card in HQ. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.
Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal each card in HQ and the top card of R&D. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.
Whenever the Corp spends [click] to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn.

Whenever the Corp spends [click] to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn.
2[credit]: For the remainder of this run, access 1 additional card whenever you access cards from HQ or R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.

Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap.
[click][click]: Install 1 hosted program (paying all costs).

Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap.
[click][click]: Install 1 hosted program, ignoring all costs.

Whenever you draw a Shadow Team, immediately install it.
Whenever you initiate a run, trash a card from your grip, if able. When you make a successful run on a central server, destroy Shadow Team.
This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner must pay 2[credit] as an additional cost to use an icebreaker.
[click],[trash]: Make a run and gain [click]. If successful, draw 1 card.
[click],[trash]: Make a run and gain [click]. If that run is successful when it ends, you may immediately make another run on another server.
[click],[click]: Make a run on a remote server. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on a central server.
[click],[click]: Make a run on a central server. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on a remote server.

中文名称: 雷娜·罗娅: 自由战士
英文文本: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1[credit] more to rez.
中文文本: 每回合公司激活的第一层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
英文风味文字: "Analyzing the board won't help. Your mistake was thinking we're playing the same game."
中文子类型: 半机械人 - 转基因人

英文文本: Run HQ or R&D. Access → 0[credit]: Trash the card you are accessing.
英文风味文字: You ever set something on fire just to watch it burn?

英文文本: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
中文文本: 潜袭档案库。如果成功，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个程序，忽略所有的费用，代替侵入档案库。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Run a remote server. If successful, instead of breaching that server, trash all cards installed in the root of that server.

Place 9[credit] on this event, then run any server. During that run, hosted credits are considered to be in your credit pool. When that run ends, suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.
1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers or for installing virus programs.
英文风味文字: I feel almost naked without it.

英文文本: +1[mu], 2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to use icebreakers. Whenever there is a successful trace during a run, suffer 1 core damage. Limit 1 console per player.

Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 virus counter on this program.
中文子类型: 智能模块 - 破解器 - 病毒

英文文本: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on Datasucker. Hosted virus counter: Rezzed piece of ice currently being encountered has -1 strength until the end of the encounter.
Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
英文风味文字: It always strikes twice.

英文文本: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access, once per turn → Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing.
中文文本: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 读取 → 所附载的病毒指示物: 销毁你正在读取的卡牌。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。
英文风味文字: Something wicked this way comes.

英文文本: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. [click], 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.
英文风味文字: Bleeding data is more of a science than an art. Too much and you can end up with a one-way ticket to flatline city. Not enough and you might as well be running an empty server.

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。
英文风味文字: November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
英文风味文字: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.

英文文本: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets −1 strength.
中文文本: 在你遭遇一层防火墙的期间，该防火墙的强度-1。
英文风味文字: In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.

英文文本: When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
中文文本: 当你安装本资源时，填装16[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]: 从本资源上拿取4[credit]。
英文风味文字: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.

英文文本: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
中文文本: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
英文风味文字: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

英文文本: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
中文文本: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
英文风味文字:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge

英文文本: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2[credit].
英文风味文字: "Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."

英文文本: Gain 3[credit].
英文风味文字: "Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"

英文文本:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
中文文本:
只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
关闭1层已安装的防火墙。
英文风味文字: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda

英文文本: Choose 1 unrezzed piece of ice. The Corp may rez that ice. If they do not, they trash it.
中文文本: 选择1层未激活的防火墙。公司可以激活该防火墙。如果其未如此做，则其销毁该防火墙。
英文风味文字: As the hysteria in the room climbed higher up the corporate chain, an uneasy feeling of joblessness began to sink in on the lower rungs.

英文文本: Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
中文文本: 潜袭任意一台服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。
英文风味文字: "Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."

英文文本: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
英文风味文字: Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…

英文文本: +1[mu] Once per turn → When a successful run ends, you may run any server. Limit 1 console per player.
英文风味文字: Twice the fun.

英文文本: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
英文风味文字: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
英文风味文字: Do you believe in faeries?

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+1。 当你安装本程序时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。 每当你遭遇所选择的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
英文风味文字: Show-off.

英文文本:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during runs on HQ. X is the number of virus counters on Pheromones.
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Pheromones.
[click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
中文文本: [click]: 潜袭档案库。如果本次潜袭将要宣告为成功，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内将被攻击的服务器改为总部。
英文风味文字: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru

英文文本:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] on it. When it is empty, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
2[recurring-credit] You can spend hosted credits to take the basic action to remove 1 tag. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent up to 3 meat damage.
英文风味文字: "My roomie, he had a cousin with a college girlfriend whose brother's best friend was an addict, and the addict's mother used to live here. So yeah, there's a connection." -Lez "Rockfist" S.

英文文本: [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent a player from trashing another installed resource. [trash]: Gain 2[credit].
英文风味文字: There are good, honest, hardworking cops in the NAPD. Officers who do their best to bring justice to the guilty and protect the innocent. Fortunately for the criminals, they're outnumbered by the other kind. The kind who are much easier to work with.

英文文本: [click]: Draw 2 cards. When you do, add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack.
英文风味文字:
"We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago."
"I appreciate it, Mr. Li."
"We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel…"
"Yes?"
"Don't leave town."
"Have you met Dinosaurus?"

英文文本: Draw 3 cards.
中文文本: 抽3张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Diesel gives you flames.

英文文本: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
英文风味文字: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.

英文文本: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
英文风味文字: There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.

英文文本:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
英文风味文字: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.

英文文本: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
中文文本: 在你的存储栈或堆阵搜寻1个程序。（如果搜寻了存储栈则将其洗混。）安装该程序，忽略所有的费用。当你的回合结束时，如果该程序仍未被卸载，将其加入你的存储栈顶端。

英文文本: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
中文文本: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
英文风味文字: "Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak

英文文本: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
英文风味文字: "There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."

英文文本: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.

+1[link]
When Rabbit Hole is installed, you may search your stack for another copy of Rabbit Hole and install it by paying its install cost. Shuffle your stack.
英文风味文字: It's not endless, it just feels that way.

英文文本: Install The Personal Touch only on an icebreaker. Host icebreaker has +1 strength.
英文风味文字: A z-loop here, a cortical wave there…

"Its only function seems to be repurposing code."
"Can you kill it?" she asked.
"I can try," he said. Guiding his program dead center of the mass, he plunged, piercing the shell before an eruption sent his screen into static. He jacked out, his eyes wide. "I... I think it absorbed my breaker. And everything else."

INTRUDER ALERT!
INTRUDER ALERT!
INTRUDER NEUTRALIZED!

Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 2 meat damage for each tag the Runner has.

When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have 2 or fewer cards in your grip.

英文文本: Run Archives. If successful, after breaching Archives, breach HQ, then breach R&D. You cannot access cards in the root of HQ or R&D during these breaches.

英文文本:
Trash your grip.
Gain 10[credit].
英文风味文字: "Worth it."

英文文本: +1[mu] [interrupt], once per turn → When you would play or install a card, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, instead play or install that card paying 2[credit] less. Limit 1 console per player.

Whenever the Corp creates a server, they lose 1[credit].
Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, you may trash this hardware. If you do, the Corp loses 3[credit].
This program gets -1 strength for each card in your grip. Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of code gate subroutines.
英文风味文字: ... clack... clack... clack...

英文文本: The first time each turn a program or a piece of hardware is trashed (from any location), you may place 1 power counter on District 99. [click], 3 hosted power counters: Add a card that matches the faction of your identity from your heap to your grip.

英文文本: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, draw 2 cards and take 1 tag.
英文风味文字: "You think you're the first to come after me?"

英文文本: Make a run on HQ. If successful, gain 9[credit] and take 1 tag.
英文风味文字: "We have you surrounded! For real, this time."

英文文本: +1[mu] The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1[credit] and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.

Whenever you make a successful run, you may place 1[credit] from the bank on Bankroll.
[trash]: Take all credits from Bankroll.

"With the rise of crypto, banking has become much more complicated. Financial crime has not only kept pace, but exploded exponentially."
-After the Flash: A History of the War-That-Wasn't

"Any piece of ice is really just a paywall."
-Liza Talking Thunder

英文文本: The first time you avoid or remove a tag each turn, you may install a card from your grip, lowering its install cost by 1.
英文风味文字: A classy alibi.

英文文本:
Place 12[credit] from the bank on Miss Bones when she is installed. When there are no credits left on Miss Bones, trash her.
Use these credits to trash installed cards.

英文文本: Whenever you breach R&D, you and the Corp secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit], or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Corp spent the same number of credits, access 1 additional card.

As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
The Corp may look at the top 4 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
Reveal the top 4 cards of R&D.

+1[mu] Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may place 1 power counter on this hardware. [click], 3 hosted power counters: Breach R&D. You cannot access cards in the root of R&D during this breach. Limit 1 console per player.
The first time you trash an accessed card each turn, you may place power counters on Mâché equal to that card's trash cost. 3 hosted power counters: Draw 1 card.
英文风味文字: "What are you making?" "What aren't I making?"

英文文本: 2[credit]: Host this program on a piece of ice. Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 subroutines on host sentry. 2[credit]: +3 strength.

Install only on a piece of ice.

"Breathe, girl. Breathe." Mike flickered into focus as she brushed Akiko's tears away. "What did you see?"
"I..." Akiko hesitated. "Everything."

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may pay 2[credit] to gain [click]. If you do, trash Algernon when your turn ends if you did not make a successful run this turn.

Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, install up to 5 cards from your heap facedown.

Reduce the play cost of Office Supplies by 1 for each [link] you have.
Gain 4[credit] or draw 4 cards.

英文文本: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 2[credit] or draw 2 cards.

英文文本: Derez any number of cards. You may rez a card, lowering its rez cost by 3 for each card that you derezzed this way.

英文文本: Gain X[credit]. Draw up to X cards. Install up to X cards in the root of and/or protecting a single remote server. X is equal to the number of agendas in the Runner's score area.

英文文本: Gain [click] for each agenda in the Runner's score area. Remove Game Changer from the game instead of trashing it.

英文文本: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, end the run unless they pay 2[credit] for each agenda in their score area.
英文风味文字: The world changed. Concession prices did not.

英文文本: [click], 1[credit]: Install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server, then place 1 advancement counter on it. You cannot score or rez that card until your next turn begins.
When your turn ends, place 2 advancement counters on 1 card in the root of a remote server.
英文风味文字: "Jumon, all too Jumon..."

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may remove an advancement token from an installed card to gain 3[credit].
英文风味文字: "Supersedure is all part of our scheduled maintenance."

英文文本:
Neurostasis can be advanced.
If you pay 3[credit] when the Runner accesses Neurostasis, choose 1 installed Runner card for each advancement token on Neurostasis. The Runner must shuffle the chosen cards into the stack.
[subroutine] You may place up to 3 advancement counters on 1 card installed in the root of a remote server. If you do, the Runner accesses that card unless they pay 3[credit].
英文风味文字: "If the sysop offers you a link, it's because they want you to go there. But if you wanted to go where the sysop suggested, you wouldn't be trying to break in at all." -How Not to Get Fragged

英文文本:
When your turn begins and whenever the Runner passes this ice, you may swap this ice with another installed piece of ice.
[subroutine] End the run.

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner trashed a Corp card during their last turn and you have at least 1 installed card.
Choose 1 of your installed cards. The Runner may access that card. If they do, remove this operation from the game; otherwise, add this operation to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth -1 agenda point.

When the Runner approaches this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, choose 1 card in the root of another server or 1 agenda, asset, or upgrade in HQ. Swap that card with 1 card in the root of this server. If you swap cards this way, the Runner may jack out.

英文名称: Acme Consulting: The Truth You Need

When you score Fly on the Wall, give the Runner 1 tag.

"What's so special about the Special Investigations Unit?"
"Their budget, for starters."

英文文本: When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type, then reveal all cards in the grip. For the remainder of this run, this ice gains "[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag." for each revealed card of the chosen type.

英文文本:
[subroutine] Do 3 net damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Gain 5[credit] if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.

英文文本: Draw 2 cards. Reveal up to 2 agendas in HQ and/or Archives. Gain 2[credit] for each agenda revealed, then shuffle those agendas into R&D.

英文文本: When you score this agenda, you may take 1 bad publicity. Place 1 agenda counter on this agenda for each bad publicity you have. Once per turn → [click], hosted agenda counter: Do 2 meat damage.

Place 3 power counters on Drudge Work when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Drudge Work, trash it. [click], hosted power counter: Reveal an agenda in HQ or Archives. Gain credits equal to its agenda points, then shuffle it into R&D.

Blockchain gains "[subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit]." before all its other subroutines for every 2 faceup transaction operations in Archives. [subroutine] The Corp gains 1[credit] and the Runner loses 1[credit]. [subroutine] End the run.

Whenever the Runner approaches a server, you may rez this ice. If you do, move this ice to the innermost position protecting the approached server. The Runner moves to this ice and encounters it.
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner suffers 2 net damage.

英文文本: Reveal a barrier from HQ. Install and rez it, ignoring all costs.

Play only if you have fewer than 10[credit].
Gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
英文风味文字: "This is blackmail!" "No, this is extortion."

英文文本: Play only if the Runner accessed a card during their last turn. Trash 1 installed connection resource and take 1 bad publicity.

When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on Lady Liberty. [click], [click], [click]: Add an agenda from HQ to your score area worth agenda points equal to the exact number of hosted power counters. Limit 1 region per server. Limit 1 per deck.
Trash the top 3 cards of your stack. Shuffle 3 cards from your heap into your stack. Draw 1 card. Remove this event from the game instead of trashing it.
中文文本: 销毁你的存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。将3张卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。抽1张卡牌。将本事件移出游戏，代替销毁之。

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 power counter on this upgrade. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run, remove 1 power counter from this upgrade. Hosted power counter: End the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，你可以支付1[credit]以放置1枚能量指示物到本升级上。 每当潜袭者进行一次成功的潜袭时，从本升级上移除1枚能量指示物。 所附载的能量指示物: 终止本次潜袭。本能力仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用。

When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.
When your turn ends, if you made at least 3 successful runs this turn and this card is in your heap, you may install it, ignoring all costs.

当你安装本资源时，填装3[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取1[credit]。
当你的回合结束时，如果你在本回合内进行过至少3次成功的潜袭并且本卡牌在你的堆阵，你可以安装之，忽略所有的费用。

When the Runner encounters this ice, they put the top card of the stack on the bottom, then you reveal the top 3 cards of the stack.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].

[subroutine] If you revealed 3 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, place 3 advancement tokens on an installed card.

当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，其将存储栈顶端的卡牌加入存储栈底端，然后你展示存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有2张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，获得3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有3张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，放置3枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。

After you resolve this event, end your action phase.
Make a run on a remote server. If successful, remove the first non-agenda card that you access from the game.
Until the game ends, whenever you access a copy of that card, remove it from the game.
Limit 1 per deck.

在你结算本事件后，结束你的行动阶段。
对远程服务器进行一次潜袭。如果成功，将你所读取到的第一张非议案卡牌移出游戏。
直到游戏结束，当你读取到与该卡牌相同的卡牌时，将其移出游戏。
每套牌组限制1张。

As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Place up to 3 advancement counters on 1 unrezzed card in the root of a remote server. Gain 2[credit] for each counter placed this way. You cannot access that card for the remainder of the turn.

Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Access 1 installed card (non-ice).
英文风味文字:
That moment of bliss. That feeling of accomplishment. That certainty of purpose.
What's next?

英文文本: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, you may install 1 program from your heap, ignoring all costs.
中文文本: 潜袭档案库。如果成功，你可以从你的堆阵安装1个程序，忽略所有的费用，代替侵入档案库。

英文文本: Make a run. When the run ends, trash 1 piece of ice that was rezzed during this run.
英文风味文字: "While there have been other anti-corporation movements before, like the Maroon Wave, this new one is different. It's organized." -Ramesh Gupta, One World Economy

英文文本: Place 9[credit] on this event, then run any server. During that run, hosted credits are considered to be in your credit pool. When that run ends, suffer 1 core damage. This damage cannot be prevented.
1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers or for installing virus programs.
英文风味文字: I feel almost naked without it.

英文文本: +1[mu] [interrupt], once per turn → When you would play or install a card, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, instead play or install that card paying 2[credit] less. Limit 1 console per player.
Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.

Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
英文风味文字: It always strikes twice.

英文文本: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Access, once per turn → Hosted virus counter: Trash the card you are accessing.
中文文本: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 读取 → 所附载的病毒指示物: 销毁你正在读取的卡牌。本能力每回合仅限使用一次。

英文文本:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1[credit].

Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。
英文风味文字: November 5th: the day when all would see the corrupt machinations of the corporate oligarchy.

英文文本: While you are encountering a piece of ice, it gets −1 strength.
中文文本: 在你遭遇一层防火墙的期间，该防火墙的强度-1。
英文风味文字: In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corps need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.

英文文本: When you install this resource, load 16[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Take 4[credit] from this resource.
中文文本: 当你安装本资源时，填装16[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]: 从本资源上拿取4[credit]。
英文风味文字: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.

英文文本: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
中文文本: 2[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以支付销毁费用。
英文风味文字: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

英文文本: The rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 1[credit].
中文文本: 每层防火墙的激活费用加1[credit]。
英文风味文字:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge

英文文本: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, gain 2[credit].
英文风味文字: "Of course I steal from the rich. They're the ones with all the money."

英文文本: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ.
英文风味文字: "I'd say I do it for the challenge, but the truth is it's not that hard."

英文文本: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3[credit] less.
中文文本: 从你的操控器安装1个资源，其安装费用减3[credit]。
英文风味文字: "You can help Jinteki shape the future. Your future."

英文文本: Gain 3[credit].
英文风味文字: "Hey kid, you fire that up now, bound to be vamped real bad. Some real pathetic individuals around here. But thankfully I got just the ticket…"

英文文本:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
中文文本:
只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
关闭1层已安装的防火墙。
英文风味文字: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda

英文文本: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Search your stack for a connection, reveal it, and add it to your grip. You may install that connection (paying its install cost). Shuffle your stack.
Run any server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it.
中文文本: 潜袭任意一台服务器。本次潜袭中你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，略过该防火墙。
英文风味文字: "Hey, listen, I'm not asking you to do anything dangerous. Just let me into the building. And tell me which room has the weakest security. And please don't say 'the bathroom' again."

英文文本: Run HQ. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach HQ.
中文文本: 潜袭总部。如果成功，当你侵入总部时，额外读取2张卡牌。
英文风味文字: "I work by referral only, with an up-front fee. The fee is reasonable if you value results." -Silhouette

英文文本: Remove 1 tag. Then, you may pay 1[credit] to add this event to your grip.
中文文本: 移除1枚锁定标记。然后你可以支付1[credit]，以将本事件加入你的操控器。
英文风味文字: She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgment of the corporate simpletons she met there.

英文文本: Make a run. When you encounter the innermost piece of ice protecting that server, bypass it.
英文风味文字: Targeted attacks make system breaches so much easier, especially if you can spoof an authorized user.

英文文本: Search your stack for an icebreaker, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
英文风味文字: Feverishly tracking its frustratingly slow progress across the Pacific, the package finally shows up hours later…

英文文本: Whenever you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
英文风味文字: If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.

英文文本: +1[mu] The first time you make a successful run each turn, you may gain 1[credit] and look at the top card of your stack. If you do, you may add that card to the bottom of your stack. Limit 1 console per player.
Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength. [trash]: Bypass the code gate you are encountering.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。 [trash]: 略过你当前正在遭遇的门禁。
英文风味文字: "Technology breeds crime."

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +3 strength. [trash]: Bypass the barrier you are encountering.
英文风味文字: "It's a matter of 'acquiring' the right credentials."

英文文本: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever an encounter ends, if you used this program to break a subroutine during that encounter, trash this program.
英文风味文字: Do you believe in faeries?

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength. When you install this program, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Whenever you encounter the chosen ice, you may pay 1[credit] for each subroutine it has. If you do, bypass that ice.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+1。 当你安装本程序时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。 每当你遭遇所选择的防火墙时，你可以支付与该防火墙上子进程数量相等的[credit]。如果你如此做，略过该防火墙。

英文文本: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ for the remainder of that run.
中文文本: [click]: 潜袭档案库。如果本次潜袭将要宣告为成功，在本次潜袭的剩余时间内将被攻击的服务器改为总部。
英文风味文字: "The code isn't important. It's where the code takes you that is important." -g00ru

When you install this resource, load 8[credit] on it. When it is empty, trash it.
Whenever you make a successful run on a remote server, instead of breaching that server, you may take any number of credits from this resource.
[click], forfeit 1 agenda: Gain 9[credit].

英文文本: Install a program or piece of hardware, lowering the install cost by 3.
英文风味文字: There's no replacement for a home-grown program. Fed on late nights, oaty bars, and single-minded determination. Cheaper, too.

Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
英文风味文字: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.

英文文本: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
中文文本: 在你的存储栈或堆阵搜寻1个程序。（如果搜寻了存储栈则将其洗混。）安装该程序，忽略所有的费用。当你的回合结束时，如果该程序仍未被卸载，将其加入你的存储栈顶端。

英文文本: Run R&D. If successful, access 2 additional cards when you breach R&D.
中文文本: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。
英文风味文字: "Some of the professionals have good instincts, but they can't see beyond the data. They can't see the matrix." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak

英文文本: Choose a piece of ice. That ice gains sentry, code gate, and barrier until the end of the turn.
英文风味文字: "There's that moment, you know, when the whole world seems to fall away and it is only you and your mod, and the mod is the world."

The Akamatsu company was founded on three principles: first, to make the fastest mem chips on the market, second, to turn a profit, and third, to serve as a front for the manufacture of illegal neural-stimulants. It is the last principle that perhaps explains their rabid brand loyalty.

英文文本: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.
Whenever you breach R&D, access 1 additional card.
英文风味文字: Works best at your own desk.

英文文本: When you install this program, you may spend any number of credits to place that many power counters on it. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter, and it can only interface with ice of exactly equal strength. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine.
中文文本: 当你安装本程序时，你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚能量指示物到本程序上。 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，本程序的强度+1，且本程序只能与强度与其相等的防火墙对接。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条子进程。
英文风味文字: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
英文风味文字: "It's called 'brute-forcing' and it's just as effective today as it was a hundred years ago." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

英文文本: Interface → [trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.
英文风味文字: Didn't see that coming.

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.

中文文本: 获得9[credit]。

中文文本: [interrupt] → 每回合你第一次将要抽任意数量的卡牌时，抽牌数量增加1张。当你抽这些卡牌时，将其中1张加入研发中心底端。
英文风味文字: "A new investment deal every morning! Grab the bull by the horns and take control of your future!"

英文文本:
Ghost Branch can be advanced.
When the Runner accesses Ghost Branch, you may give the Runner 1 tag for each advancement token on Ghost Branch.

When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from Marked Accounts, if able.
[click]: Place 3[credit] from the bank on Marked Accounts.
You can advance this asset. [click], [trash]: The Runner loses 4[credit] for each hosted advancement counter.
中文文本: 你可以推进本资产。 [click]，[trash]: 每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，潜袭者失去4[credit]。
英文风味文字: Making a name for yourself has its perks. But it also makes you a target.

英文文本: When the Runner encounters this ice, they must take 1 tag or end the run. Hosted power counter: Give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, place 1 power counter on this ice.
中文子类型: 观察者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: [subroutine]Trace[6]. If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware, do 2 meat damage (cannot be prevented), and end the run.
英文风味文字: A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付1[credit]。
英文风味文字: "Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." -Chaos Theory

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they must pay 3[credit], if able. If they do not, end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，如可能，其必须支付3[credit]。如果其未如此做，终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字:
"Ever heard of a catch-22?"
"Remind me to forget it."

英文文本: While there are no installed fracter programs, this ice gets +7 strength. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 只要没有已安装的分解模块程序，本防火墙的强度便+7。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "It can make a real fine roller coaster, provided you're properly stimmed up." -Noise

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner loses all credits in their credit pool.

X must be equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
Place X advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance.
中文文本:
X必须等于或少于潜袭者所具有的锁定标记数量。
放置X枚推进指示物到1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
英文风味文字: Access to the largest consumer database in the galaxy has its advantages.

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
英文风味文字: "The SEA tipped us off to some suspicious data spikes up by the Castle." -Jerome Lock, on-duty tech

英文文本:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade anywhere except in Archives, gain 2[credit].

Persistent → As an additional cost to steal an agenda from this server or its root, the Runner must pay 5[credit]. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)

英文名称: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
中文名称: 威兰财团: 创造美好世界
英文文本: Whenever you play a transaction operation, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 每当你打出一个交易事务时，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: Moving Upwards.

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may add 1 rezzed card to HQ and gain credits equal to its rez cost.
英文风味文字: Unlimited Energy. Reasonable Prices.

英文文本: When you score this agenda, gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，获得7[credit]并拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
英文风味文字: There are going to be some changes around here.

英文文本: Install only faceup. (This agenda is neither rezzed nor unrezzed.) Whenever you advance this agenda, gain 2[credit]. If there are 5 or more hosted advancement counters (including the counter just placed), gain 3[credit] instead.
中文文本: 本议案仅能面朝上安装。（本议案不视为已激活或未激活。） 每当你推进本议案时，获得2[credit]。如果所附载的推进指示物有5枚或更多（包括刚放上去的那1枚），则改为获得3[credit]。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. Add it to HQ.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 在研发中心搜寻1张卡牌并展示之。将其加入总部。

英文文本: Contract Killer can be advanced. If there are at least 2 advancement tokens on Contract Killer, it gains: "[click], [trash]: Trash a connection or do 2 meat damage."
英文风味文字: "You want no questions asked, hire someone else. I have two: who and how much?"

英文文本: When you rez Elizabeth Mills, remove 1 bad publicity. [click], [trash]: Trash 1 location. Take 1 bad publicity.
英文风味文字: "It's not personal. Urban renewal is a necessity of the modern world. It's always someone's home, yours is no different."

英文文本:
Place 3 power counters on Public Support when it is rezzed. When there are no power counters left on Public Support, add it to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from Public Support.

As an additional cost to rez this ice, forfeit 1 agenda.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
作为激活本防火墙的额外费用，废除1个议案。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Next time, read the Terms of Service more carefully. Or you might find yourself in the danger zone.

英文文本:
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, the Corp gains 3[credit].
[subroutine] Trace[2]. If successful, end the run.
英文风味文字: A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.

英文文本:
Hadrian's Wall can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: "He had a bit of an ego, ol' Hadrian. His constructs live up to it though." -g00ru

英文文本: You can advance this ice. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, the Runner cannot break subroutines on this ice using AI programs. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit].
