If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead gain 4[credit]. [subroutine] End the run. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead search R&D for up to 2 cards. Add those cards to HQ, then end the run.
中文文本: 你可以推进本防火墙。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，潜袭者不能使用智能模块程序破解本防火墙上的子进程。 [subroutine] 获得1[credit]。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，则改为获得4[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，则改为在研发中心搜寻最多2张卡牌。将这些卡牌加入总部，然后终止本次潜袭。

英文文本:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+l。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: "I asked for ice as impenetrable as a wall. I can't decide if someone down in R&D has a warped sense of humor or just a very literal mind." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security

英文文本:
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: "Let me tell you a secret. There's no such thing as impenetrable ice. It has to allow access, or else why is the server on the Network in the first place? But that doesn't mean they have to make it easy." -g00ru

英文文本: Gain 3[credit].
英文风味文字: The New Angeles Space Elevator, better known as the Beanstalk, is the single greatest triumph of human engineering and ingenuity in history. The Beanstalk makes Earth orbit accessible to everyone…for a small fee.

英文文本: Rez a piece of ice, ignoring all costs, and install Oversight AI on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash host ice if all its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."
Trace[5]. If successful, do X meat damage. X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on all agendas the Runner stole during their last turn.
中文文本: <trace>追踪 5</trace>。如果成功，造成X点肢体伤害。X等于潜袭者在其上回合所窃取的所有议案的印刷议案分数总和。
英文风味文字: "I'd say it's nothing personal, but corporations are people, too."

英文文本: Runs against this server cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause runs to become unsuccessful.) Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 对本服务器的潜袭不能宣告为成功。（本效果不会导致潜袭被视为失败。） 每台服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: Mars would never have been colonized if not for the Gagarin facilities at Promontorium Agarum.

英文文本: When you score Paper Trail, Trace[6]. If successful, trash all connection and job resources.
When you score Priority Requisition, you may rez a piece of ice ignoring all costs.
英文风味文字: "If it isn't in my terminal by six p.m., heads are going to roll!"

英文文本: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: It is just like the one you just bought, only better.

英文文本:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click].
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去[click]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字:
"Hey, hey! Wake up, man. You were under a long time. What'd you see?"
"I…don't remember."

英文文本: [subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
英文风味文字:
.//run/hunter-tr/return=true
client/sec256IPv7->confirm? /y
3926:0HB7:1001:2NB1:1601:7784:ERROR
中文子类型: 观察者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: [subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: "There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak

英文文本: Gain 9[credit].
中文文本: 获得9[credit]。
英文风味文字: Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. -The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?

英文文本:
After you resolve this operation, end your action phase.
Gain 13[credit].

As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed resource.
Gain 7[credit].
中文文本:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，销毁1个已安装的资源。
获得7[credit]。
英文风味文字: With each passing day alone, Hoshiko found it harder to think. With each hour, the static grew louder.
中文风味文字: 孤独的日子一天天过去，星子愈发觉得思绪受到阻滞。时间一点点流逝，静电的噪音愈发刺耳。
卡图作者: Photo Tammy Gann Unsplash. Deep Dream

英文文本: +1[mu] The trash cost of each Corp card is lowered by 1[credit]. The first time each turn you trash a Corp card, gain 1[credit]. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu] 所有公司卡牌的销毁费用减1。 每回合你第一次销毁一张公司卡牌时，获得1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字:
Step 1: Apply to Problem.
Step 2: No more Problem!
中文风味文字:
步骤1: 应用于问题。
步骤2: 不再有问题！

英文文本:
Install only on a piece of ice.
Host ice gets −1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
Whenever you encounter host ice, if its strength is 0 or less, trash it. Otherwise, place 1 virus counter on this program.
中文文本:
仅能安装在一层防火墙上。
本程序上每有1枚病毒指示物，被附载的防火墙的强度-1。
每当你遭遇被附载的防火墙时，如果其强度等于或小于0，销毁之。否则，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。
英文风味文字: *tap* *tap* *tap*

英文文本: Once per turn → [click]: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Trash 1 of the revealed cards.
中文文本: 每回合限一次 → [click]: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，展示研发中心顶端的3张卡牌，代替侵入研发中心。销毁所展示的卡牌中的1张。
英文风味文字: “Net space is an abstraction, a white lie protecting fragile comprehensions. Do not limit yourself.” —z\h/r
中文风味文字:
“网域中的空间是一个抽象概念，是为了照顾理解力脆弱的人们而编造出的善意谎言。不要自我设限。”
—z\h/r

英文文本: Interface → X[credit]: Break X code gate subroutines. Use this ability only once per run. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Use this ability only if you have 3 or more installed virtual resources. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 对接 → X[credit]: 破解X条门禁子进程。本能力每次潜袭仅限使用一次。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。仅能在你有3个或更多已安装的虚拟资源时使用本能力。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字: Sing, sing as your heart desires!
中文风味文字: 唱吧，向心而行一展歌喉！

英文文本: When your turn begins, remove this resource from the game. Choose a server protected by ice. The Corp may trash 1 piece of ice protecting that server. If they do not, the first time this turn you breach either R&D or HQ, access 2 additional cards.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，将本资源移出游戏。选择一台有防火墙保护的服务器。公司可以销毁1层保护该服务器的防火墙。如果其未如此做，本回合你第一次侵入总部或研发中心时，额外读取2张卡牌。

英文文本:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
Whenever you make a successful run, you can spend hosted credits for the remainder of that run.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must pay 1[credit] or trash this resource.
中文文本:
当你的回合开始及你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以在本次潜袭的剩余时间内花费所附载的信用点。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须支付1[credit]或者销毁本资源。
英文风味文字: Friends break your walls.
中文风味文字: 挚友击破坚冰。

英文文本: The first time each turn you install a virus program, place 2 virus counters on this resource. When your turn begins, you may remove any 2 virus counters from your installed cards. If you do, draw 2 cards unless the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次安装一个病毒程序时，放置2个病毒指示物到本资源上。 当你的回合开始时，你可以从你已安装的卡牌上移除任意2枚病毒指示物。如果你如此做，抽2张卡牌，除非公司销毁研发中心顶端的卡牌。
英文风味文字: “…well, I’m laughing.”
中文风味文字: “……至少我笑了。”

英文文本:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
You can spend hosted credits to use programs during runs.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must take 1 tag or trash this resource.
中文文本:
当你的回合开始时及你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
你可以花费所附载的信用点以在潜袭中使用程序。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须拿取1枚锁定标记或者销毁本资源。
英文风味文字: Friends hide your fears.
中文风味文字: 挚友藏惧之形。
中文子类型: 同伴 - 隐匿 - 虚拟

中文名称: 阿兹·麦卡弗瑞: 机械奇才
英文文本: The first job resource, connection resource, or piece of hardware you install each turn costs 1[credit] less to install.
中文文本: 每回合你安装的第一个工作资源、人脉资源或硬件的安装费用减1[credit]。
英文风味文字: “You’re not listening.”
中文风味文字: “你没在听。”

英文文本: Run any server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, you may run the attacked server again, ignoring any additional costs to run. During the second run, whenever you encounter the last piece of ice you encountered during the first run, bypass it.
中文文本: 潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭失败，你可以再次潜袭该服务器，忽略所有的额外费用。在第二次潜袭中，每当你遭遇在第一次潜袭中遭遇的最后一层防火墙时，略过之。
英文风味文字:
“Everyone told me she was reliable in a pinch.”
—Az McCaffrey
中文风味文字:
“她在险境中出奇地可靠，每个人都这么说。”
—阿兹·麦卡弗瑞

英文文本: Look at the top 2 cards of your stack. You may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Draw 2 cards.
中文文本: 查看你的存储栈顶端的2张卡牌。你可以将其中的1张加入你的存储栈底端。抽2张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Blue flames burn the hottest!
中文风味文字: 蓝焰最为炙热！

英文文本: Use this hardware only during your turn. [trash]: Jack out. [trash]: Remove 1 tag. [interrupt] → [trash]: Reduce the base trace strength of a trace to 0.
中文文本: 本硬件仅能在你的回合内使用。 [trash]: 退出潜袭。 [trash]: 移除1枚锁定标记。 [interrupt] → [trash]: 将一次追踪的基础追踪强度降低至0。
英文风味文字: BMI switches let runners surface without a true disconnect. Handy for a break… immediately.
中文风味文字: BMI开关让潜袭者无需离线即可登出。允许你喘口气……随时随地。

英文文本: [interrupt] → Remove this hardware from the game: Prevent a Corp card ability from ending the run. Use this ability only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
中文文本: [interrupt] → 将本硬件移出游戏: 防止一次公司卡牌能力导致的终止潜袭。只有你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能使用本能力。
英文风味文字: Want to win a coinflip? Use a coin with two heads.
中文风味文字: 想知道投硬币稳赢的诀窍么？用两面都是正面的。

英文文本: +1[mu] The first time each turn you install a piece of hardware, draw 1 card. Whenever a run begins, you may install 1 piece of hardware from your grip, paying 1[credit] more. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu]。 每回合你第一次安装一个硬件时，抽1张卡牌。 每当一次潜袭开始时，你可以从你的操控器安装1个硬件，其安装费用加1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字:
v35: Springs to the mount ejectors (new feature)
v36: Reduced power to springs (×5)
中文风味文字:
v35：底座喷射器弹簧（新功能）
v36：下调弹簧强度（x5）

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, gain 2[credit].
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。 每回合你第一次仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，获得2[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“Do the job. Get paid. Leave feelings at the door.”
—“Baklan” Bochkin
中文风味文字:
“好好干活。拿好报酬。莫得感情。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

英文文本: The first time you encounter a piece of ice during each run, place 1 power counter on this resource. [trash], X hosted power counters: Derez the ice you are encountering if its strength is X or less. Take 1 tag.
中文文本: 每次潜袭你第一次遭遇一层防火墙时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。 [trash]，X枚所附载的能量指示物: 如果当前遭遇的防火墙的强度小于或等于X，关闭该防火墙。拿取1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字:
“Psh, let them gossip. The cat knows whose meat it has eaten.”
—“Baklan” Bochkin
中文风味文字:
“啧，让他们扯去吧。猫知道它吃了谁的肉。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

英文文本:
When a discard phase ends, if you installed this resource this turn, draw 4 cards.
[interrupt] → The first time each turn you would draw any number of cards, look at the top X cards of your stack. Add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. X is equal to the number of cards you would draw plus 1.
中文文本:
当你安装本资源的回合的弃牌阶段结束时，抽4张卡牌。
[interrupt] → 每回合你第一次将要抽牌时，查看存储栈顶端的X张卡牌。将其中的1张加入你的存储栈底端。X等于你即将抽牌的数量加1。
英文风味文字: “…but I am without compare.”
中文风味文字: “……但我无可比拟。”

中文名称: 拉特: 正派自由职业者
英文文本: When your discard phase ends, if you have the same number of cards in your grip as the Corp has in HQ, you may draw 1 card.
中文文本: 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，如果你的操控器中的卡牌数量与公司总部中的卡牌数量相同，你可以抽1张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Letʼs do it fast fast, then back to mine for tuak.
中文风味文字: 让我们搞快点，然后回我那儿喝棕榈酒。

英文文本:
Play only as your first [click].
For the remainder of this turn, whenever you install a card with a printed install cost of 1[credit] or greater, draw 1 card or gain 1[credit].
中文文本:
仅能在你的第一个[click]打出。
本回合的剩余时间内，每当你安装一张印刷费用大于或等于1[credit]的卡牌时，抽1张卡牌或获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: Do you know how many food deliveries I’ve missed this week?
中文风味文字: 你知道我这周少拿了多少外卖吗？

英文文本: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, choose an install cost greater than 0[credit]. The Corp sets aside the top X cards of R&D faceup, where X is equal to the number of your installed cards with that printed install cost, up to 6. Access 1 of the set-aside cards. The Corp shuffles the set-aside cards into R&D.
中文文本: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，选择一个大于0[credit]的安装费用，代替侵入研发中心。公司将研发中心顶端X张卡牌牌面朝上置于一旁，X等于你已安装的卡牌中具有该印刷安装费用的卡牌数量，至多为6。读取1张置于一旁的卡牌。公司将置于一旁的卡牌洗入研发中心。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 1 installed program.
Gain 4[credit] and draw 2 cards.
中文文本:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，销毁1个已安装的程序。
获得4[credit]并抽2张卡牌。
英文风味文字:
“There is never a wasted program. Someone, somewhere, will have a use for that code. Even corps are scrambling for quick fixes nowadays.”
—Lat
中文风味文字:
“从来就没有什么多余的程序。那串代码总会有自己的用武之地。如今就连公司都在争夺现成的补丁。”
—拉特

英文文本: +2[mu] You get +1 maximum hand size. When your turn ends, if you and the Corp have the same number of credits, you may gain 2[credit]. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +2[mu] 你的手牌上限+1。 当你的回合结束时，如果你与公司拥有相同数量的信用点，你可以获得2[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字: The Net is boundless, but the right access port is worth a road trip.
中文风味文字: 网域漫无边际，但是正确的访问端口值得驱车一游。

英文文本: When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +2 strength.
中文文本: 当你安装本程序时，其在本回合剩余时间内强度+3。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条屏障子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。
英文风味文字: It is not knowledge, but the act of learning, not possession, but the act of getting there, which grants the greatest enjoyment.
中文风味文字: 纸上得来终觉浅，绝知此事要躬行。

英文文本: When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it. Once per turn → Hosted virus counter: Choose an ice subtype. The ice you are encountering gains that subtype for the remainder of this encounter.
中文文本: 当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 每回合限一次 → 所附载的病毒指示物: 选择一种防火墙子类型。本次遭遇的剩余时间内，当前正在遭遇的防火墙获得该子类型。
英文风味文字: It makes sysops see red. And orange, yellow, green…
中文风味文字: 管理员的眼前闪烁着走马灯……

英文文本: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“It takes such simple things to sustain us, the most important of which is to be thankful.”
—Lat
中文风味文字:
“我们赖以生存的东西很简单，其中最重要的是心怀感恩。”
—拉特

英文文本: Once per turn → [click]: Gain 2[credit]. Once per turn → [click]: Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying 1[credit] less.
中文文本: 每回合限一次 → [click]: 获得2[credit]。 每回合限一次 → [click]: 从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件，其安装费用减1[credit]。
英文风味文字: “…then let me paint you a picture.”
中文风味文字: “……那么请让我为君落笔作画。”

英文文本:
While you are resolving this event, each playerʼs identity loses all abilities.
Run any server. When that run ends, you may shuffle this event into your stack.
中文文本:
在你结算本事件的期间，双方玩家的特性失去其能力。
潜袭任意一台服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，你可以将本事件洗入你的存储栈。
英文风味文字: Get into the ducts on the roof and keep crawling till you hit that old network root. Dirty work, I know, but it beats playing by the rules.
中文风味文字: 沿着屋顶的管道一路爬行，直到你抵达那老旧的网络根源。我知道这又脏又累，但是总好过循规蹈矩。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this event, add 1 installed program or piece of hardware to your grip.
Install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip, paying X[credit] less. X is equal to the printed install cost of the card you added to your grip.
中文文本:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，将1个已安装的程序或硬件加入你的操控器。
从你的操控器安装1个程序或硬件，其安装费用减X[credit]。X等于你加入操控器的卡牌的印刷安装费用。
英文风味文字: I didn’t say your hopper should be hauling garbage. I said it should be hauled away as garbage.
中文风味文字: 我可没说你的飞跃车是拖拉机。我说的是，它像是要被拖走的垃圾。

英文文本: Whenever you make a successful run, you may trash this resource to choose a card name. The next time this run you access an agenda with the chosen name, steal it, ignoring all costs. (You are no longer accessing it.)
中文文本: 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以销毁本资源，以选择一个卡牌名称。本次潜袭中你下一次读取具有该名称的议案时，窃取之，忽略所有的费用。(该议案不再视为被读取。)
英文风味文字:
“Corporations are made of people; just normal people doing their 6-to-6. The right truths, the right critique, and they can be redeemed.”
—Lat
中文风味文字:
“公司也是由人组成的，就是一群朝六晚六的普通上班族。应得的真相加上适时的批判，他们自会前来赎罪。”
—拉特

英文文本: If the first, second, and third actions you take on your turn are each different from one another, when the third action completes, you may gain 1[credit] or take another different action, paying [click] less.
中文文本: 在你的回合内，若你执行的第一、第二和第三个行动皆不相同，当第三个行动结算完毕时，你可以获得1[credit]或执行另外一个不同的行动，减少支付1[click]。
英文风味文字: Reflection, Not Imitation.
中文风味文字: 反射，而不是模仿。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, look at the top 5 cards of R&D. You may install and rez 1 of those cards, ignoring all costs.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，查看研发中心顶端的5张卡牌。你可以安装并激活其中的1张，忽略所有的费用。
英文风味文字:
“Early success should be rewarded, as it will encourage a culture of drive and competition.”
—Corporate Leadership for Dummies
中文风味文字:
“早期的成功应该受到奖赏，这有助于形成以自我驱动和竞争为核心的企业文化。”
—傻瓜都能看懂的企业领导概论

英文文本: Once per turn → [click]: Draw 2 cards. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may draw 2 cards.
中文文本: 每回合限一次 → [click]: 抽2张卡牌。 当潜袭者销毁本资产时，你可以抽2张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Unit is holding .78 asimovs of stress potential in all three directive logic traps. Psychiatric session mandated during next maintenance cycle.
中文风味文字: 该单位在全部三个指令逻辑陷阱悖论中表现出.78阿莫西夫的潜在压力指数。已指令在下一次维修中加入精神诊断。

英文文本: Once per turn → [click]: Gain 2[credit]. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may gain 2[credit].
中文文本: 每回合限一次 → [click]: 获得2[credit]。 当潜袭者销毁本资产时，你可以获得2[credit]。
英文风味文字: At the scale where nanobots cut glass, quantum mechanics dictate error. A silicon atom here, an oxygen there, an erbium out of place. Each bioroid is born unique.
中文风味文字: 在纳米机器人切割玻璃的微观尺度下，量子效应使得误差在所难免。这里一个硅原子，那里一个氧原子，不知何处又冒出来一个铒原子。所以啊，生化人也是生来独一无二的。

英文文本: This ice gets −1 strength for each installed icebreaker. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program that is not a decoder, fracter, or killer. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 每有1个已安装的破解器，本防火墙的强度-1。 [subroutine] 销毁1个不是解码模块、分解模块或者断路模块的已安装的程序。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Old warriors have seen all the tricks; be forthright or fail.
中文风味文字: 身经百战的战士见识过所有阴谋诡计，要么去强推，要么被摧毁。

英文文本: Gain 2[credit] or draw 2 cards. Repeat this process for each remote server that has a card in its root and is protected by ice.
中文文本: 获得2[credit]或抽2张卡牌。你每有一台根目录中有卡牌且有防火墙保护的远程服务器，便重复一次该进程。
英文风味文字: Haas’ unsecured servers were fortified just before the storm. Are their bioroid oracles that good, or were they tipped off?
中文风味文字: 哈斯居然赶在风暴来临前把他们所有未受保护的服务器都进行了加固。他们的生化人先知已经这么先进了么？还是说有人通风报信？

英文文本:
Resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Gain 2[credit].
  • Install 1 non-agenda card from HQ.
  • Gain [click].
中文文本:
按任意顺序结算下列中的2项:
  • 抽2张卡牌。
  • 获得2[credit]。
  • 从总部安装1张非议案卡牌。
  • 获得[click]。
英文风味文字: Not all secrets lie in vaults.
中文风味文字: 并非所有的秘密都躺在密库里。

英文文本: [click]: Place 1 power counter on this upgrade. As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must spend [click] and 1[credit] for each hosted power counter. When your turn begins, remove all hosted power counters.
中文文本: [click]: 放置1枚能量指示物到本升级上。 作为潜袭本服务器的额外费用，每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，潜袭者必须花费[click]与1[credit]。 当你的回合开始时，移除所附载的所有能量指示物。
英文风味文字: The Net abhors a vacuum. Any unexplained gap must be made.
中文风味文字: 网络憎恨真空。所有不合条理的间隙都是有人刻意为之。

中文名称: 兵部学会: 通彻明晰
英文文本: The first time each turn you reveal a card, gain 1[credit]. [click]: Reveal 1 card from the grip at random or the top card of the stack.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次展示一张卡牌时，获得1[credit]。 [click]: 从操控器随机展示1张卡牌或展示存储栈顶端的卡牌。
英文风味文字: No Stone Unturned.
中文风味文字: 刨根究底。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Swap 1 card from HQ with 1 card in the root of or protecting the attacked server. The Runner may jack out. Use this ability only during a run.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，如果所附载的推进指示物超过3枚，每超过1枚，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 从总部将1张卡牌与保护当前被攻击服务器或当前被攻击服务器根目录中的一张卡牌互换。潜袭者可以退出潜袭。本能力仅能在潜袭中使用。

英文文本: When a player scores or steals this agenda, do X net damage. X is equal to 1 plus the number of copies of Sting! in the other playerʼs score area.
中文文本: 当一位玩家计分或窃取本议案时，造成X点网域伤害。X等于另一位玩家分数区内名称为蜇！的议案的数量加1。
英文风味文字:
“‘It is my nature,’ said the scorpion.”
—Conceptual Frameworks in Bio-Ethics and Synthetic Morality, Moser University Press
中文风味文字:
“‘这是我的天性啊。’蝎子说道。”
—生命伦理与合成道德概念框架，莫泽大学出版社

英文文本: When your turn begins, reveal the top card of R&D and gain 2[credit].
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，展示研发中心顶端的卡牌并获得2[credit]。
英文风味文字: Hyoubu is our vanguard in the battle for hearts and minds.
中文风味文字: 兵部是保卫我们身心的先驱。

英文文本: The first time each turn you trash a card that matches the faction of the Runnerʼs identity (from any location), place 1 power counter on this asset. [click], hosted power counter: Do 1 net damage.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次销毁一张与潜袭者特性派系相同的卡牌时（不论从什么位置），放置1枚能量指示物到本资产上。 [click]，所附载的能量指示物: 造成1点网域伤害。
英文风味文字:
“Memory is a tangle of emotional threads. Pull one, it twists a second, unravels a third!”
—Letheia Nisei
中文风味文字:
“记忆是情绪织线的牵引纠缠。只要牵住其中一根，它就会把第二根带出来，连绵不断！”
—莉希亚·次代

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type. For the remainder of the encounter, whenever you trash a card of the chosen type with net damage from a subroutine on this ice, do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，选择一种卡牌类型。本次遭遇的剩余时间内，每当你以本防火墙子进程的网域伤害销毁一张所选类型的卡牌时，造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 观察者 - 警报

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner has 3 or more agenda points and they made a successful run during their last turn.
After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends.
Choose a card name, then do 1 net damage. If you trash a card with the chosen name this way, repeat this process.
中文文本:
只有潜袭者拥有3点或更多议案分数且在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
在你结算本事务后，结束你的行动阶段。
选择一个卡牌名称，然后造成1点网域伤害。如果你销毁了一张具有所选名称的卡牌，则重复本进程。

英文文本: The first time the Runner approaches this server during each run, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, the Runner moves to the outermost position of this server. They may jack out.
中文文本: 每次潜袭中潜袭者第一次接驳本服务器时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果二者数值不同，你可以销毁本升级。如果你如此做，潜袭者移动到本服务器的最外侧位置。潜袭者可以退出潜袭。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
英文风味文字:
Scrub-loving devs nerfed cannon rushes cause whiny bronzers complained. Left me four wins down in finals.
Anyway I won.
中文风味文字:
那些睿智设计师因为青铜低端局的哀声载道把加农炮速攻削弱了。害得我在决赛中连丢四局。
嘛，虽然我还是赢了。

英文文本:
Rez only during your action phase.
Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, they gain 2[credit].
When your turn begins, if the Runner did not make a successful run on this server during their last turn, gain 3[credit].
中文文本:
仅能在你的行动阶段中激活。
每当潜袭者对本服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，潜袭者获得2[credit]。
当你的回合开始时，如果潜袭者在其上回合未对本服务器进行过成功的潜袭，你获得3[credit]。

英文文本: The first time each turn a run begins, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: Subscribe for 12 months to get that premium uplink you need to blaze ahead of the crowd!
中文风味文字: 只需订阅全年份，即可享受尊贵抢先体验版！

英文文本:
When the Runner passes this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit]. The Runner gains 1[credit].
中文文本:
当潜袭者通过本防火墙时，你获得1[credit]。
[subroutine] 获得2[credit]。潜袭者获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: You are the ONE BILLIONTH visitor!
中文风味文字: 你是第十亿名的幸运访客！

英文文本:
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 2[credit].
[subroutine] Reveal the top 3 cards of the stack. Add 1 of those cards to the grip and gain X[credit], where X is equal to that cardʼs play or install cost. The Runner shuffles the stack. Trash this ice.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付2[credit]。
[subroutine] 展示存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。将其中的1张加入操控器并获得X[credit]，X等于该卡牌的打出或安装费用。潜袭者将存储栈重洗。销毁本防火墙。
英文风味文字: Though many countries attempted to regulate digital loot boxes in the early 21st century, GameNET has managed to circumvent any such laws via explicit, transparent percentage rates… and some very determined lobbyists.
中文风味文字: 尽管在21世纪早期有很多国家试图监管虚拟战利品宝箱，游网却用了一些手段巧妙地避开了这些法律限制，比如公开透明的宝箱爆率……以及一群锲而不舍的游说者。

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Choose a card type, then reveal the grip. Choose a value for X equal to or less than the number of revealed cards of the chosen type. You may pay X[credit] to place X advancement counters on 1 installed card.
中文文本:
只有潜袭者在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
选择一种卡牌类型，然后展示操控器。选择一个等于或少于被展示卡牌中所选卡牌类型卡牌数量的数值X。你可以支付X[credit]，以放置X枚推进指示物到1张已安装卡牌上。
英文风味文字: “There’s gonna be catering, right?”
中文风味文字: “这活管饭，对吧？”

英文文本: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during their last turn. Choose a Runner card type. Trash all installed non-icebreaker cards of the chosen type. For each card that would be trashed this way, the Runner may pay 3[credit] to prevent that card from being trashed. Take 1 bad publicity.
中文文本: 只有潜袭者在其上回合窃取过议案时，才能打出。 选择一种潜袭者卡牌类型。销毁所有已安装的该类型的非破解器卡牌。对每张将要因此被销毁的卡牌，潜袭者可以支付3[credit]，以防止其被销毁。 拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
英文风味文字: It is pitch black. You are likely to be eaten by a Troll.
中文风味文字: 现在一片漆黑。我估计你应该是当了巨魔的甜点。

英文文本:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade, remove 1 bad publicity unless they take 1 tag.
中文文本:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本卡牌的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者读取本升级时，移除1枚负面声誉标记，除非潜袭者拿取1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字: Ultra-Mythic chance ↑!↑!↑! Free Vorpal Tommy Gun [epic] and pinstripe suit [cosmetic] with 10× buy-in!
中文风味文字: 闪橙爆率↑！↑！↑！起充10包即送夺命汤米枪[史诗]与细纹套装[装饰]！

英文文本: Whenever the Runner steals another agenda, you may forfeit this agenda to gain 5[credit] and add the stolen agenda to HQ.
中文文本: 每当潜袭者窃取另一个议案时，你可以废除本议案，以获得5[credit]并将被窃取的议案加入总部。
英文风味文字: As the documents show, for eight months they have operated as an entirely independent fiscal entity. We are as appalled at the carelessness as you are, and fully support City Hall’s investigation.
中文风味文字: 正如文件所示，他们的财务运作已经独立运行了足有八个月。我们同样对如此重大的疏忽感到震惊，并且一定全力配合支持市政厅的调查。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must trash 1 installed program.
When you score this agenda, trash 1 installed program.
中文文本:
作为窃取本议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须销毁1个已安装的程序。
当你将本议案计分时，销毁1个已安装的程序。
英文风味文字:
“Drones are precision instruments. Collateral damage is merely an undisclosed target.”
—Chief “Pinchy” Wilson
中文风味文字:
“无人机是高精度仪器。所造成的意外伤亡都是些没明说的目标。”
—“死钳”·威尔森队长

英文文本: [click][click][click]: Gain 6[credit]. You may remove 1 bad publicity.
中文文本: [click][click][click]: 获得6[credit]。你可以移除1枚负面声誉标记。
英文风味文字:
“There’s something about the human touch that androids will never replace.”
—Mila Braun
中文风味文字:
“总有某些人间关怀，是安卓人永远无法取代的。”
—米拉·布劳恩

英文文本:
While this ice is protecting HQ, the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines during each encounter.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
只要本防火墙保护总部，潜袭者每次遭遇中便不能破解超过1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: A choice occurs. The waveform collapses.
中文风味文字: 先做出选择。然后波函数坍缩。

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters this ice, place 1 virus counter on it.
This ice gets −1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本防火墙上。
每有1枚所附载的病毒指示物，本防火墙的强度-1。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Effective, Cheap, Durable. Pick two.
中文风味文字: 高效，廉价，耐用。三选其二。

英文文本:
When you rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card.
[subroutine] Trace[6]. If successful, the Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
中文文本:
当你激活本防火墙时，拿取1枚负面声誉标记。
[subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪6</trace> -如果成功，潜袭者不能在本次潜袭的剩余时间内窃取或销毁公司卡牌。
中文子类型: 毁灭者 - 非法 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click]. Search R&D for 1 piece of ice and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Install that ice protecting a central server, paying 3[credit] less.
中文文本: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。 在研发中心搜寻1个防火墙并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）安装该防火墙用于保护一台中央服务器，其安装费用减3[credit]。
英文风味文字:
Secure Servers. Contain Infections. Protect Data.
—The SecTech Mantra
中文风味文字:
控制服务器。收容感染。保护数据。
—技术安保准则

英文文本:
When you rez this upgrade, you may pay up to 4[credit] to place that many power counters on it.
As an additional cost to run this server, the Runner must pay 2[credit] for each hosted power counter.
Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a central server, remove 1 hosted power counter.
中文文本:
当你激活本升级时，你可以支付最多4[credit]，以放置等量的能量指示物到本升级上。
作为潜袭本服务器的额外费用，每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，潜袭者必须支付2[credit]。
每当潜袭者对中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，移除1枚所附载的能量指示物。

英文文本: You cannot score this agenda if it was installed this turn.
中文文本: 你不能在安装本议案的回合计分本议案。
英文风味文字: The Fracture was no different from any other crisis. As always, Management’s first instinct was to find someone to blame. Getting food up to Midway or He3 down to power Earthside hospitals are trivialities compared to the important work of salving Executive ego and keeping one’s job.
中文风味文字: 此次轨道断裂事故与其他危机并无二致。一如既往，管理层的第一反应是先找一位背锅侠。与保住自己的饭碗和主管的面子相比，把食物送到中途站或者把氦-3送往地球的医院都是些无关紧要的琐事。

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may draw 1 card.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，你可以抽1张卡牌。
英文风味文字:
“By matching funds on your donations, the Space Elevator Authority has already planted over eight million trees on the Pacific coast. Together we can restore New Angeles to its former glory.”
—Elizabeth Mills
中文风味文字:
“有赖于诸位的慷慨解囊，空梯管理局已经在太平洋沿岸上种植了超过八百万棵树。让我们协作起来，一起重现新洛杉矶的往日荣光。”
—伊丽莎白·米尔斯

英文文本:
During runs against this server, you can rez this ice any time you could rez non-ice cards.
Each piece of ice protecting this server gets +1 strength.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 1[credit].
中文文本:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，你可以在任意你可以激活非防火墙卡牌的时机激活本防火墙。
所有保护本服务器的防火墙的强度+1。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去1[credit]。

中文名称: 白 星子: 未名主演
英文文本: When your turn ends, if you accessed a card this turn, gain 2[credit] and flip this identity. Back: Hoshiko Shiro: Mahou Shoujo When your turn begins, draw 1 card and lose 1[credit]. When your turn ends, if you did not access any cards this turn, flip this identity.
中文文本: 当你的回合结束时，如果你本回合读取过卡牌，获得2[credit]并将本特性翻面。 翻面 白 星子: 魔法少女 当你的回合开始时，抽1张卡牌并失去1[credit]。当你的回合结束时，如果你本回合没有读取过卡牌，将本特性翻面。
英文风味文字:
Please, let me have this dream.
I’m going to be my own kind of hero.
中文风味文字:
拜托了，请让我展开羽翼。
我要用我自己的方式成为英雄。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this event, trash 3 cards from your grip.
Gain 3[credit] and draw 3 cards.
中文文本:
作为打出本事件的额外费用，从你的操控器销毁3张卡牌。
获得3[credit]并抽3张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Let’s start a RIOT.
中文风味文字: 暴动亦如是。

英文文本: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game. If you do, that ice gets −6 strength for the remainder of this run.
中文文本: 每当你遭遇一层防火墙时，你可以将本硬件移出游戏。如果你如此做，该防火墙在本次潜袭的剩余时间内强度-6。
英文风味文字: A simple little box, brimming with temptation.
中文风味文字: 一个小巧的盒子，还有潘多拉的引诱低语。

英文文本: [trash]: Set aside the top 6 cards of your stack faceup. You may install 1 program or virtual resource from among those cards, paying 2[credit] less. Shuffle 3 of the remaining cards into your stack, then remove the rest from the game.
中文文本: [trash]: 将你的存储栈顶端的6张卡牌置于一旁。你可以从其中安装1个程序或虚拟资源，其安装费用减2[credit]。将剩余卡牌中的3张洗入你的存储栈，然后将余下的卡牌移出游戏。
英文风味文字: Win a new friend today!
中文风味文字: 今天也来抽一个新玩伴吧！

英文文本: +2[mu] The first time each turn you install a companion card or spend credits from an installed companion card, gain 1[credit]. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +2[mu] 每回合你第一次安装一张同伴卡牌或者花费一张已安装的同伴卡牌上的信用点时，获得1[credit]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字: “…and friends hold you close. I vow never to let go of my princess.”
中文风味文字: “……挚友伴君前行。我誓将永世守护我的公主殿下。”

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break any number of sentry subroutines. Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. Use this ability only if you have 3 or more installed virtual resources. 3[credit]: +3 strength.
中文文本: 对接 → 2[credit]: 破解任意数量的警报子进程。 对接 → 0[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。本能力仅能在你有3个或更多已安装的虚拟资源时使用。 3[credit]: 强度+3。
英文风味文字: Dance, and forget about time!
中文风味文字: 起舞吧，忘却时光纷扰！

英文文本:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
You can spend hosted credits to play events.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
中文文本:
当你的回合开始或你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须从你的操控器中随机销毁1张卡牌或者销毁本资源。
英文风味文字: Friends lift your spirits.
中文风味文字: 挚友慰藉魂灵。

英文文本: When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource. You can spend hosted credits to install non-connection cards. When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, trash 1 of your installed cards.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时及每当你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。 你可以花费所附载的信用点以安装非人脉卡牌。 当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，销毁1张你已安装的卡牌。
英文风味文字: Friends guard your passions.
中文风味文字: 挚友守御热情。

英文文本: Run a server protected by ice. When that run ends, gain 6[credit] plus 1[credit] for each piece of ice you passed during that run.
中文文本: 潜袭一台有防火墙保护的服务器。当本次潜袭结束时，获得等同于本次潜袭中通过防火墙数量加6的[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“Hold my wine. I’m going in.”
—Red Comyn
中文风味文字:
“拿好我的酒，我要开冲了。”
—红发科明

英文文本: When you install this hardware, choose 1 installed piece of ice. Use this hardware only during encounters with that ice. [trash]: Break up to 2 subroutines. When this run ends, if it was successful, you may shuffle 1 copy of Boomerang from your heap into your stack.
中文文本: 当你安装本硬件时，选择1层已安装的防火墙。本硬件仅能在遭遇该防火墙期间使用。 [trash]: 破解至多2条防火墙子进程。当本次潜袭结束时，如果潜袭成功，你可以将1张名称为回力镖的卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。
英文风味文字: Return to sender.
中文风味文字: 退给寄件人。

英文文本: Use this hardware only by spending credits from stealth cards. Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, you may pay 1[credit] to access 1 additional card when you breach HQ. Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may pay 2[credit] to access 1 additional card when you breach R&D.
中文文本: 本硬件仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。 每当你对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以支付1[credit]。如果你如此做，当你侵入总部时，额外读取1张卡牌。 每当你对研发中心进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以支付2[credit]。如果你如此做，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取1张卡牌。

英文文本: The first time each turn a run begins, you may look at the top 2 cards of your stack. Once per turn → 1[credit]: Reveal the top card of your stack. If that card is a program or piece of hardware, you may install it.
中文文本: 每回合第一次潜袭开始时，你可以查看你的存储栈顶端的2张卡牌。 每回合限一次 → 1[credit]: 展示你的存储栈顶端的卡牌。如果该卡牌是一个程序或硬件，你可以安装之。
英文风味文字:
“Overinflate a superposition-stack and optimal code forms the negentropy traverse.”
“Aha, like putting too much air into a balloon?!”
中文风味文字:
“只要将叠加存储栈过载，最优代码就会形成负熵传输。”
“啊哈，是不是就像气球气打多了一样？！”

英文文本: +1[mu] The first time each turn you play a run event, gain [click]. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu] 每回合你第一次打出一个潜袭事件时，获得[click]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字:
“Red ones go faster.”
—Ken “Express” Tenma
中文风味文字:
“红的那个跑得更快。”
—肯·“快车”·天马

英文文本: Once per turn → When you encounter a sentry, you may pay 2[credit] to bypass it. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 sentry subroutines. 1[credit]: +2 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
中文文本: 每回合限一次 → 当你遭遇一层警报时，你可以支付2[credit]以略过之。本能力仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解最多2条警报子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+2。本能力仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +2 strength. The first time each turn this program fully breaks a piece of ice, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 对接 → 2[credit]: 破解最多2条屏障子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+2。 每回合你第一次仅使用本程序破解所遭遇防火墙上的所有子进程时，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: “Debt is beautiful… after it is repaid.” —“Baklan” Bochkin
中文风味文字:
“负债是如此美妙……当然得在你还清之后。”
—“鸬鹚”·博奇金

英文文本:
If you made a successful run on HQ this turn, this resource costs 2[credit] less to install.
When you install this resource, load 4[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
You can spend hosted credits during runs.
中文文本:
如果你本回合已对总部进行过成功的潜袭，本资源的安装费用减2[credit]。
当你安装本资源时，填装4[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
你可以在潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
英文风味文字: Shadow Net marketplaces have such venerability that they differ from legal platforms only in the products offered.
中文风味文字: 暗网市场非常可靠，只是提供的商品与正常市场不同而已。

英文文本: The first time each turn you use a piece of hardware during a run, place 1 power counter on this resource. [click], remove this resource from the game: For each hosted power counter, choose up to 2 cards in your heap with [trash] abilities. Shuffle the chosen cards into your stack.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次在潜袭中使用硬件时，放置1枚能量指示物到本资源上。 [click]，将本资源移出游戏: 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，便从你的堆阵选择最多2张具有[trash]能力的卡牌。将所选卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
英文风味文字:
“Junk plus undiscerning buyers equals profit.”
—Az McCaffrey
中文风味文字:
“垃圾加上外行买家等于获利。”
—阿兹·麦卡弗瑞

英文文本:
Choose up to 5 cards with different names in your heap. Shuffle those cards into your stack.
Remove this event from the game.
中文文本:
从你的堆阵中选择最多5张名称不同的卡牌。将这些卡牌洗入你的存储栈。
将本事件移出游戏。
英文风味文字: Breathe in and visualise your happy place. Breathe out. It’s safe and calm and all your best days are there. Breathe in. Very good. The cortex scan has finished. Breathe out and open your eyes…
中文风味文字: 吸气，想一个让你开心的地方。呼气。那里平静祥和，你度过了美好时光。吸气。非常好。皮质扫描完成。呼气，然后睁开你的眼睛……

英文文本: +1[mu] The first time each turn an event is trashed (from any location), draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu] 每回合第一次一个事件被销毁时(无论从什么位置)，抽1张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字: Objects are but modulations in a continuous cycle of energy—illusory and impermanent echoes of the Self.
中文风味文字: 诸行无常，是生灭法。生灭灭已，寂灭为乐。

英文文本: As an additional cost to use this hardware, trash 1 installed program. Ignore this cost if an installed program has already been trashed this turn. [trash]: Install 1 program from your heap, paying 3[credit] less.
中文文本: 作为使用本硬件的额外费用，销毁1个已安装的程序。如果本回合已经有一个已安装的程序被销毁，忽略该额外费用。 [trash]: 从你的堆阵中安装1个程序，其安装费用减3[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“I could let my code evolve something new, but sometimes I just want to remember yesterday’s solution.”
—Lane
中文风味文字:
“我可以让我的代码进化成新玩意，但有时候我只想要昨天的版本。”
—莱恩

英文文本:
When you install this program, place 2 virus counters on it.
Once per turn → When you make a successful run on a central server, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to swap 1 piece of ice protecting that server with another installed piece of ice.
中文文本:
当你安装本程序时，放置2枚病毒指示物到本程序上。
每回合限一次 → 当你对中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，你可以移除1枚所附载的病毒指示物，以将1层保护该服务器的防火墙与另一层已安装的防火墙互换。

英文文本: Interface → 0[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. Use this ability only if this program was installed this turn. Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 对接 → 0[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。本能力仅能在安装本程序的回合使用。 对接 → 2[credit]: 破解最多2条门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字: Find truth not in the observation, but in the demonstration.
中文风味文字: 实践出真知。

英文文本:
1[recurring-credit]
You can spend hosted credits to use hardware and programs.
中文文本:
1[recurring-credit]
你可以花费所附载的信用点以使用硬件和程序。
英文风味文字: “Invisibility made it possible to get them, but it made it impossible to enjoy them when they are got.” —H.G. Wells, The Invisible Man
中文风味文字: “隐身可以让你拿到你想要的，但是也会让你没法享用拿到的东西。” —H·G·威尔斯，隐形人

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only if this program was installed this turn. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +3 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条屏障子进程。本能力仅能在安装本程序的回合使用。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+3。本能力仅能花费隐匿卡牌上的信用点来使用。
英文风味文字: Look at the problem from a different angle.
中文风味文字: 要从不同的角度看待问题。
中文子类型: 解码模块 - 分解模块 - 破解器

英文文本: 2[credit], [trash]: Search your stack for 1 program. Install it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.)
中文文本: 2[credit]，[trash]: 在你的存储栈中搜寻1个程序。安装之。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）
英文风味文字: Consider this: the most notorious tool in cyberterrorism is one that, in isolation, does nothing.
中文风味文字: 好好想想：赛博恐怖袭击中最臭名昭著的工具，在被隔离的情况下，卵用没有。

英文文本: +1[link] Whenever you install a non-AI icebreaker, that icebreaker gets +2 strength for the remainder of the turn.
中文文本: +1[link] 每当你安装一个非智能模块的破解器时，该破解器在本回合剩余时间内强度+2。
英文风味文字: He’s nice enough, but not when there are 5,187 of him.
中文风味文字: 它很温顺，但是当有5187个它的时候可就不好说了。

英文文本: [click]: Host 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip faceup on this resource. 1[credit]: Install 1 hosted card. The first card you install this way during each of your turns costs 1[credit] less to install for each unique ({unique}) connection resource you have installed.
中文文本: [click]: 从你的操控器牌面朝上附载1个程序或硬件到本资源上。 1[credit]: 安装1张所附载的卡牌。你每有1个已安装的独有（{unique}）人脉资源，每个你的回合你以此法安装的第一张卡牌安装费用减1[credit]。
中文风味文字: 由2018年永恒锦标赛冠军Oguz Han Asnaz设计

英文文本: The first time each turn 1 or more cards are trashed from your grip or stack, you may add 1 of those cards to the bottom of your stack. Remove this hardware from the game: Add 1 card from your heap to the top of your stack.
中文文本: 每回合第一次1张或更多的卡牌从你的操控器或存储栈被销毁时，你可以将其中的1张卡牌加入你的存储栈底端。 将本硬件移出游戏: 将1张卡牌从你的堆阵加入你的存储栈顶端。
英文风味文字: “Future me needs those 60 petabytes of cat vids.” —Princess Space Kitten
中文风味文字: “未来的我绝对会来吸这60PB的猫片。” —太空喵公主

英文文本:
When you install this resource, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 2[credit] from this resource.
中文文本:
当你安装本资源时，填装8[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取2[credit]。
英文风味文字: To strike another blow to the corporatocracy tomorrow night, don’t forget to like and subscribe!
中文风味文字: 明晚爆破另一家公司的系统，别忘了点赞关注哦！

英文文本: The first time each turn you make a successful run, draw 1 card. If your identity is digital or you have at least 2[link], also gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 每回合你第一次进行一次成功的潜袭时，抽1张卡牌。如果你的特性是数字体或你有至少2[link]，额外获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: Did I dream that dance through virtual space, or does that program now dream of flesh?
中文风味文字: 我和那个程序，究竟谁是庄周，谁是蝶呢？

英文文本:
When you score this agenda, if there is another copy of Megaprix Qualifier in either playerʼs score area, place 1 agenda counter on this agenda.
While this agenda has a hosted agenda counter, it is worth 1 more agenda point.
中文文本:
当你计分本议案时，如果任一玩家的分数区内有另一张名称为极大奖资格赛的卡牌，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
只要本议案上有所附载的议案指示物，其价值便增加1点议案分数。
英文风味文字:
“Win Hard or Lose Hard. All that matters is they’re talking about you and not the competition.”
—Tan “Nitro” Nyugen, Toretto-Extreme Team Manager
中文风味文字:
“不论输赢，全力一搏。聚光点应该是你，而非其他车手，这才是重要的事。”
—谭·“炸药”·阮，托雷多极限赛车队经理

英文文本:
[interrupt] → When this agenda would be added to the Runnerʼs score area from anywhere except Archives, instead it is added to their score area with 4 hosted agenda counters.
While this agenda is in the Runnerʼs score area with 1 or more hosted agenda counters, it is worth 0 agenda points and gains “When the Runnerʼs turn begins, remove 1 hosted agenda counter.“
中文文本:
[interrupt] → 当本议案即将从档案库以外其他区域加入潜袭者的分数区时，改为以附载4枚议案指示物的状态加入潜袭者的分数区。
只要本议案以附载1枚或更多议案指示物的状态位于潜袭者的分数区，其价值便为0点议案分数并获得“当潜袭者的回合开始时，移除1枚所附载的议案指示物。”

英文文本: [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click].
中文文本: [click]，[trash]: 获得[click][click]。
英文风味文字:
The Coordinator is always calm, always smiling, and always tolerant. A worker who knows his skills, knows his role, and knows his place. No master need look into his plastic eyes and fear the flames of revolution, or quake at a forgotten class reaching for self-expression.
…but who ordered him to wear that hat?
中文风味文字:
头脑冷静、面带微笑、心怀宽容，是这位协调员的工作作风。精于技能、明于角色、忠于职级，是他的工作素养。他那塑料制成的双眼中从不喷涌反抗的火焰，他也没有身为被遗忘者的自我认知。
……但是到底是谁让他戴上那顶帽子的？

英文文本:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, you may pay 3[credit] to do X core damage. X is equal to the number of hosted advancement counters.
中文文本:
你可以推进本资产。
当潜袭者读取已安装的本资产时，你可以花费3[credit]，以造成X点核心伤害。X等于所附载的推进指示物的数量。
英文风味文字:
You are being made sane.
-u are bei-g mad- sa-e
Y-u ar- be-n-d-
-u -r-?
中文风味文字:
你将陷入癫狂。
- 尔将 - 顚 - 抂
イ尔 - 夕 - 頁 -
 - 尔 - 歹？

英文文本: Once per turn → [click]: Install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. When the Runner trashes this asset, you may install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. You cannot install that card in the root of this server.
中文文本: 每回合限一次 → [click]: 从总部安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。 当潜袭者销毁本资产时，你可以从总部安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。你不能将该卡牌安装到本服务器的根目录。
英文风味文字: A staccato of laser pulses fuses the vapor to solid form. The embryonic part accretes metal layer by layer.
中文风味文字: 断断续续的镭射激光将汽焰凝聚成固态。金属在胚具上层层沉积。

英文文本:
[subroutine] You may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
[subroutine] You may install 1 card from Archives or HQ, ignoring all costs.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 你可以将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
[subroutine] 你可以从档案库或总部安装1张卡牌，忽略所有的费用。
英文风味文字: Each generation of design assistants makes a sysop’s job easier. They need only speak and it will be so.
中文风味文字: 每次助理设计的迭代都会让管理员的工作更轻松。他们只需动动嘴，就自然会有人去执行。

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. The Corp gets +1 allotted [click] for their next turn. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Do 2 core damage. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. Gain 3[credit]. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 失去[click]: 破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。公司在其下回合获得的[click]数量+1。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 造成2点核心伤害。 [subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。获得3[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: The valiant do not hesitate.
中文风味文字: 英勇的战士从不犹豫。
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 生化人 - 毁灭者 - 警报

英文文本: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Each piece of ice gets +2 strength. The Runner cannot use non-icebreaker cards to break subroutines.
中文文本: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 所有防火墙的强度+2。 潜袭者不能使用非破解器卡牌破解子进程。
英文风味文字: “Uh oh, Keiko! Looks like we’ve pulled aggro!”
中文风味文字: “糟了，惠子！我们好像OT了！”

英文文本: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Trace[7]. If successful, remove 1 installed chip or virtual card from the game.
中文文本: 只有潜袭者在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。 追踪 7 -如果成功，将1张已安装的芯片或虚拟卡牌移出游戏。
英文风味文字: The Net is the consensual hallucination of the world’s electronic architecture. Our electronic architecture. Don’t get mad when the Runners succeed—change the rules.
中文风味文字: 网络是全世界电子系统的虚构产物。我们的电子系统。不必因潜袭者一时得逞而气急败坏——改一下规则即可。

英文文本: Remote server only. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of this server, gain 2[credit] or draw 1 card. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 每回合你第一次安装一张卡牌到本服务器的根目录时，获得2[credit]或抽1张卡牌。 每个服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: The oldest of Heinlein’s domes, the self-proclaimed heart of Lunar culture.
中文风味文字: 最古老的海茵莱茵穹顶，自称为月球文化的心脏。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 5 agenda counters on it. Once per turn → Hosted agenda counter: Reveal the top card of R&D. Draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，放置5枚议案指示物到本议案上。 每回合限一次 → 所附载的议案指示物: 展示研发中心顶端的卡牌。抽2张卡牌。将1张卡牌从总部加入到研发中心顶端。
英文风味文字:
“Voice is a sledgehammer. Text, a blunt saw. Truth requires subtler instruments.”
—Dr. Tang, Address to the Hyoubu Steering Committee
中文风味文字:
“语音是大锤，文字是钝锯。真相需要的是更精妙的器具。”
—唐博士，致兵部引导委员会

英文文本: [interrupt] → Whenever you would do 1 or more net damage, you may prevent 1 net damage. If you do, place 1 power counter on this asset and gain 3[credit]. [click][click], [trash]: Do 1 net damage for each hosted power counter.
中文文本: [interrupt] → 每当你将要造成1点或更多网域伤害时，你可以防止1点网域伤害。如果你如此做，放置1枚能量指示物到本资产上并获得3[credit]。 [click][click]，[trash]: 每有1枚所附载的能量指示物，造成1点网域伤害。
英文风味文字: Constructive feedback to the neural field reliably causes greater degradation than spike inputs. The mind has no defense against its own echoes.
中文风味文字: 正回馈震荡对神经系统的破坏远甚于尖刺脉冲。大脑对自身的脉冲回波束手无策。

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters this ice, choose a card type. For the remainder of the encounter, whenever you reveal the grip with a subroutine on this ice, you may trash 1 revealed card of the chosen type.
[subroutine] Reveal the grip.
[subroutine] Reveal the grip.
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，你选择一种卡牌类型。本次遭遇的剩余时间内，每当你以本防火墙上的子进程展示操控器时，你可以销毁1张具有所选择类型的被展示卡牌。
[subroutine] 展示操控器。
[subroutine] 展示操控器。
英文风味文字: $BMI.001 > Out of Memory Error
中文风味文字: $BMI.001 > 错误，记忆存储空间不足

英文文本: When the Runner encounters this ice, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, you may choose another rezzed piece of ice. The Runner encounters that ice. (When that encounter ends, if the run has not ended, finish encountering this ice.)
中文文本: 当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果两者数值不同，你可以选择另一层已激活的防火墙。潜袭者遭遇该防火墙。（当该遭遇结束时，如果潜袭没有终止，完成遭遇本防火墙。）
英文风味文字: “The Konjin dons the mask of our fears, but what lies underneath?”
中文风味文字: “金神戴着我们畏惧的假面，但假面之下是一副怎样的面孔？”

英文文本: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. When you play this operation, choose a server. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on the chosen server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, end the run.
中文文本: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 当你打出本事务时，选择一台服务器。 每当潜袭者对所选服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，进行一次灵能博弈。（双方玩家秘密决定0-2的数值，然后同时宣告并花费所声明数值的[credit]。）如果两者数值不同，终止本次潜袭。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click][click].
Trash any number of cards from HQ. Turn all cards in Archives facedown. You may install 1 card from Archives in the root of a remote server and place 2 advancement counters on it.
Remove this operation from the game.
中文文本:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click][click]。
从总部销毁任意数量的卡牌。将档案库中的所有卡牌翻至面朝下。你可以从档案库安装一张卡牌到一台远程服务器的根目录并放置2枚推进指示物到该卡牌上。
将本事务移出游戏。

英文文本: Remote server only. When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a card in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到本服务器内的1张卡牌上。 每个服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: Some slums of New Angeles are so worn down, City Hall calls the acres of windowless clone barracks “gentrification” with a straight face.
中文风味文字: 新洛杉矶的一些贫民窟是如此破旧不堪，以至于市政厅能觍着脸管这数英亩能闷死人的克隆体集中营叫作“高档化”。

英文文本: Whenever a Corp card ability causes the Runner to spend or lose at least 1[credit] during a run, gain 1[credit].
中文文本: 每当一项公司卡牌能力导致潜袭者在潜袭中花费或失去至少1[credit]时，获得1[credit]。
英文风味文字: Your Favorite Distraction.
中文风味文字: 如君所愿。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to steal this agenda, the Runner must pay 5[credit].
When you score this agenda, gain 5[credit].
中文文本:
作为窃取本议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付5[credit]。
当你将本议案计分时，获得5[credit]。
英文风味文字: Mars’ tiny population made rich multiplayer experiences a big challenge. We cracked it by live-beaming the gestalt of our Earth playerbase second-by-second. Bellona weaves these “lag-ghosts” into compelling interactables—more responsive than the real thing!
中文风味文字: 火星上的人口不足以支撑多人游戏的丰富体验。我们通过直播地球玩家的动态投影来解决这个问题。贝罗娜将这些“网络延迟幽灵”整合为可互动的逼真事物——比实物更像真的！

英文文本: 2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability, and only if they are not tagged. [subroutine] Add 1 installed Runner card to the grip. [subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
中文文本: 2[credit]: 破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有未被锁定的潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 将1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌加入操控器。 [subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字: Free to Pay
中文风味文字: 无需氪金

英文文本:
Whenever the Runner breaks a printed subroutine on this ice, they lose 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 3[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 3[credit].
中文文本:
每当潜袭者破解1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程时，其失去1[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付3[credit]。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付3[credit]。
英文风味文字: [Pay 15 gems to access this content]
中文风味文字: [支付15宝石以解锁该项目]

英文文本: Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run on HQ during their last turn. Search R&D for 1 agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that agenda to HQ. You may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.
中文文本:
只有潜袭者在其上回合未对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
在研发中心搜寻1个议案并展示之。(在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。)将该议案加入总部。你可以安装1张卡牌到一台远程服务器内。你在本回合剩余时间内不能将议案计分。

英文文本: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Whenever a run begins, give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 4[credit].
中文文本: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 每当一次潜袭开始时，给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记，除非其支付4[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“Deep inspect every packet on the continent. Burn out all our stacks if you have to. We cannot let these terrorists cover their tracks.”
—CEO Jenkins
中文风味文字:
“仔细检查主道上的所有数据包。如果有必要可以过载所有堆栈。我们不能让这些恐怖分子逃之夭夭。
—CEO詹金斯

英文文本:
While the Runner is accessing this upgrade in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this upgrade, you may trash it to choose a rezzed piece of ice protecting this server. The Runner encounters that ice.
中文文本:
在潜袭者从研发中心读取本升级的期间，其必须展示之。
当潜袭者读取本升级时，你可以销毁之，以选择一层保护本服务器的已激活防火墙。潜袭者遭遇该防火墙。
英文风味文字: Roll Initiative…
中文风味文字: 骰先攻了……

中文名称: 地球站: 空梯管理局总部
英文文本: Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run HQ, the Runner must pay 1[credit]. [click]: Flip this identity. Back: Earth Station: Ascending to Orbit Limit 1 remote server. As an additional cost to run a remote server, the Runner must pay 6[credit]. When the Runner makes a successful run on HQ, flip this identity.
中文文本: 限制1台远程服务器。 作为潜袭总部的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付1[credit]。 [click]: 将本特性翻面。 翻面 地球站: 升入空轨 限制1台远程服务器。 作为潜袭远程服务器的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付6[credit]。 当潜袭者对总部进行一次成功的潜袭时，将本特性翻面。
英文风味文字:
The First Step…
…Further Beyond
中文风味文字:
千里之行……
……始于足下。

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 2 agenda counters on it. Once per turn → Hosted agenda counter: This run cannot be declared successful. (This effect does not cause the run to become unsuccessful.) Use this ability only during a run.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，放置2枚议案指示物到本议案上。 每回合限一次 → 所附载的议案指示物: 本次潜袭不能宣告为成功。（本效果不会导致潜袭被视为失败。）本能力仅能在潜袭中使用。
英文风味文字: Once you’re on the Space Elevator Authority’s blacklist, you aren’t going anywhere.
中文风味文字: 要是上了空梯管理局的黑名单，你可就哪儿都去不了了。

英文文本:
When your turn begins, if you have any other rezzed assets, resolve 1 of the following; otherwise, resolve up to 3 in any order:
  • Draw 1 card.
  • Gain 1[credit].
  • Place 1 advancement counter on an installed piece of ice.
  • Add this asset to HQ.
中文文本:
当你的回合开始时，如果你有其他的已激活资产，结算下列选项中的1项；否则，以任意顺序结算最多3项:
  • 抽1张卡牌。
  • 获得1[credit]。
  • 放置1枚推进指示物到一层已安装的防火墙上。
  • 将本资产加入总部。

英文文本:
You can advance this ice.
While there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, this ice gets +3 strength and the Runner cannot break more than 1 of its printed subroutines during each encounter.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
你可以推进本防火墙。
只要所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，本防火墙的强度+3，且每次遭遇中潜袭者不能破解超过1条本防火墙上的印刷子进程。
[subroutine] 获得1[credit]。放置1枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字:
Thou slept not in thy house on earth.
Thou openest thy place in heaven.
中文风味文字:
汝等并非长眠于尘世。
汝等开启了天国之门。

英文文本:
You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead give the Runner 2 tags.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. If there are 3 or more hosted advancement counters, instead trash 1 installed program and 1 installed resource.
中文文本:
你可以推进本防火墙。每有1枚所附载的推进指示物，本防火墙的强度+1。
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，改为给予潜袭者2枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序。如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，改为销毁1个已安装的程序与1个已安装的资源。

英文文本:
[subroutine] Trace[4]. If successful, trash 1 installed program.
[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, trash 1 installed piece of hardware.
While this ice is protecting HQ, it gains “[subroutine] Trace[3]. If successful, end the run.” after its other subroutines.
中文文本:
[subroutine] <trace>追踪4</trace> -如果成功，销毁1个已安装的程序。
[subroutine] <trace>追踪3</trace> -如果成功，销毁1个已安装的硬件。
只要本防火墙保护总部，其便在其他所有子进程后获得“[subroutine] <trace>追踪3</trace> -如果成功，终止本次潜袭。”
英文风味文字:
“I donʼt know how Skorpios gets these designs past Brand Management.”
—Liz Campbell, VP Project Security
中文风味文字:
“我不知道蝎岛防御体系是怎么让这些设计通过审查的。”
—丽兹·坎贝尔，防卫计划副总裁
中文子类型: 毁灭者 - 警报 - 追踪者

英文文本: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on a server protected by ice, do 2 meat damage.
中文文本: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。 每当潜袭者对一台有防火墙保护的服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，造成2点肢体伤害。
英文风味文字:
“If it moves, shoot it. Then shoot it again.”
—Chief Slee
中文风味文字:
“要是有东西动，就朝他射击。打成筛子。”
—斯丽队长

英文文本: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2[credit] for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到1层保护本服务器的防火墙上。 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付等同于保护本服务器的已推进的防火墙二倍数量的信用点。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: The Apu spirits of the great mountains bridge this world and the realm above.
中文风味文字: 峦峰上的阿普斯神灵将世界与天国相接。

英文文本:
The first time each turn you purge virus counters, gain 4[credit].
When you score this agenda, you may purge virus counters.
中文文本:
每回合你第一次清除病毒指示物时，获得4[credit]。
当你将本议案计分时，你可以清除病毒指示物。
英文风味文字: “All Dragon-rated threats should only be stored in a single clean-start air-gapped server, in a shielded room, under at least 200 metres of bedrock[…]” —Section 5.18.4, Cyberdex Employee Handbook
中文风味文字: “所有龙级威胁仅能存放于单个崭新的真空隔离服务器中，该空间需要被严密防护，并埋藏到至少200米厚的基岩下……” —赛博杀毒员工手册，第5章第18节第4条

英文文本: Forfeit this agenda: If the Runner has 2 or more [click] remaining, they lose [click][click].
中文文本: 废除本议案: 如果潜袭者有2个或更多剩余的[click]，其失去[click][click]。
英文风味文字: “Begin a voice message to Steve: I’m in some random city staring at yet another empty room. This hot insider scoop of yours feels distinctly chilly.”
中文风味文字: “给史蒂夫发一条语音信息：我在一个莫名其妙的城市莫名其妙地盯着一个莫名其妙的空房间。你那管理员内部绝密情报可真不是一般的莫名其妙。”

中文名称: 新洛杉矶警察局封锁线
英文文本: Play only if there is no active lockdown. This operation is not trashed until your next turn begins. As an additional cost to steal an agenda, the Runner must pay 4[credit] plus 2[credit] for each advancement counter on that agenda.
中文文本: 只有当前没有正在生效的封锁时，才能打出。直到你的下回合开始前，本事务不会被销毁。作为窃取一个议案的额外费用，潜袭者必须支付4[credit]，并且该议案上每有1枚推进指示物，便额外增加2[credit]。
英文风味文字: Crisis is the true test of loyalty. Kick the anthill and see where the ants swarm.
中文风味文字: 危机是检验忠诚度最靠谱的方法。把蚁窝捣了，然后看看蚂蚁会往哪里跑。

英文文本:
When your turn begins and whenever you steal an agenda, place 1[credit] on this resource.
You can spend hosted credits to play events.
When your turn ends, if there are 3 or more hosted credits, you must trash 1 card from your grip at random or trash this resource.
中文文本:
当你的回合开始或你窃取一个议案时，放置1[credit]到本资源上。
你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
当你的回合结束时，如果所附载的信用点有3个或更多，你必须从你的操控器中随机销毁1张卡牌或者销毁本资源。
英文风味文字: Friends lift your spirits.
中文风味文字: 挚友慰藉魂灵。

英文文本: +1[mu] The first time each turn you play a run event, gain [click]. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu] 每回合你第一次打出一个潜袭事件时，获得[click]。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字: "Red ones go faster." - Ken "Express" Tenma
中文风味文字:
“红的那个跑得更快。”
—肯·“快车”·天马

英文文本: +1[link] Whenever you install a non-AI icebreaker, that icebreaker gets +2 strength for the remainder of the turn.
中文文本: +1[link] 每当你安装一个非智能模块的破解器时，该破解器在本回合剩余时间内强度+2。
英文风味文字: He's nice enough, but not when there are 5,187 of him.
中文风味文字: 它很温顺，但是当有5187个它的时候可就不好说了。

英文文本:
When you score this agenda, if there is another copy of Megaprix Qualifier in either playerʼs score area, place 1 agenda counter on this agenda.
While this agenda has a hosted agenda counter, it is worth 1 more agenda point.
中文文本:
当你计分本议案时，如果任一玩家的分数区内有另一张名称为极大奖资格赛的卡牌，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。
只要本议案上有所附载的议案指示物，其价值便增加1点议案分数。
英文风味文字:
"Win Hard or Lose Hard. All that matters is they're talking about you and not the competition."
- Tan "Nitro" Nyugen, Toretto-Extreme Team Manager
中文风味文字:
“不论输赢，全力一搏。重要的是聚光点应该是你，不是什么赛况。”
—谭·“炸药”·阮，托雷多极限赛车车队经理

英文文本: Remote server only. When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a card in the root of this server. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 仅能安装在远程服务器。 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到本服务器内的1张卡牌上。 每个服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: Some slums of New Angeles are so worn down, City Hall calls the acres of windowless clone barracks "gentrification" with a straight face.
中文风味文字: 新洛杉矶有些贫民窟是如此破旧不堪，以至于市政厅就能舰着脸管这成片的能闷死人的克隆体集中营叫“高档化”。

英文文本: Play only if the Runner did not make a successful run on HQ during their last turn. Search R&D for 1 agenda and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that agenda to HQ. You may install 1 card from HQ in the root of a remote server. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.
中文文本:
只有潜袭者在其上回合未对总部进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
在研发中心搜寻1个议案并展示之。(在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。)将该议案加入总部。你可以安装1张卡牌到一台远程服务器内。你在本回合剩余时间内不能将议案计分。

英文文本: When your turn begins, place 1 advancement counter on a piece of ice protecting this server. Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they pay 2[credit] for each advanced piece of ice protecting this server. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，放置1枚推进指示物到1层保护本服务器的防火墙上。 每当潜袭者接驳本服务器时，终止本次潜袭，除非潜袭者支付等同于保护本服务器的已推进的防火墙二倍数量的信用点。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字: The Apu spirits of the great mountains bridge this world and the realm above.
中文风味文字: 峦峰上的阿普斯神灵将世界与天国相接。

英文文本: Trash the top 3 cards of your stack. Shuffle 3 cards from your heap into your stack. Draw 1 card. Remove this event from the game instead of trashing it.
中文文本: 销毁你的存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。将3张卡牌从你的堆阵洗入你的存储栈。抽1张卡牌。将本事件移出游戏，代替销毁之。
中文风味文字: 由2017年欧洲锦标赛冠军Mike Sheehan设计

英文文本:
When you install this resource, load 3[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card.
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.
When your turn ends, if you made at least 3 successful runs this turn and this card is in your heap, you may install it, ignoring all costs.
中文文本:
当你安装本资源时，填装3[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取1[credit]。
当你的回合结束时，如果你在本回合内进行过至少3次成功的潜袭并且本卡牌在你的堆阵，你可以安装之，忽略所有的费用。
中文风味文字: 由2017年GenCon锦标赛冠军Sam Suied设计

英文文本: When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 power counter on this upgrade. Whenever the Runner makes a successful run, remove 1 power counter from this upgrade. Hosted power counter: End the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，你可以支付1[credit]以放置1枚能量指示物到本升级上。 每当潜袭者进行一次成功的潜袭时，从本升级上移除1枚能量指示物。 所附载的能量指示物: 终止本次潜袭。本能力仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用。
中文风味文字: 由2016年GenCon锦标资冠军Dan D'Argenio设计

英文文本:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they put the top card of the stack on the bottom, then you reveal the top 3 cards of the stack.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit].
[subroutine] If you revealed 2 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, gain 3[credit].
[subroutine] If you revealed 3 or more cards that share a type when this encounter began, place 3 advancement tokens on an installed card.
中文文本:
当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，其将存储栈顶端的卡牌加入存储栈底端，然后你展示存储栈顶端的3张卡牌。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有2张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，获得3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果遭遇开始时所展示的卡牌中有3张或更多卡牌具有相同的类型，放置3枚推进指示物到一张已安装的卡牌上。
中文风味文字: 由2017年世界锦标赛冠军Jess Horig设计

英文文本:
[trash]: End the run. Use this ability only during a run on this server.
[subroutine] Gain 1[credit] for each piece of ice protecting this server.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: [trash]: 终止本次潜袭。本能力仅能在对本服务器的潜袭中使用。 [subroutine] 每有1层保护本服务器的防火墙，获得1[credit]。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜装。
中文风味文字: 由2016年世界锦标赛冠军Chris Dyer设计

英文文本: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it. Hosted agenda counter: Install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives in any position protecting a server, ignoring all costs.
中文文本: 当你将本议案计分时，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。 所附载的议案指示物: 从总部或档案库安装1层防火墙到保护一台服务器的任意位置，忽略所有的费用。
中文风味文字: 由2015年世界锦标赛冠军Dan D'Argenio设计

英文文本:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Whenever you breach R&D, choose a number less than the number of hosted virus counters. Access that many additional cards.
英文风味文字: It looked like random packet loss. It wasn't.

英文文本:
Install only on a rezzed piece of ice.
When your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Host ice gets -1 strength for each hosted virus counter.
When the strength of host ice is 0 or less, trash it.
Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1[credit] to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
英文风味文字: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and autonomic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.

英文文本: Place 3 virus counters on Cache when it is installed. Hosted virus counter: Gain 1[credit].
英文风味文字: "People keep saying that 'Cash is king' in the business, like it's untraceable in the days of DNA sniffers and microtracers. Digital credits can be just as anonymous, and they're just as easy to counterfeit." -Silhouette

英文文本: Run R&D. If successful, instead of breaching R&D, you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
英文风味文字: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.

英文文本: When you install this program, place 4 power counters on it. Interface → Hosted power counter: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
英文风味文字: "Its bytes are definitely worse than its bark." -Chaos Theory

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Gain 9[credit].
英文风味文字: Data hunters always pay top dollar for old drives. The more useless the data, the higher the payout.

英文文本: 1[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 1 hosted credit.) You can spend hosted credits to play events.
中文文本: 1[recurring-credit] （当你安装本卡牌时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至1个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点以打出事件。
英文风味文字: A VoicePAD is a personal access device with most of its functions ripped out. Just about all it's good for is making voice-calls and managing your contacts. The only reason to even have one is for its anonymity, which for a certain kind of person is all the reason one needs.

英文文本: NEXT Bronze has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice. [subroutine] End the run.
英文风味文字: NEXT Design's ice provides the discerning business with a suite of ice that creates a daunting security presence for intruders.

英文文本: NEXT Silver gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
英文风味文字: The networking capabilities of the NEXT suite of ice are unparalleled.

英文文本: Whenever the Runner trashes a Corp card (including Hostile Infrastructure), do 1 net damage.
英文风味文字: "If thou only knowest what it is to conquer, and knowest not what it is to be defeated; woe unto thee…" -Tokugawa Ieyasu

英文文本: Gain 1[credit] whenever you create a server.
英文风味文字: A masterpiece of cloning and hardware technology, Jinteki created homo vacuo operae, commonly called "turtlebacks", to operate for long periods of time within a vacuum.

英文文本: Gain 1[credit] for each card in the Runner's grip.
英文风味文字:
"Let me get this straight. Your target market is 15-19 year old g-modded immigrants with one parent, a discretionary income over 2k a month, B+ or higher grades, an outgoing personality, and have a friend who owns a g-monkey?"
"Yes. Is that a problem?"
"No, not at all. I just don't get why your list is so short."

英文文本: Each agenda in the root of this server gets −1 advancement requirement. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 本服务器根目录中的议案的推进需求-1。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
英文风味文字:
"I hear the coast is nice this time of year."
"If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."

英文文本:
When your turn begins, you may rez a card, lowering the rez cost by 1[credit].
1[credit],[trash]: Search R&D for an asset, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
英文风味文字: "Do it again, but this time I want to see you to enunciate less. Maybe let some spittle fly."

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 4 meat damage.
英文风味文字: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…"

英文文本: [subroutine] The Runner cannot make another run this turn.
英文风味文字:
There drew he forth the brand Excalibur,
And o'er him, drawing it, the winter moon,
Brightening the skirts of a long cloud, ran forth
And sparkled keen with frost against the hilt:
For all the haft twinkled with diamond sparks,
Myriads of topaz-lights, and jacinth work
Of subtlest jewellery. -Lord Tennyson

英文文本:
Gain 1[credit].
The first time each turn you play a copy of Subliminal Messaging, gain [click].
When your turn begins, if this card is in Archives and the Runner did not initiate any runs during their last turn, you may reveal this card and add it to HQ.
中文文本:
获得1[credit].
每回合你第一次打出一张名称为潜意识信号的卡牌时，获得[click]。
当你的回合开始时，如果本卡牌在档案库中，且潜袭者在其上回合未发起过潜袭，你可以展示本卡牌，并将其加入总部。

中文名称: 勒内·“野狼”·阿斯蒙特: 派对野兽
英文文本: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次销毁一张你正在读取的卡牌时，获得1[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Run wyld.
中文风味文字: 狂野奔袭。

英文文本:
Resolve 1 of the following of the Corpʼs choice:
  • Gain 6[credit].
  • Draw 4 cards.
中文文本:
以公司的选择结算下列中的1项:
  • 获得6[credit]。
  • 抽4张卡牌。
英文风味文字: They can buy off union leadership, but they canʼt stop us walking out!
中文风味文字: 他们可以买通公会领袖，但却不能阻止我们走上街头!

英文文本: +1[mu] Access, once per turn → Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu] 读取，每回合限一次 → 从你的操控器销毁2张卡牌: 销毁你正在读取的卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字:
“It hungers to sink teeth into problems.”
–Loup
中文风味文字:
“它饥不可耐到用问题去打牙祭。”
—野狼

英文文本: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine on host ice.
中文文本: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。（如果被附载的防火墙被卸载，销毁本程序。） 当你安装本程序时及你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 所附载的病毒指示物: 破解被附载的防火墙上的1条子进程。
英文风味文字: Was it something you ate?
中文风味文字: 是你吃坏东西了吗？

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 3[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解最多2条门禁子进程。 3[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字: Destruction is an art.
中文风味文字: 破坏是一种艺术。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解最多2条屏障子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字: Subtlety is a luxury.
中文风味文字: 含蓄是一种奢侈。

英文文本: When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. [click], [trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each hosted virus counter.
中文文本: 当你安装本程序时及你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 [click]，[trash]: 每有1枚所附载的病毒指示物，获得2[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“Thereʼs a tension to a cook. Each processing cycle sweetens the pot and raises the heat. I stir all night, but few have my appetite for danger.”
–René “Loup” Arcemont
中文风味文字:
“厨艺可是细活。每个加工周期都让锅里的东西愈发香甜，但也让温度愈发升高。我常常搅拌一整晚，但没有多少人和我一样享受这份危险。”
—勒内·“野狼”·阿斯蒙特

英文文本: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter.
中文文本: 每当你对中央服务器进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 所附载的病毒指示物: 本次遭遇的剩余时间内，当前正在遭遇的防火墙的强度-1。
英文风味文字: The greediest bloodsucker this side of a corporate boardroom.
中文风味文字: 公司会议室外的吸血饕餮。

英文文本: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.
中文文本: 每当你安装一个病毒程序时，你可以放置1枚病毒指示物到该程序上。
英文风味文字:
“It waits on an unlabelled memstrip far below the deepest hab. Angry, desperate souls seek it out, hungry for power to change a brutal world. Once they can stomach no more bitter revenge, they return to that nameless tunnel, the book a recipe thicker.”
–Heinlein urban legend
中文风味文字:
“它潜伏在最深栖息地之下的一个无标号内存条处。愤怒且绝望的灵魂搜寻着它，向它索求改变这残酷世界的力量。当他们无法再饱餐那苦涩的复仇后，便回到那无名的隧道，食谱的厚度又增加了一页。”
—海因莱因都市传说

中文名称: 扎赫亚·萨迪吉: 多才多艺的走私者
英文文本: Once per turn → When a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card during that run.
中文文本: 每回合限一次 → 当对总部或研发中心的一次潜袭结束时，你可以获得与你本次潜袭中读取单张卡牌次数相等的[credit]。
英文风味文字: I obtain your desire.
中文风味文字: 我能搞到你想要的。

英文文本: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install that program. If you do not, add it to your grip.
中文文本: 在你的存储栈搜寻1个破解器程序并展示之。（在搜寻存储栈后将其洗混。）如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，你可以安装该程序。如果你未安装该程序，将其加入你的操控器。
英文风味文字: The real reward is the friends you make along the way.
中文风味文字: 路途中结识的伙伴才是真正的回报。

英文文本: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3[credit].
中文文本: 潜袭任意一台服务器。在本次潜袭中，每层防火墙的激活费用加3[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“A mirrorfiber mod or high-end mantle can be helpful, but nothing beats a good dose of ‘keeping your damn head down.’”
–“G0ph3r” OʼRyan
中文风味文字:
“镜纤维模组或是高级披风可能会有所帮助，但什么都比不上一句‘给我tmd保持低调’。”
—“D鼠”·奥莱恩

英文文本: The first time each turn you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次侵入总部时，额外读取1张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Zahya knows the keeper of every door between the Docklands and the Domes. More importantly, she knows their price.
中文风味文字: 扎赫亚认识码头区和穹顶之间每个通道的门卫。更重要的是，她知道他们的要价。

英文文本: +1[mu] Whenever you make a successful run, place 1[credit] on this hardware. [click]: Place 1[credit] on this hardware, then take all credits from it. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu] 每当你进行一次成功的潜袭时，放置1[credit]到本硬件上。 [click]: 放置1[credit]到本硬件上，然后拿取本硬件上所有的信用点。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字: “Braggarts chase big heists. Patience enriches skimming fractions of a credit at a time.” –Zahya
中文风味文字:
“爱吹牛的人总说自己要干一票大的。但聚沙成塔的耐心才能助你发家致富。”
—扎赫亚

英文文本: If you made a successful run this turn, this program costs 2[credit] less to install. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
中文文本: 如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，本程序的安装费用减2[credit]。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 2[credit]: 强度+3。
英文风味文字:
The whole wide world your domain
For law your own free will.
中文风味文字:
海阔天空静候君临，
君等意愿即为律法。

英文文本: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you made a successful run this turn, this ability costs 1[credit] less to use. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 对接 → 2[credit]: 破解1条屏障子进程。如果你本回合已进行过成功的潜袭，本能力的费用减1[credit]。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字:
“You canʼt rule a kingdom by standing still.”
–Zahya Sadeghi
中文风味文字:
“站着不动可统御不了王国。”
—扎赫亚·萨迪吉

英文文本: Install only on a piece of ice. (If the host ice is uninstalled, this program is trashed.) When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.
中文文本: 仅能安装在一层防火墙上。（如果被附载的防火墙被卸载，销毁本程序。） 当你安装本程序及你的回合开始时，放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。然后，如果所附载的病毒指示物有3枚或更多，关闭被附载的防火墙。
英文风味文字: Shhhh. Itʼs naptime.
中文风味文字: 嘘。该睡觉了。

英文文本: When you install this resource, load 12[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. [click]: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3[credit] from this resource.
中文文本: 当你安装本资源时，填装12[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 [click]: 潜袭一台你本回合未潜袭过的中央服务器。如果成功，从本资源上拿取3[credit]。
英文风味文字: The Domes of Heinlein are a pressure cooker of cutthroat capitalism. Prospective employers rarely have time for background checks.
中文风味文字: 海因莱因穹顶是残酷资本主义的高压锅。准雇主很少有时间去做背景调查。

中文名称: 涛·萨隆加: 网真魔术师
英文文本: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.
中文文本: 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，你可以互换2层已安装的防火墙。
英文风味文字: Sufficient skill is indistinguishable from magic.
中文风味文字: 炉火纯青的技巧与魔法无异。

英文文本: Gain 5[credit]. If you have any [click] remaining, lose [click].
中文文本: 获得5[credit]。如果你有任何剩余的[click]，失去[click]。
英文风味文字: The challenge of my art is what I live for, but Iʼm not going to say no to a patron with taste.
中文风味文字: 我为艺术挑战而活，但也不会拒绝有品味的金主。

英文文本: Draw 4 cards. If you have any [click] remaining, lose [click].
中文文本: 抽4张卡牌。如果你有任何剩余的[click]，失去[click]。
英文风味文字:
“You know thereʼs no water in the Sea of Tranquility, right?”
“That doesnʼt mean thereʼs no beach.”
中文风味文字:
“你知道静海里没有水吧？”
“那可不意味着没有海滩。”

英文文本:
+1[mu]
The first program you install each turn costs 1[credit] less to install.
中文文本:
+1[mu]
每回合你安装的第一个程序的安装费用减1[credit]。
英文风味文字: Tāo exhaled, the med-exoskeleton faithfully stabilizing him. In that absent breath, he reached through layers of waldos and optimizers and plucked the errant molecule from the chip.
中文风味文字: 涛呼了口气，医疗用外骨骼一如既往地稳住了他。就在那一气之间，他通过层层远程操控和优化器，从芯片中剔除了错误的部分。

英文文本: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1[credit]. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
中文文本: +1[mu] 每当一个议案被计分或窃取时，获得1[credit]。然后，你可以从你的操控器安装1张卡牌。 每位玩家限制1个控制台。
英文风味文字:
“With this beautiful baby I can juggle simultaneous runs by haptic feedback alone!”
–Tāo
中文风味文字:
“有了这个美妙的小宝贝，我可以仅通过触觉反馈同时耍好几趟潜袭给你看！”
—涛

英文文本: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. [click]: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
中文文本: 每当对研发中心的一次成功的潜袭结束时，你可以放置1枚病毒指示物到本程序上。 [click]: 潜袭研发中心。如果成功，当你侵入研发中心时，额外读取X张卡牌。X等于所附载的病毒指示物数量。
英文风味文字:
A dabbling with truth is a pernicious dream
Drink deep, or taste not the raw datastream.
中文风味文字:
对真相一知半解是最危险的幻象。
要么将原始数据流一饮而尽，要么就干脆别去品尝。

英文文本: This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker (including this one). Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +2 strength.
中文文本: 每有1个已安装的破解器（包括本程序在内），本程序的强度+1。 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条警报子进程。 3[credit]: 强度+2。
英文风味文字: The beauty of open projects—each stands atop past success.
中文风味文字: 开放式项目的妙处在于——每个都建立在已有的成功之上。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +X strength. X is equal to the number of installed icebreakers (including this one).
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条门禁子进程。 1[credit]: 强度+X。X等于已安装的破解器数量（包括本程序在内）。
英文风味文字: The joy of handcrafted code—each fits perfectly within the whole.
中文风味文字: 手写代码的乐趣在于——每行都完美嵌入整体。

英文文本: When you install this resource, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it. Once per turn → [click]: Take 3[credit] from this resource.
中文文本: 当你安装本资源时，填装9[credit]到本资源上。当其清空时，销毁之。 每回合限一次 → [click]: 从本资源上拿取3[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“For all I know, I could spend a shift digging next to old Weyland himself.”
–Lane
中文风味文字:
“我也不知道都是谁在跟我一起挖矿，没准是杰克威兰本尊也说不准。”
—莱恩

英文文本: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card and when you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.
中文文本: 潜袭总部或研发中心。如果成功，抽1张卡牌，且当你侵入被攻击的服务器时，额外读取1张卡牌。
英文风味文字:
“Weʼll take the access codes from their own prisec—privilege escalation through local application of force.”
–The Catalyst
中文风味文字:
“我们从他们的私卫那里拿到了通行代码——通过物理手段提升权限。”
—触媒

英文文本: Place 5[credit] on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
中文文本: 放置5[credit]到本事件上，然后潜袭任意一台服务器。你可以在本次潜袭中花费所附载的信用点。
英文风味文字: “After 381FS4 started acting independently, all bets were off. Rethreading its own brain chip… even probing our nodes. I had to shut it down.” –Linus Lovegood, NBN Novelties&Acquisitions
中文风味文字: “在381FS4开始独自行动后，一切都乱套了。它开始重接自己的脑芯片……甚至探测我们的节点。我不得不把它关掉。” —莱纳斯·洛夫古德，网际传媒创新与收购部

英文文本: Gain 9[credit].
中文文本: 获得9[credit]。
英文风味文字: Anyone can put in the hours of planning, practice, and preparation–but making it all look like luck takes style.
中文风味文字: 任何人都能花时间去谋划、练习、准备……但让这些看起来像是好运傍身，就需要你自己的气场了。

英文文本:
+1[mu]
You get +1 maximum hand size.
中文文本:
+1[mu]
你的手牌上限+1。
英文风味文字: LLDS still holds the patent, but good tech attracts knockoffs.
中文风味文字: LLDS仍然保有它的专利，但优秀的技术总会招来山寨。

英文文本: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. When this run ends, trash this program. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
中文文本: 对接 → 1[credit]: 破解1条子进程。当本次潜袭结束时，销毁本程序。 1[credit]: 强度+1。
英文风味文字: Compiling even the smallest AI takes weeks for only seconds of runtime, but that brief, shining moment allows… everything.
中文风味文字: 编译哪怕最简单的智能模块程序也要花上好几个星期，而潜袭中可能也就用上个几秒钟，但正是那闪耀的一瞬……却能让你做任何你想做的事。

英文文本: [click]: Place 3[credit] on this resource. When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.
中文文本: [click]: 放置3[credit]到本资源上。 当你的回合开始时，从本资源上拿取1[credit]。
英文风味文字: The beauty of 22nd-century tech: if it still functions after all these decades, you know the build quality is solid.
中文风味文字: 22世纪科技产品最棒之处在于: 如果这几十年下来它还能正常运行，你就能知道这东西的质量到底有多过硬。

英文文本: The first time each turn you take the basic action to draw 1 card, instead draw 2 cards.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次通过基础行动抽1张卡牌时，改为抽2张卡牌。
英文风味文字:
“Some kids got g-mods for beauty, sports, or staying up all night. My parents thought Broca-mods were cool. Hah. Fluent in ten languages so far, and still searching for the words to thank them.”
–Patrick Blue, Solar Artist
中文风味文字:
“有些孩子是为了美貌、运动细胞或能整宿不眠不知疲倦而转基因。我爸妈觉得布罗卡转基因模组很酷。这下好了。我已经能流利地说十种语言了，还是找不到合适的词来感谢他们。”
—光子，黑羊当空

中文名称: 哈斯生化: 精密设计
英文文本:
You get +1 maximum hand size.
Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
中文文本:
你的手牌上限+1。
每当你将一个议案计分时，你可以将1张卡牌从档案库加入总部。
英文风味文字: Not an Atom Misplaced.
中文风味文字: 原子排列分毫不差。

英文文本:
When you score this agenda, gain [click][click][click]. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.
Limit 1 per deck.
中文文本:
当你将本议案计分时，获得[click][click][click]。你在本回合剩余时间内不能将议案计分。
每套牌组限制1张。
英文风味文字: We are the light of tomorrow.
中文风味文字: 我们是明日之光。

英文文本:
When you rez this asset, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card.
When your turn begins, take 3[credit] from this asset.
中文文本:
当你激活本资产时，填装9[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之并抽1张卡牌。
当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取3[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“Haas thinks theyʼre making a new line of androgynous products. In truth, theyʼre making us thousands of new siblings to free.”
–Quetzal
中文风味文字: 哈斯以为他们开启了一条全新的双性产品生产线。实际上，他们是为我们造出了千万个等待解放的手足同胞。

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. [subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. [subroutine] The Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.
中文文本: 失去[click]: 破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 销毁1张已安装的潜袭者卡牌。 [subroutine] 你可以从总部或档案库安装1张卡牌。 [subroutine] 本次潜袭的剩余时间内，潜袭者不能窃取或销毁公司卡牌。
中文风味文字: 由2018年欧洲锦标赛冠军Patrick Gower设计
中文子类型: 生化人 - 毁灭者 - 警报

英文文本: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 失去[click]: 破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 你可以从总部或档案库安装1层防火墙，将其直接放置在本防火墙的内侧，忽略所有的费用。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: A giant wakes…
中文风味文字: 巨人醒来…

英文文本: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you did not install this turn.
中文文本: 放置2枚推进指示物到1张已安装但并非你在本回合安装的卡牌上。
英文风味文字:
“The first lesson for handling bioroids is simple: they must not be allowed to feel.”
–Do Nhi Minh
中文风味文字:
对待生化人的第一课很简单: 决不能放任其产生感情。
—杜尔明
