英文文本: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit]. Threat 2 → When the Runner trashes this asset (while it is rezzed), give them 1 tag.
中文文本: 当你的回合开始时，获得1[credit]。 威胁2 → 当潜袭者销毁（已激活的）本资产时，给予其1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字:
“Give me five minutes of a user’s Access Plaza traffic and I’ll tell you where they’re having lunch tomorrow. Give me another ten, and I’ll have their bibi’s secret rendang recipe.”
—Luzviminda Reyes, Synapse Sales
中文风味文字:
“给我某个用户在接入广场五分钟的数据，我能算出他明天在哪吃午饭。再给十分钟，连他外婆的仁当秘方都弄到手。”
—卢兹维明达·雷耶斯，突触销售

英文文本:
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
中文文本:
[subroutine] 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者具有至少2枚锁定标记，造成2点网域伤害。
英文风味文字:
They know what makes you tick.
And ticked-off.
中文风味文字:
他们洞悉你所欲的。
以及你所惧的。
中文子类型: 杀伤 - 观察者 - 警报

英文文本: 3[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] If the threat level is 2 or greater, end the run. [subroutine] If the threat level is 4 or greater, end the run.
中文文本: 3[credit]：破解1条本防火墙上的子进程。只有潜袭者可以使用本能力。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 如果威胁等级为2或更高，终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 如果威胁等级为4或更高，终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字:
”On the Net, we hold the power.”
 —Arnold Teoh, NBN technologist
中文风味文字:
“在信网中，能量由我们掌控。”
—阿诺德·张，NBN技术专家

英文文本:
Play only if the Runner is tagged. Resolve 1 of the following:
  • Give the Runner 1 tag.
  • Remove any number of tags. The Runner loses 5[credit] for each tag removed this way. Gain credits equal to the number of credits the Runner lost.
中文文本:
只有潜袭者被锁定时，才能打出。
结算下列中的1项：
- 给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
- 移除任意数量的锁定标记。你每以此法移除1枚锁定标记，潜袭者失去5[credit]。获得等同于潜袭者失去信用点数量的信用点。

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove X tags.
Install 1 agenda from the Runner’s score area with a printed agenda point value equal to X. If the Runner is still tagged, place 1 advancement counter on that agenda.
中文文本: 作为打出本事务的额外费用，移除X枚锁定标记。从潜袭者分数区安装1个印刷议案分数等于X的议案。如果潜袭者依然被锁定，放置1枚推进指示物到该议案上。
英文风味文字: “I believe you have something of ours.”
中文风味文字: “你拿了我们的东西。”

英文文本:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card you can advance. If you do, choose a card type and reveal the grip. Choose up to 2 revealed cards of that type. The Runner shuffles those cards into the stack.
中文文本:
作为打出本事务的额外费用，花费[click]。
放置2枚推进指示物到1张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。如果你如此做，选择一种卡牌类型并展示操控器。选择最多2张展示出的该类型卡牌。潜袭者将这些卡牌洗入存储栈。
英文风味文字: “Your Star Power is in the toilet, kid. We need a fresh face.”
中文风味文字: “孩子，你的明星效应早过气了。我们需要一副新面孔。”

中文名称: 邦贡工团: 灾害突临之时
英文文本: You may install agendas faceup. (This does not make their abilities active.) Whenever the Runner accesses a faceup installed agenda, do 2 meat damage and give the Runner 1 tag.
中文文本: 你可以牌面朝上安装议案。（这不会使其能力生效。） 每当潜袭者读取一张牌面朝上的已安装议案时，造成2点肢体伤害并给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记。
英文风味文字: We’ll be there.
中文风味文字: 我们会在。

中文名称: 茨维基集团: 无形之手
英文文本: The first time each turn you gain credits through an ability on an agenda or operation, you may draw 1 card.
中文文本: 每回合你第一次通过议案或事务上的能力获得信用点时，你可以抽1张卡牌。
英文风味文字: Action at a distance.
中文风味文字: 超距作用。

英文文本:
When you score this agenda, gain 2[credit].
When you forfeit this agenda, gain 4[credit].
中文文本:
当你将本议案计分时，获得2[credit]。
当你废除本议案时，获得4[credit]。
英文风味文字: “It’s been a real pleasure doing business with you.”
中文风味文字: “与你合作真愉快。”

英文文本: Dividends 1 (When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each excess advancement counter.) When your discard phase ends, you may remove 1 hosted agenda counter to search R&D for 1 card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) You may install that card, ignoring all costs. If you do not, add it to HQ.
中文文本: 红利1（当你将本议案计分时，每有一枚多余的推进指示物，放置1枚议案指示物到本议案上。） 当你的弃牌阶段结束时，你可以移除1枚所附载的议案指示物，以从研发中心搜寻1张卡牌并展示之。（在搜寻研发中心后将其洗混。）你可以安装该卡牌，忽略所有的费用。如果你未如此做，将其加入总部。

英文文本:
When you rez this asset, load 8[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
When your turn begins, take 4[credit] from this asset and draw 1 card.
中文文本:
当你激活本资产时，填装8[credit]到本资产上。当其清空时，销毁之。
当你的回合开始时，从本资产上拿取4[credit]并抽1张卡牌。
英文风味文字:
“If you lived here, you’d be at work by now!”
—Weyland recruiter
中文风味文字:
“住这里早上工！”
—威兰招聘员

英文文本: As an additional cost to rez this asset, forfeit 1 agenda or reveal and trash 3 cards from HQ. When your turn begins, you may play 1 transaction operation from Archives. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
中文文本: 作为激活本资产的额外费用，废除1个议案或从总部展示并销毁3张卡牌。 当你的回合开始时，你可以从档案库打出1个交易事务。结算后将其移出游戏。
英文风味文字: “Rejoice, executives! The Net has sent unto us a profit!”
中文风味文字: “欢欣吧，高管们！信网赐予了我们利润！”

英文文本:
You can forfeit 1 agenda as you rez this ice to pay for 10[credit] of its rez cost.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program or end the run.
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed resource or end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
激活本防火墙时，你可以废除1个议案以支付其激活费用中的10[credit]。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的程序或终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 销毁1个已安装的资源或终止本次潜袭。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字:
“Dammit, Moth! Where are you? This thing is way bigger than you s—”
—C0nr4d
中文风味文字:
“妈的！蛾子，你在哪？这玩意比你说的大多——”
—康拉d

英文文本: The Runner cannot trash this ice (while it is rezzed). [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
中文文本: 潜袭者不能销毁（已激活的）本防火墙。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。 [subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字:
“The detritus of failed incursions accumulates. Instead of sweeping it all away, the parsimonious sysop should nudge this debris into defensive positions in the server’s metagravity well.”
—Moira Virtue, Ice Engineering, KKU
中文风味文字:
“失败袭击的残骸不断累积。与其将其全部清除，节俭的系统管理员应将这些碎片推入服务器超重力井中的防御位置。”
—莫伊拉 ·弗丘，防火墙工程系，KKU

英文文本:
You can advance this ice.
When the Runner encounters this ice, if it has 3 or more hosted advancement counters, you may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
[subroutine] You may place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
中文文本:
你可以推进本防火墙。当潜袭者遭遇本防火墙时，如果所附载的推进指示物有3枚或更多，你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
[subroutine] 你可以放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
[subroutine] 潜袭者失去2[credit]。
[subroutine] 造成1点网域伤害。

英文文本:
Resolve 2 of the following in any order:
  • Draw 1 card. Shuffle 1 card from HQ into R&D.
  • Install 1 piece of ice from HQ, ignoring all costs.
  • Place 1 advancement counter on an installed card you can advance.
  • Gain 2[credit].
中文文本:
按任意顺序结算下列中的2项：
- 抽1张卡牌。将1张卡牌从总部洗入研发中心。
- 从总部安装1层防火墙，忽略所有的费用。
- 放置1枚推进指示物到一张你可以推进的已安装的卡牌上。
- 获得2[credit] 。
中文风味文字: 由2023年世界锦标赛冠军William “Sokka” Huang设计

英文文本:
Play only if the threat level is 4 or greater, and only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Do 4 meat damage unless the Runner pays 8[credit].
中文文本:
只有威胁等级为4或更高且潜袭者在其上回合进行过成功的潜袭时，才能打出。
造成4点肢体伤害，除非潜袭者支付8[credit]。
英文风味文字:
“We would like to reassure our shareholders that none of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…”
—Luana Campos, Weyland spokesperson
中文风味文字:
“请股东放心，爆炸损毁建筑均非威兰子公司所有……”
—卢安娜·坎波斯，威兰发言人

英文文本:
When you rez this ice during a run against this server, purge virus counters.
[subroutine] End the run.
中文文本:
在对本服务器的潜袭中，当你激活本防火墙时，清除病毒指示物。
[subroutine] 终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Stop that.
中文风味文字: 别烦。

英文文本:
When an agenda is scored or stolen from this server or its root, trash this ice.
[subroutine] Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 3[credit].
[subroutine] End the run if the Runner is tagged.
中文文本:
当一个议案从本服务器或其根目录被计分或窃取时，销毁本防火墙。
[subroutine]给予潜袭者1枚锁定标记，除非其支付3[credit]。
[subroutine] 如果潜袭者被锁定，终止本次潜袭。
英文风味文字: Itur in antiquam telam.
中文风味文字: 深入古网之中。

英文文本: Play only if you have not finished an action yet this turn. Gain 5[credit]. If you played this operation from anywhere except HQ, gain [click]. [click]: Play this operation from Archives. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
中文文本:
只有你本回合尚未完成一个行动时，才能打出。
获得5[credit]。如果你是从总部以外其他区域打出本事务，获得[click]。
[click]<strong>：<strong>从档案库打出本事务。结算后将其移出游戏。

英文文本: 2[recurring-credit] (When you rez this upgrade and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to rez assets in the root of this server and ice protecting this server. Persistent → The trash cost of each asset in the root of this server is increased by 2[credit]. Limit 1 region per server.
中文文本: 2[recurring-credit]（当你激活本升级时及你的回合开始前，将所附载的信用点补充至2个。） 你可以花费所附载的信用点，以激活本服务器根目录中的资产与保护本服务器的防火墙。 持久 → 本服务器根目录中的资产销毁费用加2[credit]。 每台服务器限制1个区域。
